fact_ai_intent_engine.name: fact_ai_intent_engine
fact_ai_intent_engine.description: Fact table for AI intent engine frontend events, enriched with campaign/offer data from mapping

config.description: Fact table for AI intent engine frontend events, enriched with campaign/offer data from mapping

fact_ai_intent_engine.sqlContent:
-- Fact table for AI Intent Engine frontend events only
SELECT
  -- Timestamps
  TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(ae.timestamp_ms) AS event_ts,
  m.backend_ts,
  UNIX_MILLIS(m.backend_ts) AS timestamp_ms,
  
  -- Action mapping for funnel
  CASE
    WHEN ae.action IN ('show', 'view') THEN 'impression'
    WHEN ae.action = 'click' THEN 'click'
    WHEN ae.action = 'close' THEN 'dismissal'
    ELSE COALESCE(ae.action, 'unknown')
  END AS action,
  
  ae.action AS original_action,
  
  -- Core identifiers
  ae.request_id,
  ae.offer_id,
  
  -- From mapping
  m.campaign_id,
  m.merchant_id,
  m.device_id,
  
  -- User identifiers
  COALESCE(m.user_id, ae.user_id) AS user_id,
  ae.id AS anonymous_id,
  
  -- Source info
  m.intent_engine_type,
  'ai' AS source_type,
  
  -- Tenant fields
  ae.tenant_id,
  ae.tenant_client_id,
  ae.tenant_rewards_enabled,
  
  -- AI-specific fields
  ae.outbound_url,
  ae.surface,
  ae.is_rewards,
  ae.user_agent,
  ae.tag_id,
  
  -- From mapping
  m.req_offer,
  m.top_offer,
  m.offer_award,
  m.offer_content,
  m.offer_cta,
  m.campaign_boost,
  m.campaign_active,
  m.campaign_state,
  m.campaign_budget,
  m.offergroup_id,
  m.offergroup_min_bid,
  m.offergroup_max_bid,
  m.offergroup_bid_type

FROM `piedotorg-production.backend_analytics.ai_intent_engine_offer` ae
LEFT JOIN `piedotorg-production.fact_tables_dev.request_offer_campaign_mapping` m
  ON ae.request_id = m.request_id
  AND ae.offer_id = m.offer_id
  -- Match on tenant_client_id for AI offers
  AND ae.tenant_client_id = m.tenant_client_id

fact_ext_intent_engine_offer.name: fact_ext_intent_engine_offer
fact_ext_intent_engine_offer.description: Fact table for extension intent engine frontend events, enriched with campaign/offer data from mapping

config.description: Fact table for extension intent engine frontend events, enriched with campaign/offer data from mapping

fact_ext_intent_engine_offer.sqlContent:
-- Fact table for Extension Intent Engine frontend events only
SELECT
  -- Timestamps
  ee.timestamp AS event_ts,
  m.backend_ts,
  UNIX_MILLIS(m.backend_ts) AS timestamp_ms,
  
  -- Action mapping for funnel
  CASE
    WHEN ee.action IN ('show', 'view') THEN 'impression'
    WHEN ee.action = 'click' THEN 'click'
    WHEN ee.action = 'close' THEN 'dismissal'
    ELSE COALESCE(ee.action, 'unknown')
  END AS action,
  
  ee.action AS original_action,
  
  -- Core identifiers
  ee.request_id,
  ee.offer_id,
  
  -- From mapping
  m.campaign_id,
  m.merchant_id,
  m.device_id,
  
  -- User identifiers
  COALESCE(m.user_id, ee.user_id) AS user_id,
  ee.anonymous_id,
  
  -- Source info
  m.intent_engine_type,
  'ext' AS source_type,
  
  -- Extension-specific fields
  ee.surface,
  ee.is_rewards,
  ee.ext_tag_id,
  ee.platform,
  ee.referer_url,
  
  -- From mapping
  m.req_offer,
  m.top_offer,
  m.offer_award,
  m.offer_content,
  m.offer_cta,
  m.campaign_boost,
  m.campaign_active,
  m.campaign_state,
  m.campaign_budget,
  m.offergroup_id,
  m.offergroup_min_bid,
  m.offergroup_max_bid,
  m.offergroup_bid_type,
  
  -- Tenant fields from mapping (extension doesn't have its own tenant fields)
  m.tenant_id,
  m.tenant_client_id

FROM `piedotorg-production.shopping_extension_production.ext_intent_engine_offer` ee
LEFT JOIN `piedotorg-production.fact_tables_dev.request_offer_campaign_mapping` m
  ON ee.request_id = m.request_id
  AND ee.offer_id = m.offer_id

fact_intent_engine_offer_group_match.name: fact_intent_engine_offer_group_match
fact_intent_engine_offer_group_match.description: Backend offer matching events enriched with campaign data from mapping table

config.description: Backend offer matching events enriched with campaign data from mapping table

fact_intent_engine_offer_group_match.sqlContent:
-- Fact table for backend offer matching events
SELECT
  -- Timestamps
  TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(og.timestamp_ms) AS backend_ts,
  og.timestamp_ms,
  
  -- Action
  'consideration' AS action,
  
  -- Request level
  og.request_id,
  og.device_id,
  og.user_id,
  
  -- Offer level  
  og.offer_id,
  og.offer_content,
  og.offer_click_url,
  og.offer_cta,
  og.offer_award,
  og.offer_distribution,
  og.top_offer,
  
  -- From mapping
  m.campaign_id,
  m.campaign_boost,
  m.campaign_active,
  m.campaign_state,
  m.campaign_budget,
  
  -- Merchant level
  og.merchant_id,
  
  -- Offer group level
  og.offergroup_id,
  og.offergroup_min_bid,
  og.offergroup_max_bid,
  og.offergroup_bid_type,
  
  -- Tenant level
  og.tenant_id,
  og.tenant_client_id,
  
  -- Source info
  og.intent_engine_type,
  og.client,
  
  -- From mapping
  m.req_offer,
  
  -- Placement fields from mapping
  m.first_placement_template,
  m.first_placement_id,
  m.first_placement_match,
  m.first_placement_hostname,
  m.placement_count,
  
  -- Search context
  og.keywords

FROM `piedotorg-production.backend_analytics.intent_engine_offer_group_match` og
LEFT JOIN `piedotorg-production.fact_tables_dev.request_offer_campaign_mapping` m
  ON og.request_id = m.request_id
  AND og.offer_id = m.offer_id

fact_offer_attribution_models.name: fact_offer_attribution_models
fact_offer_attribution_models.description: Multi-model attribution table with 5 attribution models. Only includes transactions that successfully match at least one attribution model. Creates rows for ALL matching attribution models per transaction.

config.description: Multi-model attribution table with 5 attribution models. Only includes transactions that successfully match at least one attribution model. Creates rows for ALL matching attribution models per transaction.

fact_offer_attribution_models.sqlContent:
-- Multi-model attribution fact table
-- Creates one row per transaction per attribution model
WITH 
-- Base transaction data (AFFILIATE only)
transaction_base AS (
  SELECT
    DATETIME(created_coalesce_ts) AS transaction_ts,
    transactionId AS transaction_id,
    anonymous_id,
    userId AS user_id,
    CASE WHEN merchantId = 'logitechg' THEN 'logitech' ELSE merchantId END AS merchant_id,
    CASE 
      WHEN merchantId = 'verizon' AND IFNULL(externalSaleValue, 0) = 0 
      THEN externalCommission 
      ELSE externalSaleValue 
    END AS external_sale_value_cents,
    externalCommission AS external_commission_cents,
    millipoints,
    type AS transaction_type,
    ext_tag_id,
    campaignId AS direct_campaign_id -- For direct AD_OFFER transactions
  FROM `piedotorg-production.data_science_dev.transactions_expanded_view`
  WHERE type = 'AFFILIATE'  -- Only AFFILIATE transactions for attribution
    AND created_coalesce_ts IS NOT NULL
    AND merchantId IS NOT NULL
),

-- Get all click events from enriched int_fe_offer table
click_events AS (
  SELECT
    event_ts,
    campaign_id,
    merchant_id,
    offer_id,
    request_id,
    user_id,
    anonymous_id,
    device_id,
    source_type,
    intent_engine_type,
    req_offer,
    tenant_id,
    offer_award,
    offer_content,
    COALESCE(ext_tag_id, tag_id) AS ext_tag_id,  -- Use ext_tag_id for Extension, tag_id for AI
    first_placement_template,
    first_placement_id,
    first_placement_match,
    first_placement_hostname,
    placement_count
  FROM `piedotorg-production.fact_tables_dev.int_fe_offer`
  WHERE action = 'click'
    AND campaign_id IS NOT NULL
    AND merchant_id IS NOT NULL
),

-- Get all impression events from enriched int_fe_offer table
impression_events AS (
  SELECT
    event_ts,
    campaign_id,
    merchant_id,
    offer_id,
    request_id,
    user_id,
    anonymous_id,
    device_id,
    source_type,
    intent_engine_type,
    req_offer,
    tenant_id,
    offer_award,
    offer_content,
    COALESCE(ext_tag_id, tag_id) AS ext_tag_id,  -- Use ext_tag_id for Extension, tag_id for AI
    first_placement_template,
    first_placement_id,
    first_placement_match,
    first_placement_hostname,
    placement_count
  FROM `piedotorg-production.fact_tables_dev.int_fe_offer`
  WHERE action = 'impression'
    AND campaign_id IS NOT NULL
    AND merchant_id IS NOT NULL
),

-- 1. Tag ID Attribution (Deterministic)
tag_id_attribution AS (
  SELECT
    tb.transaction_ts,
    tb.transaction_id,
    'tag_id' AS attribution_model,
    TRUE AS attributed,
    'deterministic' AS attribution_confidence,
    
    -- Transaction details
    tb.merchant_id,
    ce.campaign_id,
    ce.offer_id,
    ce.request_id,
    ce.req_offer,
    
    -- User identifiers
    COALESCE(tb.user_id, ce.user_id) AS user_id,
    COALESCE(tb.anonymous_id, ce.anonymous_id) AS anonymous_id,
    ce.device_id,
    
    -- Transaction metrics
    tb.transaction_type,
    tb.external_sale_value_cents / 100 AS external_sale_value_dollars,
    tb.external_commission_cents / 100 AS external_commission_dollars,
    tb.millipoints,
    
    -- Attribution event details
    ce.event_ts AS attribution_event_ts,
    'click' AS attribution_event_action,
    ce.source_type AS attribution_event_source,
    NULL AS attribution_window_hours, -- Deterministic, no window
    DATETIME_DIFF(tb.transaction_ts, DATETIME(ce.event_ts), HOUR) AS time_to_conversion_hours,
    
    -- Tag-specific fields
    tb.ext_tag_id,
    
    -- Campaign metadata
    ce.intent_engine_type,
    ce.source_type,
    ce.tenant_id,
    ce.offer_award,
    ce.offer_content,
    
    -- Placement fields
    ce.first_placement_template,
    ce.first_placement_id,
    ce.first_placement_match,
    ce.first_placement_hostname,
    ce.placement_count
    
  FROM transaction_base tb
  INNER JOIN click_events ce
    ON tb.ext_tag_id = ce.ext_tag_id
    AND tb.merchant_id = ce.merchant_id
    AND (
      -- Primary: match on user_id if both have it
      (tb.user_id IS NOT NULL AND ce.user_id = tb.user_id)
      -- Fallback: match on anonymous_id if user_id is NULL
      OR (tb.user_id IS NULL AND tb.anonymous_id IS NOT NULL AND ce.anonymous_id = tb.anonymous_id)
    )
    AND DATETIME(ce.event_ts) <= tb.transaction_ts  -- Click must be before transaction
  WHERE tb.ext_tag_id IS NOT NULL
    AND ce.ext_tag_id IS NOT NULL
),

-- 2. Click 24h Last-Touch Attribution
click_24h_attribution AS (
  SELECT 
    transaction_ts,
    transaction_id,
    attribution_model,
    attributed,
    attribution_confidence,
    merchant_id,
    campaign_id,
    offer_id,
    request_id,
    req_offer,
    user_id,
    anonymous_id,
    device_id,
    transaction_type,
    external_sale_value_dollars,
    external_commission_dollars,
    millipoints,
    attribution_event_ts,
    attribution_event_action,
    attribution_event_source,
    attribution_window_hours,
    time_to_conversion_hours,
    ext_tag_id,
    intent_engine_type,
    source_type,
    tenant_id,
    offer_award,
    offer_content,
    first_placement_template,
    first_placement_id,
    first_placement_match,
    first_placement_hostname,
    placement_count
  FROM (
    SELECT
      tb.transaction_ts,
      tb.transaction_id,
      'click_24h' AS attribution_model,
      TRUE AS attributed,
      'last_touch' AS attribution_confidence,
      
      -- Transaction details
      tb.merchant_id,
      ce.campaign_id,
      ce.offer_id,
      ce.request_id,
      ce.req_offer,
      
      -- User identifiers
      COALESCE(tb.user_id, ce.user_id) AS user_id,
      COALESCE(tb.anonymous_id, ce.anonymous_id) AS anonymous_id,
      ce.device_id,
      
      -- Transaction metrics
      tb.transaction_type,
      tb.external_sale_value_cents / 100 AS external_sale_value_dollars,
      tb.external_commission_cents / 100 AS external_commission_dollars,
      tb.millipoints,
      
      -- Attribution event details
      ce.event_ts AS attribution_event_ts,
      'click' AS attribution_event_action,
      ce.source_type AS attribution_event_source,
      24 AS attribution_window_hours,
      DATETIME_DIFF(tb.transaction_ts, DATETIME(ce.event_ts), HOUR) AS time_to_conversion_hours,
      
      -- Tag-specific fields
      tb.ext_tag_id,
      
      -- Campaign metadata
      ce.intent_engine_type,
      ce.source_type,
      ce.tenant_id,
      ce.offer_award,
      ce.offer_content,
      
      -- Placement fields
      ce.first_placement_template,
      ce.first_placement_id,
      ce.first_placement_match,
      ce.first_placement_hostname,
      ce.placement_count,
      
      -- Rank for last-touch logic
      ROW_NUMBER() OVER (
        PARTITION BY tb.transaction_id 
        ORDER BY DATETIME(ce.event_ts) DESC
      ) AS click_rank
      
    FROM transaction_base tb
    INNER JOIN click_events ce
      ON tb.merchant_id = ce.merchant_id
      AND (
        -- Primary: match on user_id if both have it
        (tb.user_id IS NOT NULL AND ce.user_id = tb.user_id)
        -- Fallback: match on anonymous_id if user_id is NULL
        OR (tb.user_id IS NULL AND tb.anonymous_id IS NOT NULL AND ce.anonymous_id = tb.anonymous_id)
      )
      AND DATETIME(ce.event_ts) <= tb.transaction_ts
      AND DATETIME_DIFF(tb.transaction_ts, DATETIME(ce.event_ts), HOUR) <= 24
  )
  WHERE click_rank = 1  -- Last touch only
),

-- 3. Click 7d Last-Touch Attribution  
click_7d_attribution AS (
  SELECT 
    transaction_ts,
    transaction_id,
    attribution_model,
    attributed,
    attribution_confidence,
    merchant_id,
    campaign_id,
    offer_id,
    request_id,
    req_offer,
    user_id,
    anonymous_id,
    device_id,
    transaction_type,
    external_sale_value_dollars,
    external_commission_dollars,
    millipoints,
    attribution_event_ts,
    attribution_event_action,
    attribution_event_source,
    attribution_window_hours,
    time_to_conversion_hours,
    ext_tag_id,
    intent_engine_type,
    source_type,
    tenant_id,
    offer_award,
    offer_content,
    first_placement_template,
    first_placement_id,
    first_placement_match,
    first_placement_hostname,
    placement_count
  FROM (
    SELECT
      tb.transaction_ts,
      tb.transaction_id,
      'click_7d' AS attribution_model,
      TRUE AS attributed,
      'last_touch' AS attribution_confidence,
      
      -- Transaction details
      tb.merchant_id,
      ce.campaign_id,
      ce.offer_id,
      ce.request_id,
      ce.req_offer,
      
      -- User identifiers
      COALESCE(tb.user_id, ce.user_id) AS user_id,
      COALESCE(tb.anonymous_id, ce.anonymous_id) AS anonymous_id,
      ce.device_id,
      
      -- Transaction metrics
      tb.transaction_type,
      tb.external_sale_value_cents / 100 AS external_sale_value_dollars,
      tb.external_commission_cents / 100 AS external_commission_dollars,
      tb.millipoints,
      
      -- Attribution event details
      ce.event_ts AS attribution_event_ts,
      'click' AS attribution_event_action,
      ce.source_type AS attribution_event_source,
      168 AS attribution_window_hours, -- 7 days * 24 hours
      DATETIME_DIFF(tb.transaction_ts, DATETIME(ce.event_ts), HOUR) AS time_to_conversion_hours,
      
      -- Tag-specific fields
      tb.ext_tag_id,
      
      -- Campaign metadata
      ce.intent_engine_type,
      ce.source_type,
      ce.tenant_id,
      ce.offer_award,
      ce.offer_content,
      
      -- Placement fields
      ce.first_placement_template,
      ce.first_placement_id,
      ce.first_placement_match,
      ce.first_placement_hostname,
      ce.placement_count,
      
      -- Rank for last-touch logic
      ROW_NUMBER() OVER (
        PARTITION BY tb.transaction_id 
        ORDER BY DATETIME(ce.event_ts) DESC
      ) AS click_rank
      
    FROM transaction_base tb
    INNER JOIN click_events ce
      ON tb.merchant_id = ce.merchant_id
      AND (
        -- Primary: match on user_id if both have it
        (tb.user_id IS NOT NULL AND ce.user_id = tb.user_id)
        -- Fallback: match on anonymous_id if user_id is NULL
        OR (tb.user_id IS NULL AND tb.anonymous_id IS NOT NULL AND ce.anonymous_id = tb.anonymous_id)
      )
      AND DATETIME(ce.event_ts) <= tb.transaction_ts
      AND DATETIME_DIFF(tb.transaction_ts, DATETIME(ce.event_ts), HOUR) <= 168 -- 7 days
  )
  WHERE click_rank = 1  -- Last touch only
),

-- 4. View 24h Last-Touch Attribution (independent of click attribution)
view_24h_attribution AS (
  SELECT 
    transaction_ts,
    transaction_id,
    attribution_model,
    attributed,
    attribution_confidence,
    merchant_id,
    campaign_id,
    offer_id,
    request_id,
    req_offer,
    user_id,
    anonymous_id,
    device_id,
    transaction_type,
    external_sale_value_dollars,
    external_commission_dollars,
    millipoints,
    attribution_event_ts,
    attribution_event_action,
    attribution_event_source,
    attribution_window_hours,
    time_to_conversion_hours,
    ext_tag_id,
    intent_engine_type,
    source_type,
    tenant_id,
    offer_award,
    offer_content,
    first_placement_template,
    first_placement_id,
    first_placement_match,
    first_placement_hostname,
    placement_count
  FROM (
    SELECT
      tb.transaction_ts,
      tb.transaction_id,
      'view_24h' AS attribution_model,
      TRUE AS attributed,
      'view_assist' AS attribution_confidence,
      
      -- Transaction details
      tb.merchant_id,
      ie.campaign_id,
      ie.offer_id,
      ie.request_id,
      ie.req_offer,
      
      -- User identifiers
      COALESCE(tb.user_id, ie.user_id) AS user_id,
      COALESCE(tb.anonymous_id, ie.anonymous_id) AS anonymous_id,
      ie.device_id,
      
      -- Transaction metrics
      tb.transaction_type,
      tb.external_sale_value_cents / 100 AS external_sale_value_dollars,
      tb.external_commission_cents / 100 AS external_commission_dollars,
      tb.millipoints,
      
      -- Attribution event details
      ie.event_ts AS attribution_event_ts,
      'impression' AS attribution_event_action,
      ie.source_type AS attribution_event_source,
      24 AS attribution_window_hours,
      DATETIME_DIFF(tb.transaction_ts, DATETIME(ie.event_ts), HOUR) AS time_to_conversion_hours,
      
      -- Tag-specific fields
      tb.ext_tag_id,
      
      -- Campaign metadata
      ie.intent_engine_type,
      ie.source_type,
      ie.tenant_id,
      ie.offer_award,
      ie.offer_content,
      
      -- Placement fields
      ie.first_placement_template,
      ie.first_placement_id,
      ie.first_placement_match,
      ie.first_placement_hostname,
      ie.placement_count,
      
      -- Rank for last-touch logic
      ROW_NUMBER() OVER (
        PARTITION BY tb.transaction_id 
        ORDER BY DATETIME(ie.event_ts) DESC
      ) AS impression_rank
      
    FROM transaction_base tb
    INNER JOIN impression_events ie
      ON tb.merchant_id = ie.merchant_id
      AND (
        -- Primary: match on user_id if both have it
        (tb.user_id IS NOT NULL AND ie.user_id = tb.user_id)
        -- Fallback: match on anonymous_id if user_id is NULL
        OR (tb.user_id IS NULL AND tb.anonymous_id IS NOT NULL AND ie.anonymous_id = tb.anonymous_id)
      )
      AND DATETIME(ie.event_ts) <= tb.transaction_ts
      AND DATETIME_DIFF(tb.transaction_ts, DATETIME(ie.event_ts), HOUR) <= 24
  )
  WHERE impression_rank = 1  -- Last touch only
),

-- 5. View 7d Last-Touch Attribution (independent of click attribution)
view_7d_attribution AS (
  SELECT 
    transaction_ts,
    transaction_id,
    attribution_model,
    attributed,
    attribution_confidence,
    merchant_id,
    campaign_id,
    offer_id,
    request_id,
    req_offer,
    user_id,
    anonymous_id,
    device_id,
    transaction_type,
    external_sale_value_dollars,
    external_commission_dollars,
    millipoints,
    attribution_event_ts,
    attribution_event_action,
    attribution_event_source,
    attribution_window_hours,
    time_to_conversion_hours,
    ext_tag_id,
    intent_engine_type,
    source_type,
    tenant_id,
    offer_award,
    offer_content,
    first_placement_template,
    first_placement_id,
    first_placement_match,
    first_placement_hostname,
    placement_count
  FROM (
    SELECT
      tb.transaction_ts,
      tb.transaction_id,
      'view_7d' AS attribution_model,
      TRUE AS attributed,
      'view_assist' AS attribution_confidence,
      
      -- Transaction details
      tb.merchant_id,
      ie.campaign_id,
      ie.offer_id,
      ie.request_id,
      ie.req_offer,
      
      -- User identifiers
      COALESCE(tb.user_id, ie.user_id) AS user_id,
      COALESCE(tb.anonymous_id, ie.anonymous_id) AS anonymous_id,
      ie.device_id,
      
      -- Transaction metrics
      tb.transaction_type,
      tb.external_sale_value_cents / 100 AS external_sale_value_dollars,
      tb.external_commission_cents / 100 AS external_commission_dollars,
      tb.millipoints,
      
      -- Attribution event details
      ie.event_ts AS attribution_event_ts,
      'impression' AS attribution_event_action,
      ie.source_type AS attribution_event_source,
      168 AS attribution_window_hours, -- 7 days * 24 hours
      DATETIME_DIFF(tb.transaction_ts, DATETIME(ie.event_ts), HOUR) AS time_to_conversion_hours,
      
      -- Tag-specific fields
      tb.ext_tag_id,
      
      -- Campaign metadata
      ie.intent_engine_type,
      ie.source_type,
      ie.tenant_id,
      ie.offer_award,
      ie.offer_content,
      
      -- Placement fields
      ie.first_placement_template,
      ie.first_placement_id,
      ie.first_placement_match,
      ie.first_placement_hostname,
      ie.placement_count,
      
      -- Rank for last-touch logic
      ROW_NUMBER() OVER (
        PARTITION BY tb.transaction_id 
        ORDER BY DATETIME(ie.event_ts) DESC
      ) AS impression_rank
      
    FROM transaction_base tb
    INNER JOIN impression_events ie
      ON tb.merchant_id = ie.merchant_id
      AND (
        -- Primary: match on user_id if both have it
        (tb.user_id IS NOT NULL AND ie.user_id = tb.user_id)
        -- Fallback: match on anonymous_id if user_id is NULL
        OR (tb.user_id IS NULL AND tb.anonymous_id IS NOT NULL AND ie.anonymous_id = tb.anonymous_id)
      )
      AND DATETIME(ie.event_ts) <= tb.transaction_ts
      AND DATETIME_DIFF(tb.transaction_ts, DATETIME(ie.event_ts), HOUR) <= 168 -- 7 days
  )
  WHERE impression_rank = 1  -- Last touch only
)

-- Union all attribution models (only attributed transactions)
SELECT * FROM tag_id_attribution
UNION ALL
SELECT * FROM click_24h_attribution
UNION ALL  
SELECT * FROM click_7d_attribution
UNION ALL
SELECT * FROM view_24h_attribution
UNION ALL
SELECT * FROM view_7d_attribution

fact_web_intent_engine_offer.name: fact_web_intent_engine_offer
fact_web_intent_engine_offer.description: Fact table for web intent engine frontend events, enriched with campaign/offer data from mapping

config.description: Fact table for web intent engine frontend events, enriched with campaign/offer data from mapping

fact_web_intent_engine_offer.sqlContent:
-- Fact table for Web Intent Engine frontend events only
SELECT
  -- Timestamps
  we.timestamp AS event_ts,
  m.backend_ts,
  UNIX_MILLIS(m.backend_ts) AS timestamp_ms,
  
  -- Action mapping for funnel
  CASE
    WHEN we.action IN ('show', 'view') THEN 'impression'
    WHEN we.action = 'click' THEN 'click'
    WHEN we.action = 'close' THEN 'dismissal'
    ELSE COALESCE(we.action, 'unknown')
  END AS action,
  
  we.action AS original_action,
  
  -- Core identifiers
  we.request_id,
  we.offer_id,
  
  -- From mapping
  m.campaign_id,
  m.merchant_id,
  m.device_id,
  
  -- User identifiers
  COALESCE(m.user_id, we.user_id) AS user_id,
  we.anonymous_id,
  
  -- Source info
  m.intent_engine_type,
  'web' AS source_type,
  
  -- Web-specific fields
  we.surface,
  we.is_rewards,
  we.context_locale,
  we.context_device_type,
  
  -- From mapping
  m.req_offer,
  m.top_offer,
  m.offer_award,
  m.offer_content,
  m.offer_cta,
  m.campaign_boost,
  m.campaign_active,
  m.campaign_state,
  m.campaign_budget,
  m.offergroup_id,
  m.offergroup_min_bid,
  m.offergroup_max_bid,
  m.offergroup_bid_type,
  
  -- Tenant fields from mapping (web doesn't have its own tenant fields)
  m.tenant_id,
  m.tenant_client_id

FROM `piedotorg-production.website_production.web_intent_engine_offer` we
LEFT JOIN `piedotorg-production.fact_tables_dev.request_offer_campaign_mapping` m
  ON we.request_id = m.request_id
  AND we.offer_id = m.offer_id

int_fe_offer.name: int_fe_offer
int_fe_offer.description: Intermediate table that unions all frontend offer events (AI, Extension, Web) with backend mapping data. Single source of truth for enriched frontend events with campaign/offer metadata.

config.description: Intermediate table that unions all frontend offer events (AI, Extension, Web) with backend mapping data. Single source of truth for enriched frontend events with campaign/offer metadata.

int_fe_offer.sqlContent:
-- Unified frontend offer events with backend mapping enrichment
-- Combines all frontend sources (AI, Extension, Web) with request_offer_campaign_mapping
WITH unified_frontend AS (
  -- AI events
  SELECT
    request_id,
    offer_id,
    TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(timestamp_ms) AS event_ts,
    CASE
      WHEN action IN ('show', 'view') THEN 'impression'
      WHEN action = 'click' THEN 'click'
      WHEN action = 'close' THEN 'dismissal'
      ELSE COALESCE(action, 'unknown')
    END AS action,
    action AS original_action,
    user_id,
    id AS anonymous_id,
    'ai' AS source_type,
    surface,
    is_rewards,
    outbound_url,
    user_agent,
    tag_id,
    NULL AS ext_tag_id,
    tenant_id,
    tenant_client_id,
    tenant_rewards_enabled,
    NULL AS platform,
    NULL AS referer_url,
    NULL AS context_locale,
    NULL AS context_device_type,
    NULL AS context_app_name,
    NULL AS context_app_version,
    NULL AS context_browser,
    NULL AS context_browser_version,
    NULL AS context_device_id,
    NULL AS context_id,
    NULL AS context_ip,
    NULL AS context_library_name,
    NULL AS context_library_version,
    NULL AS context_os_os,
    NULL AS context_os_version,
    NULL AS context_os_name,
    NULL AS context_time_zone,
    NULL AS event,
    NULL AS event_text,
    NULL AS loaded_at,
    NULL AS original_timestamp,
    NULL AS received_at,
    NULL AS sent_at,
    NULL AS uuid_ts
  FROM `piedotorg-production.backend_analytics.ai_intent_engine_offer`
  
  UNION ALL
  
  -- Extension events
  SELECT
    request_id,
    offer_id,
    timestamp AS event_ts,
    CASE
      WHEN action IN ('show', 'view') THEN 'impression'
      WHEN action = 'click' THEN 'click'
      WHEN action = 'close' THEN 'dismissal'
      ELSE COALESCE(action, 'unknown')
    END AS action,
    action AS original_action,
    user_id,
    anonymous_id,
    'ext' AS source_type,
    surface,
    is_rewards,
    NULL AS outbound_url,
    context_user_agent AS user_agent,
    NULL AS tag_id,
    ext_tag_id,
    NULL AS tenant_id,
    NULL AS tenant_client_id,
    NULL AS tenant_rewards_enabled,
    platform,
    referer_url,
    context_locale,
    context_device_type,
    context_app_name,
    context_app_version,
    context_browser,
    context_browser_version,
    context_device_id,
    context_id,
    context_ip,
    context_library_name,
    context_library_version,
    context_os_os,
    context_os_version,
    context_os_name,
    context_time_zone,
    event,
    event_text,
    loaded_at,
    original_timestamp,
    received_at,
    sent_at,
    uuid_ts
  FROM `piedotorg-production.shopping_extension_production.ext_intent_engine_offer`
  
  UNION ALL
  
  -- Web events
  SELECT
    request_id,
    offer_id,
    timestamp AS event_ts,
    CASE
      WHEN action IN ('show', 'view') THEN 'impression'
      WHEN action = 'click' THEN 'click'
      WHEN action = 'close' THEN 'dismissal'
      ELSE COALESCE(action, 'unknown')
    END AS action,
    action AS original_action,
    user_id,
    anonymous_id,
    'web' AS source_type,
    surface,
    is_rewards,
    NULL AS outbound_url,
    context_user_agent AS user_agent,
    NULL AS tag_id,
    NULL AS ext_tag_id,
    NULL AS tenant_id,
    NULL AS tenant_client_id,
    NULL AS tenant_rewards_enabled,
    NULL AS platform,
    NULL AS referer_url,
    context_locale,
    context_device_type,
    NULL AS context_app_name,
    NULL AS context_app_version,
    NULL AS context_browser,
    NULL AS context_browser_version,
    NULL AS context_device_id,
    NULL AS context_id,
    NULL AS context_ip,
    NULL AS context_library_name,
    NULL AS context_library_version,
    NULL AS context_os_os,
    NULL AS context_os_version,
    NULL AS context_os_name,
    context_timezone AS context_time_zone,
    event,
    event_text,
    loaded_at,
    original_timestamp,
    received_at,
    sent_at,
    uuid_ts
  FROM `piedotorg-production.website_production.web_intent_engine_offer`
)

-- Join frontend events with backend mapping data
SELECT
  -- Core identifiers
  fe.request_id,
  fe.offer_id,
  
  -- Timestamps
  fe.event_ts,
  m.backend_ts,
  UNIX_MILLIS(m.backend_ts) AS timestamp_ms,
  
  -- Actions
  fe.action,
  fe.original_action,
  
  -- User identifiers
  COALESCE(m.user_id, fe.user_id) AS user_id,
  fe.anonymous_id,
  m.device_id,
  
  -- Source identification
  fe.source_type,
  m.intent_engine_type,
  fe.surface,
  fe.is_rewards,
  
  -- Campaign/Offer metadata from mapping
  m.campaign_id,
  m.merchant_id,
  m.req_offer,
  m.top_offer,
  m.offer_award,
  m.offer_content,
  m.offer_cta,
  m.campaign_boost,
  m.campaign_active,
  m.campaign_state,
  m.campaign_budget,
  m.offergroup_id,
  m.offergroup_min_bid,
  m.offergroup_max_bid,
  m.offergroup_bid_type,
  
  -- Placement fields from mapping
  m.first_placement_template,
  m.first_placement_id,
  m.first_placement_match,
  m.first_placement_hostname,
  m.placement_count,
  
  -- Search context from mapping
  m.keywords,
  
  -- Source-specific fields from frontend
  fe.outbound_url,
  fe.user_agent,
  fe.tag_id,
  fe.ext_tag_id,
  COALESCE(fe.tenant_id, m.tenant_id) AS tenant_id,
  COALESCE(fe.tenant_client_id, m.tenant_client_id) AS tenant_client_id,
  fe.tenant_rewards_enabled,
  fe.platform,
  fe.referer_url,
  fe.context_locale,
  fe.context_device_type,
  
  -- Context fields from frontend
  fe.context_app_name,
  fe.context_app_version,
  fe.context_browser,
  fe.context_browser_version,
  fe.context_device_id,
  fe.context_id,
  fe.context_ip,
  fe.context_library_name,
  fe.context_library_version,
  fe.context_os_os,
  fe.context_os_version,
  fe.context_os_name,
  fe.context_time_zone,
  fe.event,
  fe.event_text,
  fe.loaded_at,
  fe.original_timestamp,
  fe.received_at,
  fe.sent_at,
  fe.uuid_ts

FROM unified_frontend fe
LEFT JOIN `piedotorg-production.fact_tables_dev.request_offer_campaign_mapping` m
  ON fe.request_id = m.request_id
  AND fe.offer_id = m.offer_id
  -- Special matching for AI offers using tenant_client_id (handle NULL values)
  AND (fe.source_type != 'ai' OR COALESCE(fe.tenant_client_id, '') = COALESCE(m.tenant_client_id, ''))

request_offer_campaign_mapping.name: request_offer_campaign_mapping
request_offer_campaign_mapping.description: Mapping table that joins backend offer data with campaign and tenant information. Provides a clean reference for request-offer-campaign relationships without event duplication.

config.description: Mapping table that joins backend offer data with campaign and tenant information. Provides a clean reference for request-offer-campaign relationships without event duplication.

request_offer_campaign_mapping.sqlContent:
-- Request-Offer-Campaign mapping table
-- This provides a clean reference without event duplication
WITH backend_offers AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT
    -- Request level
    request_id,
    TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(timestamp_ms) AS backend_ts,
    device_id,
    user_id,
    placement_hashes,
    
    -- Offer level  
    offer_id,
    offer_content,
    offer_click_url,
    offer_cta,
    offer_award,
    offer_distribution,
    top_offer,
    
    -- Campaign level (from backend)
    campaign_id,
    campaign_boost,
    
    -- Merchant level
    merchant_id,
    
    -- Offer group level
    offergroup_id,
    offergroup_min_bid,
    offergroup_max_bid,
    offergroup_bid_type,
    
    -- Tenant level
    tenant_id,
    tenant_client_id,
    
    -- Source info
    intent_engine_type,
    client,
    
    -- Search context
    keywords,
    
    -- Composite key
    CONCAT(request_id, '|', offer_id) AS req_offer
    
  FROM `piedotorg-production.backend_analytics.intent_engine_offer_group_match`
  WHERE request_id IS NOT NULL
    AND offer_id IS NOT NULL
),

-- Get placement data
placement_data AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT
    placementHash,
    template,
    placementId,
    match,
    hostname,
    offerGroupId
  FROM `piedotorg-production.analytics_etl.campaigns_placements`
),

-- Get campaign metadata
campaign_data AS (
  SELECT 
    campaignId,
    merchantId,
    budget,
    TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(created) AS campaign_created_ts,
    COALESCE(TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(updated), TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(created)) AS campaign_updated_ts,
    CASE 
      WHEN endDate IS NOT NULL THEN TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(endDate)
      WHEN state IN ('PAUSED', 'ENDED', 'CANCELLED', 'ARCHIVED') THEN COALESCE(TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(updated), TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(created))
      ELSE NULL 
    END AS campaign_ended_ts,
    CASE WHEN state = 'ACTIVE' THEN true ELSE false END AS campaign_active,
    state AS campaign_state,
    CASE WHEN startDate IS NOT NULL THEN TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(startDate) ELSE TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(created) END AS campaign_start_ts
  FROM `piedotorg-production.analytics_etl.campaigns_campaigns`
)

SELECT
  -- Request level
  bo.request_id,
  bo.backend_ts,
  bo.device_id,
  bo.user_id,
  bo.placement_hashes,
  
  -- Offer level
  bo.offer_id,
  bo.offer_content,
  bo.offer_click_url,
  bo.offer_cta,
  bo.offer_award,
  bo.offer_distribution,
  bo.top_offer,
  
  -- Campaign level (merged)
  bo.campaign_id,
  bo.campaign_boost,
  cd.campaign_active,
  cd.campaign_state,
  cd.budget AS campaign_budget,
  cd.campaign_created_ts,
  cd.campaign_updated_ts,
  cd.campaign_ended_ts,
  cd.campaign_start_ts,
  
  -- Merchant level
  bo.merchant_id,
  
  -- Offer group level
  bo.offergroup_id,
  bo.offergroup_min_bid,
  bo.offergroup_max_bid,
  bo.offergroup_bid_type,
  
  -- Tenant level
  bo.tenant_id,
  bo.tenant_client_id,
  
  -- Source info
  bo.intent_engine_type,
  bo.client,
  
  -- Composite key
  bo.req_offer,
  
  -- Placement fields (from first matching placement)
  pd.template AS first_placement_template,
  pd.placementId AS first_placement_id,
  pd.match AS first_placement_match,
  pd.hostname AS first_placement_hostname,
  ARRAY_LENGTH(bo.placement_hashes) AS placement_count,
  
  -- Search context
  bo.keywords

FROM backend_offers bo
LEFT JOIN campaign_data cd
  ON bo.campaign_id = cd.campaignId
  AND bo.merchant_id = cd.merchantId
  -- Only join campaigns that were active during the offer
  AND DATE(bo.backend_ts) >= DATE(cd.campaign_start_ts)
--  AND (cd.campaign_ended_ts IS NULL OR DATE(bo.backend_ts) <= DATE(cd.campaign_ended_ts))
LEFT JOIN placement_data pd
  ON pd.placementHash = bo.placement_hashes[SAFE_OFFSET(0)]  -- Join on first placement hash
  AND pd.offerGroupId = bo.offergroup_id

all_campaigns.name: all_campaigns
all_campaigns.description: Consolidated campaign data from all marketing channels including paid campaigns, influencer spend, and manual CPM data

config.description: Consolidated campaign data from all marketing channels including paid campaigns, influencer spend, and manual CPM data

all_campaigns.sqlContent:
WITH
  
  influencer_data AS (
    SELECT
      influencer_name,
      vanity_url,
      puci,
      cost,
      SAFE_CAST(start_date AS DATE) start_date,
      amortize_days
    FROM `piedotorg-production.growth_marketing.dpr_manual_spend`
  ),
  
  publisher_cpms AS (
    SELECT 
      NET.REG_DOMAIN(website) AS domain,
      concept,
      puci,
      cpm,
      SAFE_CAST(start_date AS DATE) start_date,
      SAFE_CAST(end_date AS DATE) end_date
    FROM `piedotorg-production.growth_marketing.dpr_manual_publisher_cpms`
    where puci is not null
  ),
  
  expanded_data AS (
    SELECT
      influencer_name,
      vanity_url,
      puci,
      cost,
      amortize_days,
      DATE_ADD(start_date, INTERVAL day_offset DAY) AS date,
      cost / amortize_days AS daily_cost
    FROM
      influencer_data,
      UNNEST(GENERATE_ARRAY(0, amortize_days - 1)) AS day_offset
  ),
  
  influencer_daily AS (
    SELECT
      date,
      'infl' AS source,
      influencer_name AS campaign_name,
      puci,
      CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS ad_set_name,
      NULL AS impressions,
      NULL AS clicks,
      daily_cost AS cost,
      NULL AS conversions_app_installs,
      NULL AS conversions_ext_installs
    FROM expanded_data
  ),
  
  apple_campaigns AS (
    SELECT
      date,
      'apple' AS source,
      campaign_name,
      puci,
      CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS ad_set_name,
      impressions,
      clicks,
      cost,
      conversions_app_installs,
      NULL AS conversions_ext_installs
    FROM `piedotorg-production.growth_marketing.apple_search_campaign_funnel`
  ),
  
  google_campaigns AS (
    SELECT
      date,
      'google' AS source,
      campaign_name,
      -- temp hack to get pmax
      IF(SPLIT(campaign_name, '_')[SAFE_OFFSET(3)] IN ("pmax", "pmax-desktop", "pmax-mobile"), 
         campaign_name, puci) AS puci,
      CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS ad_set_name,
      impressions,
      clicks,
      cost,
      NULL AS conversions_app_installs,
      conversions_ext_installs
    FROM `piedotorg-production.growth_marketing.google_campaign_funnel`
  ),
  
  msft_campaigns AS (
    SELECT
      date,
      'microsoft' AS source,
      campaign_name,
      ad_group_name AS puci,
      ad_group_name AS ad_set_name,
      impressions,
      clicks,
      cost,
      NULL AS conversions_app_installs,
      conversions AS conversions_ext_installs
    FROM `piedotorg-production.growth_marketing.msft_campaign_funnel`
  ),
  
  amazon_campaigns AS (
    SELECT
      date,
      'amazon_dsp' AS source,
      campaign_name,
      ad_name AS puci,
      ad_group_name AS ad_set_name,
      impressions,
      clicks,
      cost,
      NULL AS conversions_app_installs,
      conversions AS conversions_ext_installs
    FROM `piedotorg-production.growth_marketing.amazon_dsp_campaign_funnel`
  ),
  
  meta_campaigns AS (
    SELECT
      date,
      'meta' AS source,
      campaign_name,
      puci,
      ad_set_name,
      impressions,
      clicks,
      costs AS cost,
      NULL AS conversions_app_installs,
      NULL AS conversions_ext_installs
    FROM `piedotorg-production.growth_marketing.meta_campaign_funnel`
  ),
  
  tik_tok_campaigns AS (
    SELECT
      date,
      'tiktok' AS source,
      campaign_name,
      puci,
      ad_group_name AS ad_set_name,
      impressions,
      clicks,
      cost,
      conversions_app_installs,
      NULL AS conversions_ext_installs
    FROM `piedotorg-production.growth_marketing.tiktok_ads_campaign_funnel`
  ),
  
  bizdev AS (
    SELECT
      date,
      'bizdev_manual' AS source,
      CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS campaign_name,
      puci,
      CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS ad_set_name,
      NULL AS impressions,
      NULL AS clicks,
      SUM(payout_total) AS cost,
      NULL AS conversions_app_installs,
      NULL AS conversions_ext_installs
    FROM `piedotorg-production.growth_marketing_dev.bizdev_spend`
    WHERE cpi > 0  -- Only include countries with actual CPI rates for cost calculations
    GROUP BY date, puci
  ),
  
  impression_cost AS (
    -- Step 1: count events per pixel and cap at 2
    WITH pixel_daily AS (
      SELECT
        DATE(TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(timestamp), 'America/Los_Angeles') AS date,
        NET.REG_DOMAIN(url) AS domain,
        pixel_id,
        COUNT(*) AS ev_count
      FROM `piedotorg-production.backend_analytics.pixel`
      WHERE source = 'wall_view'
      GROUP BY date, domain, pixel_id
    )
    -- Step 2: sum the capped impressions per day/domain
    SELECT
      a.date,
      'manual_cpms' AS source,
      CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS campaign_name,
      publisher_cpms.puci,
      CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS ad_set_name,
      a.pxid_impressions AS impressions,
      NULL AS clicks,
      a.pxid_impressions *
        IF((a.date BETWEEN publisher_cpms.start_date AND publisher_cpms.end_date)
           OR (a.date >= publisher_cpms.start_date AND publisher_cpms.end_date IS NULL),
           publisher_cpms.cpm, 0) / 1000 AS cost,
      NULL AS conversions_app_installs,
      NULL AS conversions_ext_installs
    FROM (
      SELECT
        date,
        domain,
        SUM(LEAST(ev_count, 2)) AS pxid_impressions
      FROM pixel_daily
      GROUP BY date, domain
    ) AS a
    LEFT JOIN publisher_cpms ON a.domain = publisher_cpms.domain
    WHERE publisher_cpms.puci IS NOT NULL
  ),
  
  -- Combine all campaign sources
  all_campaigns_union AS (
    SELECT * FROM apple_campaigns
    UNION ALL
    SELECT * FROM google_campaigns
    UNION ALL
    SELECT * FROM amazon_campaigns
    UNION ALL
    SELECT * FROM meta_campaigns
    UNION ALL
    SELECT * FROM tik_tok_campaigns
    UNION ALL
    SELECT * FROM influencer_daily
    UNION ALL
    SELECT * FROM bizdev
    UNION ALL
    SELECT * FROM msft_campaigns 
    UNION ALL
    SELECT * FROM impression_cost
  ),
  
  -- Add PUCI parsing and aggregation to prevent duplicates
  final AS (
    SELECT
      date,
      source,
      campaign_name,
      puci,
      ad_set_name,
      SUM(impressions) AS impressions,
      SUM(clicks) AS clicks,
      SUM(cost) AS cost,
      SUM(conversions_app_installs) AS conversions_app_installs,
      SUM(conversions_ext_installs) AS conversions_ext_installs,
      SPLIT(puci, '_')[SAFE_OFFSET(2)] AS puci_geo,
      SPLIT(puci, '_')[SAFE_OFFSET(3)] AS placement,
      `piedotorg-production.data_science.TopN`(puci, '_', 16) AS puci_16,
      `piedotorg-production.data_science.TopN`(puci, '_', 8) AS puci_8
    FROM all_campaigns_union
    GROUP BY date, source, campaign_name, puci, ad_set_name, puci_geo, placement, puci_16, puci_8
  )

SELECT
  final.*,
  mapping.platform,
  mapping.media_source,
  mapping.spend_type,
  mapping.funnel,
  mapping.device_target
FROM final
LEFT JOIN `piedotorg-production.growth_marketing.dpr_manual_mapping` mapping
  USING (placement)

bizdev_spend.name: bizdev_spend
bizdev_spend.description: Business development spend calculations based on CPI rates and extension install data

config.description: Business development spend calculations based on CPI rates and extension install data

bizdev_spend.sqlContent:
WITH
  cpi_manual AS (
    SELECT
      geo,
      placement,
      puci,
      cpi, 
      CAST(start_date AS DATE) start_date,
      ifnull(CAST(end_date AS DATE), current_date("America/Los_Angeles")) end_date
    FROM
      `piedotorg-production.growth_marketing.dpr_manual_external`
  ),
  
  adblock_installs AS (
    SELECT
      DATE(timestamp, 'America/Los_Angeles') AS date,
      context_locale,
      anonymous_id AS ext_anonymous_id,
      extension_type,
      context_country,
      puci, -- this accounts for pre 1.1.1 pucis in the installs_base logic
      placement,
      product,
      CASE
        WHEN context_country IS NOT NULL THEN context_country
        WHEN context_locale IN ('en-US', 'es-US') THEN 'US'
        WHEN context_locale IN ('en-AU') THEN 'AU'
        WHEN context_locale IN ('en-CA', 'fr-CA') THEN 'CA'
        WHEN context_locale IN ('en-GB', 'en-GB-oxendict', 'en') THEN 'GB'
        WHEN context_locale IN ('en-DE', 'de', 'de-DE') THEN 'DE'
        ELSE "OTHER_LOCALE" -- this is for pre 2/25 context_country being added
      END AS country_coalesce
    FROM `piedotorg-production.growth_marketing.installs_base_w_reinstall`
    WHERE
      extension_type IN ('adblock', 'adblocker') 
      AND IFNULL(NOT is_synced_install, is_first_install)
      AND puci IS NOT NULL
      AND placement IS NOT NULL
      AND product IS NOT NULL
  ),
  
  base AS (
    SELECT
      date,
      adblock_installs.placement,
      product,
      adblock_installs.puci,
      country_coalesce,
      MAX(IF(date BETWEEN start_date AND end_date, cpi, 0)) as cpi, -- get the actual CPI rate
      FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', date) AS year_month,
      COUNT(DISTINCT ext_anonymous_id) AS extension_install_count
    FROM
      adblock_installs
    LEFT JOIN
      cpi_manual
    ON
      cpi_manual.geo = adblock_installs.country_coalesce
      AND adblock_installs.placement = cpi_manual.placement
      AND ((cpi_manual.puci IS NOT NULL AND adblock_installs.puci = cpi_manual.puci)
           OR (cpi_manual.puci IS NULL))
    GROUP BY date, placement, product, puci, country_coalesce, year_month
  )

SELECT
  date,
  country_coalesce,
  placement,
  puci,
  product,
  extension_install_count,
  cpi,
  cpi AS payout_amount,
  cpi * extension_install_count AS payout_total,
  year_month
FROM base

offer_campaign_ir_base.name: offer_campaign_ir_base
offer_campaign_ir_base.description: Base table for offer campaign metrics using GROUPING SETS for multi-grain aggregation - single source of truth. In dev environments, filters to last 7 days of offer data and 30 days of transaction data for faster processing. Fixed Cartesian product issue. Includes consideration metrics for AI offers.

config.description: Base table for offer campaign metrics using GROUPING SETS for multi-grain aggregation - single source of truth. In dev environments, filters to last 7 days of offer data and 30 days of transaction data for faster processing. Fixed Cartesian product issue. Includes consideration metrics for AI offers.

offer_campaign_ir_base.sqlContent:
-- Base Campaign Analytics using ROLLUP/GROUPING SETS for multi-grain aggregation
WITH 
-- Base data from offer_expanded_view
offer_base AS (
  SELECT
    DATETIME(oe.ts) AS ts,
    DATETIME_TRUNC(DATETIME(oe.ts), HOUR) AS dt_hour,
    oe.campaign_id,
    oe.merchant_id,
    oe.anonymous_id,
    oe.user_id,
    oe.request_id,
    oe.offer_id,
    oe.action,
    oe.surface,
    oe.offer_presented,
    oe.source_type,
    oe.intent_engine_type,
    oe.req_offer
  FROM `piedotorg-production.intent_engine_dev.offer_expanded_view` oe
  WHERE oe.campaign_id IS NOT NULL
    AND oe.merchant_id IS NOT NULL
    -- Include both frontend events (with actions) and backend-only events (considerations without frontend)
    AND (oe.action IN ('show', 'view', 'click', 'close', 'redeem') OR oe.action IS NULL)
    AND DATE(oe.ts) >= '1970-01-01'
),

-- Campaign metadata
campaign_data AS (
  SELECT 
    campaignId,
    budget,
    merchantId,
    DATETIME(TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(created)) AS campaign_created_ts,
    DATETIME(COALESCE(TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(updated), TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(created))) AS campaign_updated_ts,
    CASE 
      WHEN endDate IS NOT NULL THEN DATETIME(TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(endDate))
      WHEN state IN ('PAUSED', 'ENDED', 'CANCELLED', 'ARCHIVED') THEN DATETIME(COALESCE(TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(updated), TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(created)))
      ELSE NULL 
    END AS campaign_ended_ts,
    CASE WHEN state = 'ACTIVE' THEN true ELSE false END AS active,
    state AS campaign_state,
    CASE WHEN startDate IS NOT NULL THEN DATETIME(TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(startDate)) ELSE DATETIME(TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(created)) END AS campaign_start_ts
  FROM `piedotorg-production.analytics_etl.campaigns_campaigns`
),

-- Transaction data for affiliate attribution
transactions_base AS (
  SELECT
    DATETIME(created_coalesce_ts) AS created_ts,
    transactionId,
    anonymous_id,
    CASE 
      WHEN merchantId = 'verizon' AND IFNULL(externalSaleValue, 0) = 0 
      THEN externalCommission 
      ELSE externalSaleValue 
    END AS externalSaleValue,
    externalCommission,
    CASE WHEN merchantId = 'logitechg' THEN 'logitech' ELSE merchantId END AS merchantId,
    adOfferId,
    campaignId AS adoffercampaignId,
    subsrc,
    userId,
    type,
    balance_burned_millipoints,
    millipoints,
    LOWER(adOfferType) AS transaction_type
  FROM `piedotorg-production.data_science_dev.transactions_expanded_view`
  WHERE (
    -- AD_OFFER transactions need campaignId (direct offer claims)
    (type = 'AD_OFFER' AND campaignId IS NOT NULL)
    OR 
    -- AFFILIATE transactions can have NULL campaignId (attribution-based)
    (type = 'AFFILIATE')
  )
  AND DATE(created_coalesce_ts) >= '1970-01-01'
),

-- Direct affiliate transactions - DAILY ONLY (no hourly breakdown needed)
direct_transactions AS (
  SELECT
    DATETIME_TRUNC(aff.created_ts, DAY) AS dt_day,
    aff.adoffercampaignId AS campaign_id,
    aff.merchantId AS merchant_id,
    COUNT(*) AS offer_aff_trx,
    COUNT(DISTINCT aff.anonymous_id) AS trx_anonymous_ids,
    COUNT(DISTINCT aff.userId) AS trx_devices, -- Using userId as device proxy
    COUNT(DISTINCT aff.transactionId) AS dist_trx_offer_aff,
    SUM(aff.externalSaleValue) / 100 AS gmv_dollars,
    SUM(aff.externalCommission) / 100 AS commission_dollars
  FROM transactions_base aff
  INNER JOIN transactions_base offer 
    ON aff.userId = offer.userId 
    AND aff.merchantId = offer.merchantId
    AND aff.created_ts BETWEEN offer.created_ts AND COALESCE(
      -- Use campaign end logic similar to old version
      DATETIME_ADD(offer.created_ts, INTERVAL 30 DAY), 
      CURRENT_DATETIME()
    )
  WHERE aff.type = 'AFFILIATE'
    AND offer.type = 'AD_OFFER'
    AND aff.subsrc IN ('pie_offer_search', 'pie_offer_retargeting', 'pie_offer_login_search')
  GROUP BY dt_day, campaign_id, merchant_id
),

-- Budget and awards tracking - DAILY ONLY (no hourly breakdown needed)
budget_awards AS (
  SELECT
    DATETIME_TRUNC(created_ts, DAY) AS dt_day,
    adoffercampaignId AS campaign_id,
    merchantId AS merchant_id,
    SUM(millipoints) / 100000 AS dollars_awarded,
    SUM(balance_burned_millipoints) / 1000 / 100 AS budget_usedindollars,
    SUM(balance_burned_millipoints) AS budget_usedinmillipoints,
    SUM(millipoints) AS millipoints_awarded,
    COUNT(*) AS unique_awards,
    COUNT(DISTINCT userId) AS awarded_devices,
    COUNT(DISTINCT anonymous_id) AS awarded_anonymous_ids,
    ARRAY_AGG(DISTINCT adOfferId IGNORE NULLS) AS award_offer_ids
  FROM transactions_base
  WHERE type = 'AD_OFFER'
    AND adoffercampaignId IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY dt_day, campaign_id, merchant_id
),

-- Click attribution 24h - affiliate transactions attributed to click events within 24h
click_attribution_24h AS (
  SELECT
    DATETIME_TRUNC(aff.created_ts, HOUR) AS dt_hour,
    DATETIME_TRUNC(aff.created_ts, DAY) AS dt_day,
    click_events.campaign_id,
    aff.merchantId AS merchant_id,
    COUNT(*) AS click_transactions_24h,
    COUNT(DISTINCT aff.anonymous_id) AS click_anonymous_ids_24h,
    COUNT(DISTINCT aff.userId) AS click_devices_24h,
    SUM(aff.externalSaleValue) / 100 AS click_gmv_dollars_24h,
    SUM(aff.externalCommission) / 100 AS click_commission_dollars_24h
  FROM transactions_base aff
  INNER JOIN (
    -- Get click events from our offer_base data
    SELECT DISTINCT
      anonymous_id,
      campaign_id,
      merchant_id,
      ts
    FROM offer_base
    WHERE action = 'click'
      AND campaign_id IS NOT NULL
  ) click_events
    ON aff.anonymous_id = click_events.anonymous_id
    AND aff.merchantId = click_events.merchant_id
    AND DATETIME_DIFF(aff.created_ts, click_events.ts, HOUR) BETWEEN 0 AND 24
    AND aff.created_ts >= click_events.ts
  WHERE aff.type = 'AFFILIATE'
  GROUP BY dt_hour, dt_day, campaign_id, merchant_id
),

-- Click attribution 7d - affiliate transactions attributed to click events within 7d
click_attribution_7d AS (
  SELECT
    DATETIME_TRUNC(aff.created_ts, HOUR) AS dt_hour,
    DATETIME_TRUNC(aff.created_ts, DAY) AS dt_day,
    click_events.campaign_id,
    aff.merchantId AS merchant_id,
    COUNT(*) AS click_transactions_7d,
    COUNT(DISTINCT aff.anonymous_id) AS click_anonymous_ids_7d,
    COUNT(DISTINCT aff.userId) AS click_devices_7d,
    SUM(aff.externalSaleValue) / 100 AS click_gmv_dollars_7d,
    SUM(aff.externalCommission) / 100 AS click_commission_dollars_7d
  FROM transactions_base aff
  INNER JOIN (
    -- Get click events from our offer_base data
    SELECT DISTINCT
      anonymous_id,
      campaign_id,
      merchant_id,
      ts
    FROM offer_base
    WHERE action = 'click'
      AND campaign_id IS NOT NULL
  ) click_events
    ON aff.anonymous_id = click_events.anonymous_id
    AND aff.merchantId = click_events.merchant_id
    AND DATETIME_DIFF(aff.created_ts, click_events.ts, DAY) BETWEEN 0 AND 7
    AND aff.created_ts >= click_events.ts
  WHERE aff.type = 'AFFILIATE'
  GROUP BY dt_hour, dt_day, campaign_id, merchant_id
),

-- View attribution 24h - affiliate transactions attributed to show events within 24h
view_attribution_24h AS (
  SELECT
    DATETIME_TRUNC(aff.created_ts, HOUR) AS dt_hour,
    DATETIME_TRUNC(aff.created_ts, DAY) AS dt_day,
    view_events.campaign_id,
    aff.merchantId AS merchant_id,
    COUNT(*) AS view_transactions_24h,
    COUNT(DISTINCT aff.anonymous_id) AS view_anonymous_ids_24h,
    COUNT(DISTINCT aff.userId) AS view_devices_24h,
    SUM(aff.externalSaleValue) / 100 AS view_gmv_dollars_24h,
    SUM(aff.externalCommission) / 100 AS view_commission_dollars_24h
  FROM transactions_base aff
  INNER JOIN (
    -- Get show events from our offer_base data
    SELECT DISTINCT
      anonymous_id,
      campaign_id,
      merchant_id,
      ts
    FROM offer_base
    WHERE action IN ('show', 'view')
      AND campaign_id IS NOT NULL
  ) view_events
    ON aff.anonymous_id = view_events.anonymous_id
    AND aff.merchantId = view_events.merchant_id
    AND DATETIME_DIFF(aff.created_ts, view_events.ts, HOUR) BETWEEN 0 AND 24
    AND aff.created_ts >= view_events.ts
  WHERE aff.type = 'AFFILIATE'
  GROUP BY dt_hour, dt_day, campaign_id, merchant_id
),

-- View attribution 7d - affiliate transactions attributed to show events within 7d
view_attribution_7d AS (
  SELECT
    DATETIME_TRUNC(aff.created_ts, HOUR) AS dt_hour,
    DATETIME_TRUNC(aff.created_ts, DAY) AS dt_day,
    view_events.campaign_id,
    aff.merchantId AS merchant_id,
    COUNT(*) AS view_transactions_7d,
    COUNT(DISTINCT aff.anonymous_id) AS view_anonymous_ids_7d,
    COUNT(DISTINCT aff.userId) AS view_devices_7d,
    SUM(aff.externalSaleValue) / 100 AS view_gmv_dollars_7d,
    SUM(aff.externalCommission) / 100 AS view_commission_dollars_7d
  FROM transactions_base aff
  INNER JOIN (
    -- Get show events from our offer_base data
    SELECT DISTINCT
      anonymous_id,
      campaign_id,
      merchant_id,
      ts
    FROM offer_base
    WHERE action IN ('show', 'view')
      AND campaign_id IS NOT NULL
  ) view_events
    ON aff.anonymous_id = view_events.anonymous_id
    AND aff.merchantId = view_events.merchant_id
    AND DATETIME_DIFF(aff.created_ts, view_events.ts, DAY) BETWEEN 0 AND 7
    AND aff.created_ts >= view_events.ts
  WHERE aff.type = 'AFFILIATE'
  GROUP BY dt_hour, dt_day, campaign_id, merchant_id
),

-- Checkout detection base data
checkout_detection_base AS (
  SELECT
    DATETIME(timestamp) AS detected_ts,
    anonymous_id,
    merchant_id,
    final_score
  FROM `piedotorg-production.backend_analytics.checkout_detection`
  WHERE classified_as_checkout = true
    AND anonymous_id IS NOT NULL
    AND merchant_id IS NOT NULL
),

-- Checkout attribution 24h - checkout detections attributed to click events within 24h
checkout_attribution_24h AS (
  SELECT
    DATETIME_TRUNC(cd.detected_ts, HOUR) AS dt_hour,
    DATETIME_TRUNC(cd.detected_ts, DAY) AS dt_day,
    click_events.campaign_id,
    cd.merchant_id,
    COUNT(*) AS checkout_detections_24h,
    COUNT(DISTINCT cd.anonymous_id) AS checkout_anonymous_ids_24h,
    AVG(cd.final_score) AS avg_checkout_score_24h
  FROM checkout_detection_base cd
  INNER JOIN (
    -- Get click events from our offer_base data
    SELECT DISTINCT
      anonymous_id,
      campaign_id,
      merchant_id,
      ts
    FROM offer_base
    WHERE action = 'click'
      AND campaign_id IS NOT NULL
  ) click_events
    ON cd.anonymous_id = click_events.anonymous_id
    AND cd.merchant_id = click_events.merchant_id
    AND DATETIME_DIFF(cd.detected_ts, click_events.ts, HOUR) BETWEEN 0 AND 24
    AND cd.detected_ts >= click_events.ts
  GROUP BY dt_hour, dt_day, campaign_id, merchant_id
),

-- Checkout attribution 7d - checkout detections attributed to click events within 7d
checkout_attribution_7d AS (
  SELECT
    DATETIME_TRUNC(cd.detected_ts, HOUR) AS dt_hour,
    DATETIME_TRUNC(cd.detected_ts, DAY) AS dt_day,
    click_events.campaign_id,
    cd.merchant_id,
    COUNT(*) AS checkout_detections_7d,
    COUNT(DISTINCT cd.anonymous_id) AS checkout_anonymous_ids_7d,
    AVG(cd.final_score) AS avg_checkout_score_7d
  FROM checkout_detection_base cd
  INNER JOIN (
    -- Get click events from our offer_base data
    SELECT DISTINCT
      anonymous_id,
      campaign_id,
      merchant_id,
      ts
    FROM offer_base
    WHERE action = 'click'
      AND campaign_id IS NOT NULL
  ) click_events
    ON cd.anonymous_id = click_events.anonymous_id
    AND cd.merchant_id = click_events.merchant_id
    AND DATETIME_DIFF(cd.detected_ts, click_events.ts, DAY) BETWEEN 0 AND 7
    AND cd.detected_ts >= click_events.ts
  GROUP BY dt_hour, dt_day, campaign_id, merchant_id
),

-- Placement metrics - using GROUPING SETS for consistent multi-grain aggregation
placement_metrics AS (
  SELECT
    -- Time dimension using GROUPING SETS approach
    COALESCE(hour_grain, day_grain) AS dt_time,
    
    -- Period indicator using GROUPING function
    CASE 
      WHEN GROUPING(hour_grain) = 0 THEN 'hour'
      WHEN GROUPING(day_grain) = 0 THEN 'day'
    END AS grain,
    
    campaign_id,
    merchant_id,
    COUNT(*) AS total_placements,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CONCAT(campaign_id, '-', merchant_id, '-', anonymous_id, '-', DATE(ts))) AS total_placement_hashes,
    COUNT(DISTINCT anonymous_id) AS total_audience_ids
  FROM (
    SELECT 
      DATETIME_TRUNC(ts, HOUR) AS hour_grain,
      DATETIME_TRUNC(ts, DAY) AS day_grain,
      campaign_id,
      merchant_id,
      anonymous_id,
      ts
    FROM offer_base
    WHERE campaign_id IS NOT NULL AND merchant_id IS NOT NULL
  )
  
  -- GROUPING SETS for both hourly and daily aggregation
  GROUP BY GROUPING SETS (
    (hour_grain, campaign_id, merchant_id),   -- Hourly grain
    (day_grain, campaign_id, merchant_id)     -- Daily grain  
  )
),

-- User balance and claims tracking - DAILY ONLY (no hourly breakdown needed)
balance_claims AS (
  SELECT
    DATETIME_TRUNC(created_ts, DAY) AS dt_day,
    adoffercampaignId AS campaign_id,
    merchantId AS merchant_id,
    -- Claims metrics (AD_OFFER transactions are essentially claims)
    COUNT(*) AS total_claims,
    COUNT(DISTINCT userId) AS claimed_devices,
    COUNT(DISTINCT anonymous_id) AS claimed_anonymous_ids,
    ARRAY_AGG(DISTINCT adOfferId IGNORE NULLS) AS claimed_offer_ids,
    -- Balance burned metrics (assume millipoints represent burned balance)
    SUM(millipoints) AS user_balance_burned_millipoints,
    SUM(millipoints) / 100000 AS user_balance_burned_millipoints_dollars
  FROM transactions_base
  WHERE type = 'AD_OFFER'
    AND adoffercampaignId IS NOT NULL
    AND millipoints > 0  -- Only count actual balance usage
  GROUP BY dt_day, campaign_id, merchant_id
),

-- Prepare time dimensions for GROUPING SETS
time_dimensions AS (
  SELECT
    ob.*,
    cd.campaign_created_ts,
    cd.campaign_updated_ts,
    cd.campaign_ended_ts,
    cd.active,
    cd.budget,
    cd.campaign_state,
    cd.campaign_start_ts,
    -- Pre-calculate both time grains
    ob.dt_hour AS hour_grain,
    DATETIME_TRUNC(ob.dt_hour, DAY) AS day_grain
  FROM offer_base ob
  LEFT JOIN campaign_data cd ON ob.campaign_id = cd.campaignId AND ob.merchant_id = cd.merchantId
),

-- Multi-grain aggregation using GROUPING SETS approach with transaction data
multi_grain_base AS (
  SELECT
    -- Time dimension - use COALESCE to handle NULL from GROUPING SETS
    COALESCE(td.hour_grain, td.day_grain) AS dt_hour,
    
    -- Period indicator using GROUPING function (used for join logic)
    CASE 
      WHEN GROUPING(td.hour_grain) = 0 THEN 'hour'
      WHEN GROUPING(td.day_grain) = 0 THEN 'day'
    END AS period,
    
    td.campaign_id,
    td.merchant_id,
    td.source_type,
    td.intent_engine_type,
    
    -- Campaign metadata
    ANY_VALUE(td.campaign_created_ts) AS campaign_created_ts,
    ANY_VALUE(td.campaign_updated_ts) AS campaign_updated_ts,
    ANY_VALUE(td.campaign_ended_ts) AS campaign_ended_ts,
    ANY_VALUE(td.active) AS campaign_active,
    ANY_VALUE(td.budget) AS campaign_budget,
    ANY_VALUE(td.campaign_state) AS campaign_state,
    ANY_VALUE(td.campaign_start_ts) AS campaign_start_ts,
    
    CAST([] AS ARRAY<STRUCT<offergroup_id STRING>>) AS offergroups,
    
    -- Core engagement metrics with proper COUNT DISTINCT
    -- These will be correctly deduplicated at both hourly and daily levels
    
    -- Consideration metrics (AI offers only - backend events with or without frontend events)
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN td.intent_engine_type IN ('AI', 'MCP') THEN td.user_id END) AS consideration_users,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN td.intent_engine_type IN ('AI', 'MCP') THEN td.req_offer END) AS considerations,
    -- COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN td.intent_engine_type = 'AI' THEN td.anonymous_id END) AS consideration_anonymous_ids,
    
    -- Expanded surface filters using JavaScript variable
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN td.action IN ('show', 'view') AND td.surface IN ('prompt', 'login_prompt', 'chatgpt', 'chat_gpt', 'gpt', 'ai_offers', 'rewards_transaction_popup', 'offers_popup', 'intent_engine', 'search_prompt', 'retargeting_prompt') AND td.offer_presented = true THEN td.user_id END) AS show_users,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN td.action IN ('show', 'view') AND td.surface IN ('prompt', 'login_prompt', 'chatgpt', 'chat_gpt', 'gpt', 'ai_offers', 'rewards_transaction_popup', 'offers_popup', 'intent_engine', 'search_prompt', 'retargeting_prompt') AND td.offer_presented = true THEN td.req_offer END) AS shows,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN td.action IN ('show', 'view') AND td.surface IN ('prompt', 'login_prompt', 'chatgpt', 'chat_gpt', 'gpt', 'ai_offers', 'rewards_transaction_popup', 'offers_popup', 'intent_engine', 'search_prompt', 'retargeting_prompt') AND td.offer_presented = true THEN 1 END) AS shows_raw,
    -- COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN td.action IN ('show', 'view') AND td.surface IN (${OFFER_SURFACES.map(s => `'${s}'`).join(', ')}) AND td.offer_presented = true THEN td.anonymous_id END) AS show_anonymous_ids,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN td.action = 'click' AND td.surface IN ('prompt', 'login_prompt', 'chatgpt', 'chat_gpt', 'gpt', 'ai_offers', 'rewards_transaction_popup', 'offers_popup', 'intent_engine', 'search_prompt', 'retargeting_prompt') AND td.offer_presented = true THEN td.user_id END) AS click_users,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN td.action = 'click' AND td.surface IN ('prompt', 'login_prompt', 'chatgpt', 'chat_gpt', 'gpt', 'ai_offers', 'rewards_transaction_popup', 'offers_popup', 'intent_engine', 'search_prompt', 'retargeting_prompt') AND td.offer_presented = true THEN td.req_offer END) AS clicks,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN td.action = 'click' AND td.surface IN ('prompt', 'login_prompt', 'chatgpt', 'chat_gpt', 'gpt', 'ai_offers', 'rewards_transaction_popup', 'offers_popup', 'intent_engine', 'search_prompt', 'retargeting_prompt') AND td.offer_presented = true THEN 1 END) AS clicks_raw,
    -- COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN td.action = 'click' AND td.surface IN (${OFFER_SURFACES.map(s => `'${s}'`).join(', ')}) AND td.offer_presented = true THEN td.anonymous_id END) AS click_anonymous_ids,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN td.action = 'close' AND td.surface IN ('prompt', 'login_prompt', 'chatgpt', 'chat_gpt', 'gpt', 'ai_offers', 'rewards_transaction_popup', 'offers_popup', 'intent_engine', 'search_prompt', 'retargeting_prompt') AND td.offer_presented = true THEN td.user_id END) AS close_users,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN td.action = 'close' AND td.surface IN ('prompt', 'login_prompt', 'chatgpt', 'chat_gpt', 'gpt', 'ai_offers', 'rewards_transaction_popup', 'offers_popup', 'intent_engine', 'search_prompt', 'retargeting_prompt') AND td.offer_presented = true THEN 1 END) AS closes,
    -- COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN td.action = 'close' AND td.surface IN (${OFFER_SURFACES.map(s => `'${s}'`).join(', ')}) AND td.offer_presented = true THEN td.anonymous_id END) AS close_anonymous_ids,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN td.action = 'redeem' AND td.surface IN ('prompt', 'login_prompt', 'chatgpt', 'chat_gpt', 'gpt', 'ai_offers', 'rewards_transaction_popup', 'offers_popup', 'intent_engine', 'search_prompt', 'retargeting_prompt') AND td.offer_presented = true THEN td.user_id END) AS redeem_users,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN td.action = 'redeem' AND td.surface IN ('prompt', 'login_prompt', 'chatgpt', 'chat_gpt', 'gpt', 'ai_offers', 'rewards_transaction_popup', 'offers_popup', 'intent_engine', 'search_prompt', 'retargeting_prompt') AND td.offer_presented = true THEN td.req_offer END) AS redeems,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN td.action = 'redeem' AND td.surface IN ('prompt', 'login_prompt', 'chatgpt', 'chat_gpt', 'gpt', 'ai_offers', 'rewards_transaction_popup', 'offers_popup', 'intent_engine', 'search_prompt', 'retargeting_prompt') AND td.offer_presented = true THEN 1 END) AS redeems_raw,
    -- COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN td.action = 'redeem' AND td.surface IN (${OFFER_SURFACES.map(s => `'${s}'`).join(', ')}) AND td.offer_presented = true THEN td.anonymous_id END) AS redeem_anonymous_ids,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN td.action IN ('show', 'view') AND td.surface = 'error_prompt' AND td.offer_presented = true THEN td.user_id END) AS error_users,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN td.action IN ('show', 'view') AND td.surface = 'error_prompt' AND td.offer_presented = true THEN 1 END) AS errors,
    -- COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN td.action IN ('show', 'view') AND td.surface = 'error_prompt' AND td.offer_presented = true THEN td.anonymous_id END) AS error_anonymous_ids,
    
    -- No-show metrics (Phase 3 - Limited implementation, data not available for all reasons)
    0 AS no_shows_cooldown, 0 AS no_shows_tied_lost, 0 AS no_shows_not_funded, 0 AS no_shows_lower_bid, 0 AS no_shows_lower_campaign_boost, 0 AS no_shows_lower_offergroup_boost, 0 AS total_no_shows,
    
    -- Placement metrics (both hourly and daily using grain-aware JOIN)
    COALESCE(MAX(pm.total_placements), 0) AS total_placements,
    COALESCE(MAX(pm.total_placement_hashes), 0) AS total_placement_hashes,
    COALESCE(MAX(pm.total_audience_ids), 0) AS total_audience_ids, 
    
    -- Direct transaction metrics (DAILY ONLY - used for both grains)
    COALESCE(MAX(dt_day.offer_aff_trx), 0) AS offer_aff_trx,
    COALESCE(MAX(dt_day.trx_devices), 0) AS trx_devices,
    COALESCE(MAX(dt_day.trx_anonymous_ids), 0) AS trx_anonymous_ids,
    COALESCE(MAX(dt_day.gmv_dollars), 0.0) AS gmv_dollars,
    COALESCE(MAX(dt_day.commission_dollars), 0.0) AS commission_dollars,
    
    -- Budget and awards metrics (DAILY ONLY - used for both grains)
    COALESCE(MAX(ba_day.millipoints_awarded), 0) AS millipoints_awarded,
    COALESCE(MAX(ba_day.dollars_awarded), 0.0) AS dollars_awarded,
    COALESCE(MAX(ba_day.unique_awards), 0) AS unique_awards,
    COALESCE(MAX(ba_day.awarded_devices), 0) AS awarded_devices,
    COALESCE(MAX(ba_day.awarded_anonymous_ids), 0) AS awarded_anonymous_ids,
    IFNULL(ANY_VALUE(ba_day.award_offer_ids), []) AS award_offer_ids,
    COALESCE(MAX(ba_day.budget_usedinmillipoints), 0) AS budget_usedinmillipoints,
    COALESCE(MAX(ba_day.budget_usedindollars), 0.0) AS budget_usedindollars,
    
    -- Click attribution metrics (Phase 2 - ALL PERIODS, filtered later)
    COALESCE(MAX(ca24h_day.click_transactions_24h), 0) AS click_transactions_24h,
    COALESCE(MAX(ca24h_day.click_devices_24h), 0) AS click_devices_24h,
    COALESCE(MAX(ca24h_day.click_anonymous_ids_24h), 0) AS click_anonymous_ids_24h,
    COALESCE(MAX(ca24h_day.click_gmv_dollars_24h), 0.0) AS click_gmv_dollars_24h,
    COALESCE(MAX(ca24h_day.click_commission_dollars_24h), 0.0) AS click_commission_dollars_24h,
    COALESCE(MAX(ca7d_day.click_transactions_7d), 0) AS click_transactions_7d,
    COALESCE(MAX(ca7d_day.click_devices_7d), 0) AS click_devices_7d,
    COALESCE(MAX(ca7d_day.click_anonymous_ids_7d), 0) AS click_anonymous_ids_7d,
    COALESCE(MAX(ca7d_day.click_gmv_dollars_7d), 0.0) AS click_gmv_dollars_7d,
    COALESCE(MAX(ca7d_day.click_commission_dollars_7d), 0.0) AS click_commission_dollars_7d,
    
    -- View attribution metrics (Phase 2 - ALL PERIODS, filtered later) 
    COALESCE(MAX(va24h_day.view_transactions_24h), 0) AS view_transactions_24h,
    COALESCE(MAX(va24h_day.view_devices_24h), 0) AS view_devices_24h,
    COALESCE(MAX(va24h_day.view_anonymous_ids_24h), 0) AS view_anonymous_ids_24h,
    COALESCE(MAX(va24h_day.view_gmv_dollars_24h), 0.0) AS view_gmv_dollars_24h,
    COALESCE(MAX(va24h_day.view_commission_dollars_24h), 0.0) AS view_commission_dollars_24h,
    COALESCE(MAX(va7d_day.view_transactions_7d), 0) AS view_transactions_7d,
    COALESCE(MAX(va7d_day.view_devices_7d), 0) AS view_devices_7d,
    COALESCE(MAX(va7d_day.view_anonymous_ids_7d), 0) AS view_anonymous_ids_7d,
    COALESCE(MAX(va7d_day.view_gmv_dollars_7d), 0.0) AS view_gmv_dollars_7d,
    COALESCE(MAX(va7d_day.view_commission_dollars_7d), 0.0) AS view_commission_dollars_7d,
    
    -- Checkout attribution metrics (Phase 2 - ALL PERIODS, filtered later)
    COALESCE(MAX(co24h_day.checkout_detections_24h), 0) AS checkout_detections_24h,
    COALESCE(MAX(co24h_day.checkout_anonymous_ids_24h), 0) AS checkout_anonymous_ids_24h,
    COALESCE(MAX(co24h_day.avg_checkout_score_24h), 0.0) AS avg_checkout_score_24h,
    COALESCE(MAX(co7d_day.checkout_detections_7d), 0) AS checkout_detections_7d,
    COALESCE(MAX(co7d_day.checkout_anonymous_ids_7d), 0) AS checkout_anonymous_ids_7d,
    COALESCE(MAX(co7d_day.avg_checkout_score_7d), 0.0) AS avg_checkout_score_7d, 
    
    -- Balance and claims metrics (DAILY ONLY - used for both grains)
    COALESCE(MAX(bc_day.user_balance_burned_millipoints), 0) AS user_balance_burned_millipoints,
    COALESCE(MAX(bc_day.user_balance_burned_millipoints_dollars), 0.0) AS user_balance_burned_millipoints_dollars,
    COALESCE(MAX(bc_day.total_claims), 0) AS total_claims,
    COALESCE(MAX(bc_day.claimed_devices), 0) AS claimed_devices,
    COALESCE(MAX(bc_day.claimed_anonymous_ids), 0) AS claimed_anonymous_ids,
    IFNULL(ANY_VALUE(bc_day.claimed_offer_ids), []) AS claimed_offer_ids
    
  FROM time_dimensions td
  -- Join direct transaction data (DAILY ONLY - used for both hourly and daily GROUPING SETS)
  LEFT JOIN direct_transactions dt_day 
    ON dt_day.campaign_id = td.campaign_id 
    AND dt_day.merchant_id = td.merchant_id 
    AND dt_day.dt_day = td.day_grain
  -- Join budget/awards data (DAILY ONLY - used for both hourly and daily GROUPING SETS)
  LEFT JOIN budget_awards ba_day 
    ON ba_day.campaign_id = td.campaign_id 
    AND ba_day.merchant_id = td.merchant_id 
    AND ba_day.dt_day = td.day_grain
  -- Join attribution data (DAILY ONLY - optimized performance)
  LEFT JOIN click_attribution_24h ca24h_day
    ON ca24h_day.campaign_id = td.campaign_id 
    AND ca24h_day.merchant_id = td.merchant_id 
    AND ca24h_day.dt_day = td.day_grain
  LEFT JOIN click_attribution_7d ca7d_day
    ON ca7d_day.campaign_id = td.campaign_id 
    AND ca7d_day.merchant_id = td.merchant_id 
    AND ca7d_day.dt_day = td.day_grain
  LEFT JOIN view_attribution_24h va24h_day
    ON va24h_day.campaign_id = td.campaign_id 
    AND va24h_day.merchant_id = td.merchant_id 
    AND va24h_day.dt_day = td.day_grain
  LEFT JOIN view_attribution_7d va7d_day
    ON va7d_day.campaign_id = td.campaign_id 
    AND va7d_day.merchant_id = td.merchant_id 
    AND va7d_day.dt_day = td.day_grain
  -- Join checkout attribution data (DAILY ONLY - optimized performance)
  LEFT JOIN checkout_attribution_24h co24h_day
    ON co24h_day.campaign_id = td.campaign_id 
    AND co24h_day.merchant_id = td.merchant_id 
    AND co24h_day.dt_day = td.day_grain
  LEFT JOIN checkout_attribution_7d co7d_day
    ON co7d_day.campaign_id = td.campaign_id 
    AND co7d_day.merchant_id = td.merchant_id 
    AND co7d_day.dt_day = td.day_grain
  -- Join placement metrics - simply match on the coalesced time and let period handle grain selection
  LEFT JOIN placement_metrics pm
    ON pm.campaign_id = td.campaign_id 
    AND pm.merchant_id = td.merchant_id 
    AND pm.dt_time = COALESCE(td.hour_grain, td.day_grain)
  -- Join balance/claims data (DAILY ONLY - used for both hourly and daily GROUPING SETS)
  LEFT JOIN balance_claims bc_day
    ON bc_day.campaign_id = td.campaign_id 
    AND bc_day.merchant_id = td.merchant_id 
    AND bc_day.dt_day = td.day_grain
  
  -- GROUPING SETS to get both hourly and daily aggregations in one pass
  GROUP BY GROUPING SETS (
    (td.hour_grain, td.campaign_id, td.merchant_id, td.source_type, td.intent_engine_type),  -- Hourly grain
    (td.day_grain, td.campaign_id, td.merchant_id, td.source_type, td.intent_engine_type)    -- Daily grain
  )
),

-- Apply attribution filtering based on period
multi_grain_data AS (
  SELECT
    *,
    -- Click attribution metrics (DAILY ONLY to prevent overcounting)
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN click_transactions_24h ELSE NULL END AS click_transactions_24h_final,
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN click_devices_24h ELSE NULL END AS click_devices_24h_final,
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN click_anonymous_ids_24h ELSE NULL END AS click_anonymous_ids_24h_final,
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN click_gmv_dollars_24h ELSE NULL END AS click_gmv_dollars_24h_final,
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN click_commission_dollars_24h ELSE NULL END AS click_commission_dollars_24h_final,
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN click_transactions_7d ELSE NULL END AS click_transactions_7d_final,
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN click_devices_7d ELSE NULL END AS click_devices_7d_final,
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN click_anonymous_ids_7d ELSE NULL END AS click_anonymous_ids_7d_final,
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN click_gmv_dollars_7d ELSE NULL END AS click_gmv_dollars_7d_final,
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN click_commission_dollars_7d ELSE NULL END AS click_commission_dollars_7d_final,
    -- View attribution metrics (DAILY ONLY to prevent overcounting)
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN view_transactions_24h ELSE NULL END AS view_transactions_24h_final,
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN view_devices_24h ELSE NULL END AS view_devices_24h_final,
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN view_anonymous_ids_24h ELSE NULL END AS view_anonymous_ids_24h_final,
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN view_gmv_dollars_24h ELSE NULL END AS view_gmv_dollars_24h_final,
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN view_commission_dollars_24h ELSE NULL END AS view_commission_dollars_24h_final,
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN view_transactions_7d ELSE NULL END AS view_transactions_7d_final,
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN view_devices_7d ELSE NULL END AS view_devices_7d_final,
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN view_anonymous_ids_7d ELSE NULL END AS view_anonymous_ids_7d_final,
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN view_gmv_dollars_7d ELSE NULL END AS view_gmv_dollars_7d_final,
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN view_commission_dollars_7d ELSE NULL END AS view_commission_dollars_7d_final,
    -- Checkout attribution metrics (DAILY ONLY to prevent overcounting)
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN checkout_detections_24h ELSE NULL END AS checkout_detections_24h_final,
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN checkout_anonymous_ids_24h ELSE NULL END AS checkout_anonymous_ids_24h_final,
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN avg_checkout_score_24h ELSE NULL END AS avg_checkout_score_24h_final,
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN checkout_detections_7d ELSE NULL END AS checkout_detections_7d_final,
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN checkout_anonymous_ids_7d ELSE NULL END AS checkout_anonymous_ids_7d_final,
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN avg_checkout_score_7d ELSE NULL END AS avg_checkout_score_7d_final
  FROM multi_grain_base
)

-- Select final result with proper column names
SELECT 
  -- Context-aware dt field: DATETIME truncated to appropriate granularity
  CASE 
    WHEN period = 'day' THEN DATETIME_TRUNC(dt_hour, DAY)
    WHEN period = 'hour' THEN DATETIME_TRUNC(dt_hour, HOUR)
    ELSE dt_hour
  END AS dt,
  period,
  campaign_id,
  merchant_id,
  source_type,
  intent_engine_type,
  campaign_created_ts,
  campaign_updated_ts,
  campaign_ended_ts,
  campaign_active,
  campaign_budget,
  campaign_state,
  campaign_start_ts,
  offergroups,
  consideration_users,
  considerations,
  -- consideration_anonymous_ids,
  show_users,
  shows,
  shows_raw,
  -- show_anonymous_ids,
  click_users,
  clicks,
  clicks_raw,
  -- click_anonymous_ids,
  close_users,
  closes,
  -- close_anonymous_ids,
  redeem_users,
  redeems,
  redeems_raw,
  -- redeem_anonymous_ids,
  error_users,
  errors,
  -- error_anonymous_ids,
  no_shows_cooldown,
  no_shows_tied_lost,
  no_shows_not_funded,
  no_shows_lower_bid,
  no_shows_lower_campaign_boost,
  no_shows_lower_offergroup_boost,
  total_no_shows,
  total_placements,
  total_placement_hashes,
  total_audience_ids,
  offer_aff_trx,
  trx_devices,
  trx_anonymous_ids,
  gmv_dollars,
  commission_dollars,
  millipoints_awarded,
  dollars_awarded,
  unique_awards,
  awarded_devices,
  awarded_anonymous_ids,
  award_offer_ids,
  budget_usedinmillipoints,
  budget_usedindollars,
  -- Attribution metrics with proper names (NULL for hourly records)
  click_transactions_24h_final AS click_transactions_24h,
  click_devices_24h_final AS click_devices_24h,
  click_anonymous_ids_24h_final AS click_anonymous_ids_24h,
  click_gmv_dollars_24h_final AS click_gmv_dollars_24h,
  click_commission_dollars_24h_final AS click_commission_dollars_24h,
  click_transactions_7d_final AS click_transactions_7d,
  click_devices_7d_final AS click_devices_7d,
  click_anonymous_ids_7d_final AS click_anonymous_ids_7d,
  click_gmv_dollars_7d_final AS click_gmv_dollars_7d,
  click_commission_dollars_7d_final AS click_commission_dollars_7d,
  view_transactions_24h_final AS view_transactions_24h,
  view_devices_24h_final AS view_devices_24h,
  view_anonymous_ids_24h_final AS view_anonymous_ids_24h,
  view_gmv_dollars_24h_final AS view_gmv_dollars_24h,
  view_commission_dollars_24h_final AS view_commission_dollars_24h,
  view_transactions_7d_final AS view_transactions_7d,
  view_devices_7d_final AS view_devices_7d,
  view_anonymous_ids_7d_final AS view_anonymous_ids_7d,
  view_gmv_dollars_7d_final AS view_gmv_dollars_7d,
  view_commission_dollars_7d_final AS view_commission_dollars_7d,
  -- Checkout attribution metrics (NULL for hourly records)
  checkout_detections_24h_final AS checkout_detections_24h,
  checkout_anonymous_ids_24h_final AS checkout_anonymous_ids_24h,
  avg_checkout_score_24h_final AS avg_checkout_score_24h,
  checkout_detections_7d_final AS checkout_detections_7d,
  checkout_anonymous_ids_7d_final AS checkout_anonymous_ids_7d,
  avg_checkout_score_7d_final AS avg_checkout_score_7d,
  user_balance_burned_millipoints,
  user_balance_burned_millipoints_dollars,
  total_claims,
  claimed_devices,
  claimed_anonymous_ids,
  claimed_offer_ids
FROM multi_grain_data

-- Daily Campaign Analytics for ALL campaigns - Filtered view from base table
