model.name: offer_campaign_ir_base
model.description: Base table for offer campaign metrics using GROUPING SETS for multi-grain aggregation - single source of truth. In dev environments, filters to last 7 days of offer data and 30 days of transaction data for faster processing. Fixed Cartesian product issue. Includes consideration metrics for AI offers.

config.description: Base table for offer campaign metrics using GROUPING SETS for multi-grain aggregation - single source of truth. In dev environments, filters to last 7 days of offer data and 30 days of transaction data for faster processing. Fixed Cartesian product issue. Includes consideration metrics for AI offers.

model.sqlContent:
-- Base Campaign Analytics using ROLLUP/GROUPING SETS for multi-grain aggregation
WITH 
-- Base data from offer_expanded_view
offer_base AS (
  SELECT
    DATETIME(oe.ts) AS ts,
    DATETIME_TRUNC(DATETIME(oe.ts), HOUR) AS dt_hour,
    oe.campaign_id,
    oe.merchant_id,
    oe.anonymous_id,
    oe.user_id,
    oe.request_id,
    oe.offer_id,
    oe.action,
    oe.surface,
    oe.offer_presented,
    oe.source_type,
    oe.intent_engine_type,
    oe.req_offer
  FROM `piedotorg-production.intent_engine_dev.offer_expanded_view` oe
  WHERE oe.campaign_id IS NOT NULL
    AND oe.merchant_id IS NOT NULL
    -- Include both frontend events (with actions) and backend-only events (considerations without frontend)
    AND (oe.action IN ('show', 'view', 'click', 'close', 'redeem') OR oe.action IS NULL)
    AND DATE(oe.ts) >= '1970-01-01'
),

-- Campaign metadata
campaign_data AS (
  SELECT 
    campaignId,
    budget,
    merchantId,
    DATETIME(TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(created)) AS campaign_created_ts,
    DATETIME(COALESCE(TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(updated), TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(created))) AS campaign_updated_ts,
    CASE 
      WHEN endDate IS NOT NULL THEN DATETIME(TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(endDate))
      WHEN state IN ('PAUSED', 'ENDED', 'CANCELLED', 'ARCHIVED') THEN DATETIME(COALESCE(TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(updated), TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(created)))
      ELSE NULL 
    END AS campaign_ended_ts,
    CASE WHEN state = 'ACTIVE' THEN true ELSE false END AS active,
    state AS campaign_state,
    CASE WHEN startDate IS NOT NULL THEN DATETIME(TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(startDate)) ELSE DATETIME(TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(created)) END AS campaign_start_ts
  FROM `piedotorg-production.analytics_etl.campaigns_campaigns`
),

-- Transaction data for affiliate attribution
transactions_base AS (
  SELECT
    DATETIME(created_coalesce_ts) AS created_ts,
    transactionId,
    anonymous_id,
    CASE 
      WHEN merchantId = 'verizon' AND IFNULL(externalSaleValue, 0) = 0 
      THEN externalCommission 
      ELSE externalSaleValue 
    END AS externalSaleValue,
    externalCommission,
    CASE WHEN merchantId = 'logitechg' THEN 'logitech' ELSE merchantId END AS merchantId,
    adOfferId,
    campaignId AS adoffercampaignId,
    subsrc,
    userId,
    type,
    balance_burned_millipoints,
    millipoints,
    LOWER(adOfferType) AS transaction_type
  FROM `piedotorg-production.data_science_dev.transactions_expanded_view`
  WHERE (
    -- AD_OFFER transactions need campaignId (direct offer claims)
    (type = 'AD_OFFER' AND campaignId IS NOT NULL)
    OR 
    -- AFFILIATE transactions can have NULL campaignId (attribution-based)
    (type = 'AFFILIATE')
  )
  AND DATE(created_coalesce_ts) >= '1970-01-01'
),

-- Direct affiliate transactions - DAILY ONLY (no hourly breakdown needed)
direct_transactions AS (
  SELECT
    DATETIME_TRUNC(aff.created_ts, DAY) AS dt_day,
    aff.adoffercampaignId AS campaign_id,
    aff.merchantId AS merchant_id,
    COUNT(*) AS offer_aff_trx,
    COUNT(DISTINCT aff.anonymous_id) AS trx_anonymous_ids,
    COUNT(DISTINCT aff.userId) AS trx_devices, -- Using userId as device proxy
    COUNT(DISTINCT aff.transactionId) AS dist_trx_offer_aff,
    SUM(aff.externalSaleValue) / 100 AS gmv_dollars,
    SUM(aff.externalCommission) / 100 AS commission_dollars
  FROM transactions_base aff
  INNER JOIN transactions_base offer 
    ON aff.userId = offer.userId 
    AND aff.merchantId = offer.merchantId
    AND aff.created_ts BETWEEN offer.created_ts AND COALESCE(
      -- Use campaign end logic similar to old version
      DATETIME_ADD(offer.created_ts, INTERVAL 30 DAY), 
      CURRENT_DATETIME()
    )
  WHERE aff.type = 'AFFILIATE'
    AND offer.type = 'AD_OFFER'
    AND aff.subsrc IN ('pie_offer_search', 'pie_offer_retargeting', 'pie_offer_login_search')
  GROUP BY dt_day, campaign_id, merchant_id
),

-- Budget and awards tracking - DAILY ONLY (no hourly breakdown needed)
budget_awards AS (
  SELECT
    DATETIME_TRUNC(created_ts, DAY) AS dt_day,
    adoffercampaignId AS campaign_id,
    merchantId AS merchant_id,
    SUM(millipoints) / 100000 AS dollars_awarded,
    SUM(balance_burned_millipoints) / 1000 / 100 AS budget_usedindollars,
    SUM(balance_burned_millipoints) AS budget_usedinmillipoints,
    SUM(millipoints) AS millipoints_awarded,
    COUNT(*) AS unique_awards,
    COUNT(DISTINCT userId) AS awarded_devices,
    COUNT(DISTINCT anonymous_id) AS awarded_anonymous_ids,
    ARRAY_AGG(DISTINCT adOfferId IGNORE NULLS) AS award_offer_ids
  FROM transactions_base
  WHERE type = 'AD_OFFER'
    AND adoffercampaignId IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY dt_day, campaign_id, merchant_id
),

-- Click attribution 24h - affiliate transactions attributed to click events within 24h
click_attribution_24h AS (
  SELECT
    DATETIME_TRUNC(aff.created_ts, HOUR) AS dt_hour,
    DATETIME_TRUNC(aff.created_ts, DAY) AS dt_day,
    click_events.campaign_id,
    aff.merchantId AS merchant_id,
    COUNT(*) AS click_transactions_24h,
    COUNT(DISTINCT aff.anonymous_id) AS click_anonymous_ids_24h,
    COUNT(DISTINCT aff.userId) AS click_devices_24h,
    SUM(aff.externalSaleValue) / 100 AS click_gmv_dollars_24h,
    SUM(aff.externalCommission) / 100 AS click_commission_dollars_24h
  FROM transactions_base aff
  INNER JOIN (
    -- Get click events from our offer_base data
    SELECT DISTINCT
      anonymous_id,
      campaign_id,
      merchant_id,
      ts
    FROM offer_base
    WHERE action = 'click'
      AND campaign_id IS NOT NULL
  ) click_events
    ON aff.anonymous_id = click_events.anonymous_id
    AND aff.merchantId = click_events.merchant_id
    AND DATETIME_DIFF(aff.created_ts, click_events.ts, HOUR) BETWEEN 0 AND 24
    AND aff.created_ts >= click_events.ts
  WHERE aff.type = 'AFFILIATE'
  GROUP BY dt_hour, dt_day, campaign_id, merchant_id
),

-- Click attribution 7d - affiliate transactions attributed to click events within 7d
click_attribution_7d AS (
  SELECT
    DATETIME_TRUNC(aff.created_ts, HOUR) AS dt_hour,
    DATETIME_TRUNC(aff.created_ts, DAY) AS dt_day,
    click_events.campaign_id,
    aff.merchantId AS merchant_id,
    COUNT(*) AS click_transactions_7d,
    COUNT(DISTINCT aff.anonymous_id) AS click_anonymous_ids_7d,
    COUNT(DISTINCT aff.userId) AS click_devices_7d,
    SUM(aff.externalSaleValue) / 100 AS click_gmv_dollars_7d,
    SUM(aff.externalCommission) / 100 AS click_commission_dollars_7d
  FROM transactions_base aff
  INNER JOIN (
    -- Get click events from our offer_base data
    SELECT DISTINCT
      anonymous_id,
      campaign_id,
      merchant_id,
      ts
    FROM offer_base
    WHERE action = 'click'
      AND campaign_id IS NOT NULL
  ) click_events
    ON aff.anonymous_id = click_events.anonymous_id
    AND aff.merchantId = click_events.merchant_id
    AND DATETIME_DIFF(aff.created_ts, click_events.ts, DAY) BETWEEN 0 AND 7
    AND aff.created_ts >= click_events.ts
  WHERE aff.type = 'AFFILIATE'
  GROUP BY dt_hour, dt_day, campaign_id, merchant_id
),

-- View attribution 24h - affiliate transactions attributed to show events within 24h
view_attribution_24h AS (
  SELECT
    DATETIME_TRUNC(aff.created_ts, HOUR) AS dt_hour,
    DATETIME_TRUNC(aff.created_ts, DAY) AS dt_day,
    view_events.campaign_id,
    aff.merchantId AS merchant_id,
    COUNT(*) AS view_transactions_24h,
    COUNT(DISTINCT aff.anonymous_id) AS view_anonymous_ids_24h,
    COUNT(DISTINCT aff.userId) AS view_devices_24h,
    SUM(aff.externalSaleValue) / 100 AS view_gmv_dollars_24h,
    SUM(aff.externalCommission) / 100 AS view_commission_dollars_24h
  FROM transactions_base aff
  INNER JOIN (
    -- Get show events from our offer_base data
    SELECT DISTINCT
      anonymous_id,
      campaign_id,
      merchant_id,
      ts
    FROM offer_base
    WHERE action IN ('show', 'view')
      AND campaign_id IS NOT NULL
  ) view_events
    ON aff.anonymous_id = view_events.anonymous_id
    AND aff.merchantId = view_events.merchant_id
    AND DATETIME_DIFF(aff.created_ts, view_events.ts, HOUR) BETWEEN 0 AND 24
    AND aff.created_ts >= view_events.ts
  WHERE aff.type = 'AFFILIATE'
  GROUP BY dt_hour, dt_day, campaign_id, merchant_id
),

-- View attribution 7d - affiliate transactions attributed to show events within 7d
view_attribution_7d AS (
  SELECT
    DATETIME_TRUNC(aff.created_ts, HOUR) AS dt_hour,
    DATETIME_TRUNC(aff.created_ts, DAY) AS dt_day,
    view_events.campaign_id,
    aff.merchantId AS merchant_id,
    COUNT(*) AS view_transactions_7d,
    COUNT(DISTINCT aff.anonymous_id) AS view_anonymous_ids_7d,
    COUNT(DISTINCT aff.userId) AS view_devices_7d,
    SUM(aff.externalSaleValue) / 100 AS view_gmv_dollars_7d,
    SUM(aff.externalCommission) / 100 AS view_commission_dollars_7d
  FROM transactions_base aff
  INNER JOIN (
    -- Get show events from our offer_base data
    SELECT DISTINCT
      anonymous_id,
      campaign_id,
      merchant_id,
      ts
    FROM offer_base
    WHERE action IN ('show', 'view')
      AND campaign_id IS NOT NULL
  ) view_events
    ON aff.anonymous_id = view_events.anonymous_id
    AND aff.merchantId = view_events.merchant_id
    AND DATETIME_DIFF(aff.created_ts, view_events.ts, DAY) BETWEEN 0 AND 7
    AND aff.created_ts >= view_events.ts
  WHERE aff.type = 'AFFILIATE'
  GROUP BY dt_hour, dt_day, campaign_id, merchant_id
),

-- Checkout detection base data
checkout_detection_base AS (
  SELECT
    DATETIME(timestamp) AS detected_ts,
    anonymous_id,
    merchant_id,
    final_score
  FROM `piedotorg-production.backend_analytics.checkout_detection`
  WHERE classified_as_checkout = true
    AND anonymous_id IS NOT NULL
    AND merchant_id IS NOT NULL
),

-- Checkout attribution 24h - checkout detections attributed to click events within 24h
checkout_attribution_24h AS (
  SELECT
    DATETIME_TRUNC(cd.detected_ts, HOUR) AS dt_hour,
    DATETIME_TRUNC(cd.detected_ts, DAY) AS dt_day,
    click_events.campaign_id,
    cd.merchant_id,
    COUNT(*) AS checkout_detections_24h,
    COUNT(DISTINCT cd.anonymous_id) AS checkout_anonymous_ids_24h,
    AVG(cd.final_score) AS avg_checkout_score_24h
  FROM checkout_detection_base cd
  INNER JOIN (
    -- Get click events from our offer_base data
    SELECT DISTINCT
      anonymous_id,
      campaign_id,
      merchant_id,
      ts
    FROM offer_base
    WHERE action = 'click'
      AND campaign_id IS NOT NULL
  ) click_events
    ON cd.anonymous_id = click_events.anonymous_id
    AND cd.merchant_id = click_events.merchant_id
    AND DATETIME_DIFF(cd.detected_ts, click_events.ts, HOUR) BETWEEN 0 AND 24
    AND cd.detected_ts >= click_events.ts
  GROUP BY dt_hour, dt_day, campaign_id, merchant_id
),

-- Checkout attribution 7d - checkout detections attributed to click events within 7d
checkout_attribution_7d AS (
  SELECT
    DATETIME_TRUNC(cd.detected_ts, HOUR) AS dt_hour,
    DATETIME_TRUNC(cd.detected_ts, DAY) AS dt_day,
    click_events.campaign_id,
    cd.merchant_id,
    COUNT(*) AS checkout_detections_7d,
    COUNT(DISTINCT cd.anonymous_id) AS checkout_anonymous_ids_7d,
    AVG(cd.final_score) AS avg_checkout_score_7d
  FROM checkout_detection_base cd
  INNER JOIN (
    -- Get click events from our offer_base data
    SELECT DISTINCT
      anonymous_id,
      campaign_id,
      merchant_id,
      ts
    FROM offer_base
    WHERE action = 'click'
      AND campaign_id IS NOT NULL
  ) click_events
    ON cd.anonymous_id = click_events.anonymous_id
    AND cd.merchant_id = click_events.merchant_id
    AND DATETIME_DIFF(cd.detected_ts, click_events.ts, DAY) BETWEEN 0 AND 7
    AND cd.detected_ts >= click_events.ts
  GROUP BY dt_hour, dt_day, campaign_id, merchant_id
),

-- Placement metrics - using GROUPING SETS for consistent multi-grain aggregation
placement_metrics AS (
  SELECT
    -- Time dimension using GROUPING SETS approach
    COALESCE(hour_grain, day_grain) AS dt_time,
    
    -- Period indicator using GROUPING function
    CASE 
      WHEN GROUPING(hour_grain) = 0 THEN 'hour'
      WHEN GROUPING(day_grain) = 0 THEN 'day'
    END AS grain,
    
    campaign_id,
    merchant_id,
    COUNT(*) AS total_placements,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CONCAT(campaign_id, '-', merchant_id, '-', anonymous_id, '-', DATE(ts))) AS total_placement_hashes,
    COUNT(DISTINCT anonymous_id) AS total_audience_ids
  FROM (
    SELECT 
      DATETIME_TRUNC(ts, HOUR) AS hour_grain,
      DATETIME_TRUNC(ts, DAY) AS day_grain,
      campaign_id,
      merchant_id,
      anonymous_id,
      ts
    FROM offer_base
    WHERE campaign_id IS NOT NULL AND merchant_id IS NOT NULL
  )
  
  -- GROUPING SETS for both hourly and daily aggregation
  GROUP BY GROUPING SETS (
    (hour_grain, campaign_id, merchant_id),   -- Hourly grain
    (day_grain, campaign_id, merchant_id)     -- Daily grain  
  )
),

-- User balance and claims tracking - DAILY ONLY (no hourly breakdown needed)
balance_claims AS (
  SELECT
    DATETIME_TRUNC(created_ts, DAY) AS dt_day,
    adoffercampaignId AS campaign_id,
    merchantId AS merchant_id,
    -- Claims metrics (AD_OFFER transactions are essentially claims)
    COUNT(*) AS total_claims,
    COUNT(DISTINCT userId) AS claimed_devices,
    COUNT(DISTINCT anonymous_id) AS claimed_anonymous_ids,
    ARRAY_AGG(DISTINCT adOfferId IGNORE NULLS) AS claimed_offer_ids,
    -- Balance burned metrics (assume millipoints represent burned balance)
    SUM(millipoints) AS user_balance_burned_millipoints,
    SUM(millipoints) / 100000 AS user_balance_burned_millipoints_dollars
  FROM transactions_base
  WHERE type = 'AD_OFFER'
    AND adoffercampaignId IS NOT NULL
    AND millipoints > 0  -- Only count actual balance usage
  GROUP BY dt_day, campaign_id, merchant_id
),

-- Prepare time dimensions for GROUPING SETS
time_dimensions AS (
  SELECT
    ob.*,
    cd.campaign_created_ts,
    cd.campaign_updated_ts,
    cd.campaign_ended_ts,
    cd.active,
    cd.budget,
    cd.campaign_state,
    cd.campaign_start_ts,
    -- Pre-calculate both time grains
    ob.dt_hour AS hour_grain,
    DATETIME_TRUNC(ob.dt_hour, DAY) AS day_grain
  FROM offer_base ob
  LEFT JOIN campaign_data cd ON ob.campaign_id = cd.campaignId AND ob.merchant_id = cd.merchantId
),

-- Multi-grain aggregation using GROUPING SETS approach with transaction data
multi_grain_base AS (
  SELECT
    -- Time dimension - use COALESCE to handle NULL from GROUPING SETS
    COALESCE(td.hour_grain, td.day_grain) AS dt_hour,
    
    -- Period indicator using GROUPING function (used for join logic)
    CASE 
      WHEN GROUPING(td.hour_grain) = 0 THEN 'hour'
      WHEN GROUPING(td.day_grain) = 0 THEN 'day'
    END AS period,
    
    td.campaign_id,
    td.merchant_id,
    td.source_type,
    td.intent_engine_type,
    
    -- Campaign metadata
    ANY_VALUE(td.campaign_created_ts) AS campaign_created_ts,
    ANY_VALUE(td.campaign_updated_ts) AS campaign_updated_ts,
    ANY_VALUE(td.campaign_ended_ts) AS campaign_ended_ts,
    ANY_VALUE(td.active) AS campaign_active,
    ANY_VALUE(td.budget) AS campaign_budget,
    ANY_VALUE(td.campaign_state) AS campaign_state,
    ANY_VALUE(td.campaign_start_ts) AS campaign_start_ts,
    
    CAST([] AS ARRAY<STRUCT<offergroup_id STRING>>) AS offergroups,
    
    -- Core engagement metrics with proper COUNT DISTINCT
    -- These will be correctly deduplicated at both hourly and daily levels
    
    -- Consideration metrics (AI offers only - backend events with or without frontend events)
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN td.intent_engine_type IN ('AI', 'MCP') THEN td.user_id END) AS consideration_users,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN td.intent_engine_type IN ('AI', 'MCP') THEN td.req_offer END) AS considerations,
    -- COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN td.intent_engine_type = 'AI' THEN td.anonymous_id END) AS consideration_anonymous_ids,
    
    -- Expanded surface filters using JavaScript variable
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN td.action IN ('show', 'view') AND td.surface IN ('prompt', 'login_prompt', 'chatgpt', 'chat_gpt', 'gpt', 'ai_offers', 'rewards_transaction_popup', 'offers_popup', 'intent_engine', 'search_prompt', 'retargeting_prompt') AND td.offer_presented = true THEN td.user_id END) AS show_users,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN td.action IN ('show', 'view') AND td.surface IN ('prompt', 'login_prompt', 'chatgpt', 'chat_gpt', 'gpt', 'ai_offers', 'rewards_transaction_popup', 'offers_popup', 'intent_engine', 'search_prompt', 'retargeting_prompt') AND td.offer_presented = true THEN td.req_offer END) AS shows,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN td.action IN ('show', 'view') AND td.surface IN ('prompt', 'login_prompt', 'chatgpt', 'chat_gpt', 'gpt', 'ai_offers', 'rewards_transaction_popup', 'offers_popup', 'intent_engine', 'search_prompt', 'retargeting_prompt') AND td.offer_presented = true THEN 1 END) AS shows_raw,
    -- COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN td.action IN ('show', 'view') AND td.surface IN (${OFFER_SURFACES.map(s => `'${s}'`).join(', ')}) AND td.offer_presented = true THEN td.anonymous_id END) AS show_anonymous_ids,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN td.action = 'click' AND td.surface IN ('prompt', 'login_prompt', 'chatgpt', 'chat_gpt', 'gpt', 'ai_offers', 'rewards_transaction_popup', 'offers_popup', 'intent_engine', 'search_prompt', 'retargeting_prompt') AND td.offer_presented = true THEN td.user_id END) AS click_users,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN td.action = 'click' AND td.surface IN ('prompt', 'login_prompt', 'chatgpt', 'chat_gpt', 'gpt', 'ai_offers', 'rewards_transaction_popup', 'offers_popup', 'intent_engine', 'search_prompt', 'retargeting_prompt') AND td.offer_presented = true THEN td.req_offer END) AS clicks,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN td.action = 'click' AND td.surface IN ('prompt', 'login_prompt', 'chatgpt', 'chat_gpt', 'gpt', 'ai_offers', 'rewards_transaction_popup', 'offers_popup', 'intent_engine', 'search_prompt', 'retargeting_prompt') AND td.offer_presented = true THEN 1 END) AS clicks_raw,
    -- COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN td.action = 'click' AND td.surface IN (${OFFER_SURFACES.map(s => `'${s}'`).join(', ')}) AND td.offer_presented = true THEN td.anonymous_id END) AS click_anonymous_ids,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN td.action = 'close' AND td.surface IN ('prompt', 'login_prompt', 'chatgpt', 'chat_gpt', 'gpt', 'ai_offers', 'rewards_transaction_popup', 'offers_popup', 'intent_engine', 'search_prompt', 'retargeting_prompt') AND td.offer_presented = true THEN td.user_id END) AS close_users,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN td.action = 'close' AND td.surface IN ('prompt', 'login_prompt', 'chatgpt', 'chat_gpt', 'gpt', 'ai_offers', 'rewards_transaction_popup', 'offers_popup', 'intent_engine', 'search_prompt', 'retargeting_prompt') AND td.offer_presented = true THEN 1 END) AS closes,
    -- COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN td.action = 'close' AND td.surface IN (${OFFER_SURFACES.map(s => `'${s}'`).join(', ')}) AND td.offer_presented = true THEN td.anonymous_id END) AS close_anonymous_ids,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN td.action = 'redeem' AND td.surface IN ('prompt', 'login_prompt', 'chatgpt', 'chat_gpt', 'gpt', 'ai_offers', 'rewards_transaction_popup', 'offers_popup', 'intent_engine', 'search_prompt', 'retargeting_prompt') AND td.offer_presented = true THEN td.user_id END) AS redeem_users,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN td.action = 'redeem' AND td.surface IN ('prompt', 'login_prompt', 'chatgpt', 'chat_gpt', 'gpt', 'ai_offers', 'rewards_transaction_popup', 'offers_popup', 'intent_engine', 'search_prompt', 'retargeting_prompt') AND td.offer_presented = true THEN td.req_offer END) AS redeems,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN td.action = 'redeem' AND td.surface IN ('prompt', 'login_prompt', 'chatgpt', 'chat_gpt', 'gpt', 'ai_offers', 'rewards_transaction_popup', 'offers_popup', 'intent_engine', 'search_prompt', 'retargeting_prompt') AND td.offer_presented = true THEN 1 END) AS redeems_raw,
    -- COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN td.action = 'redeem' AND td.surface IN (${OFFER_SURFACES.map(s => `'${s}'`).join(', ')}) AND td.offer_presented = true THEN td.anonymous_id END) AS redeem_anonymous_ids,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN td.action IN ('show', 'view') AND td.surface = 'error_prompt' AND td.offer_presented = true THEN td.user_id END) AS error_users,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN td.action IN ('show', 'view') AND td.surface = 'error_prompt' AND td.offer_presented = true THEN 1 END) AS errors,
    -- COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN td.action IN ('show', 'view') AND td.surface = 'error_prompt' AND td.offer_presented = true THEN td.anonymous_id END) AS error_anonymous_ids,
    
    -- No-show metrics (Phase 3 - Limited implementation, data not available for all reasons)
    0 AS no_shows_cooldown, 0 AS no_shows_tied_lost, 0 AS no_shows_not_funded, 0 AS no_shows_lower_bid, 0 AS no_shows_lower_campaign_boost, 0 AS no_shows_lower_offergroup_boost, 0 AS total_no_shows,
    
    -- Placement metrics (both hourly and daily using grain-aware JOIN)
    COALESCE(MAX(pm.total_placements), 0) AS total_placements,
    COALESCE(MAX(pm.total_placement_hashes), 0) AS total_placement_hashes,
    COALESCE(MAX(pm.total_audience_ids), 0) AS total_audience_ids, 
    
    -- Direct transaction metrics (DAILY ONLY - used for both grains)
    COALESCE(MAX(dt_day.offer_aff_trx), 0) AS offer_aff_trx,
    COALESCE(MAX(dt_day.trx_devices), 0) AS trx_devices,
    COALESCE(MAX(dt_day.trx_anonymous_ids), 0) AS trx_anonymous_ids,
    COALESCE(MAX(dt_day.gmv_dollars), 0.0) AS gmv_dollars,
    COALESCE(MAX(dt_day.commission_dollars), 0.0) AS commission_dollars,
    
    -- Budget and awards metrics (DAILY ONLY - used for both grains)
    COALESCE(MAX(ba_day.millipoints_awarded), 0) AS millipoints_awarded,
    COALESCE(MAX(ba_day.dollars_awarded), 0.0) AS dollars_awarded,
    COALESCE(MAX(ba_day.unique_awards), 0) AS unique_awards,
    COALESCE(MAX(ba_day.awarded_devices), 0) AS awarded_devices,
    COALESCE(MAX(ba_day.awarded_anonymous_ids), 0) AS awarded_anonymous_ids,
    IFNULL(ANY_VALUE(ba_day.award_offer_ids), []) AS award_offer_ids,
    COALESCE(MAX(ba_day.budget_usedinmillipoints), 0) AS budget_usedinmillipoints,
    COALESCE(MAX(ba_day.budget_usedindollars), 0.0) AS budget_usedindollars,
    
    -- Click attribution metrics (Phase 2 - ALL PERIODS, filtered later)
    COALESCE(MAX(ca24h_day.click_transactions_24h), 0) AS click_transactions_24h,
    COALESCE(MAX(ca24h_day.click_devices_24h), 0) AS click_devices_24h,
    COALESCE(MAX(ca24h_day.click_anonymous_ids_24h), 0) AS click_anonymous_ids_24h,
    COALESCE(MAX(ca24h_day.click_gmv_dollars_24h), 0.0) AS click_gmv_dollars_24h,
    COALESCE(MAX(ca24h_day.click_commission_dollars_24h), 0.0) AS click_commission_dollars_24h,
    COALESCE(MAX(ca7d_day.click_transactions_7d), 0) AS click_transactions_7d,
    COALESCE(MAX(ca7d_day.click_devices_7d), 0) AS click_devices_7d,
    COALESCE(MAX(ca7d_day.click_anonymous_ids_7d), 0) AS click_anonymous_ids_7d,
    COALESCE(MAX(ca7d_day.click_gmv_dollars_7d), 0.0) AS click_gmv_dollars_7d,
    COALESCE(MAX(ca7d_day.click_commission_dollars_7d), 0.0) AS click_commission_dollars_7d,
    
    -- View attribution metrics (Phase 2 - ALL PERIODS, filtered later) 
    COALESCE(MAX(va24h_day.view_transactions_24h), 0) AS view_transactions_24h,
    COALESCE(MAX(va24h_day.view_devices_24h), 0) AS view_devices_24h,
    COALESCE(MAX(va24h_day.view_anonymous_ids_24h), 0) AS view_anonymous_ids_24h,
    COALESCE(MAX(va24h_day.view_gmv_dollars_24h), 0.0) AS view_gmv_dollars_24h,
    COALESCE(MAX(va24h_day.view_commission_dollars_24h), 0.0) AS view_commission_dollars_24h,
    COALESCE(MAX(va7d_day.view_transactions_7d), 0) AS view_transactions_7d,
    COALESCE(MAX(va7d_day.view_devices_7d), 0) AS view_devices_7d,
    COALESCE(MAX(va7d_day.view_anonymous_ids_7d), 0) AS view_anonymous_ids_7d,
    COALESCE(MAX(va7d_day.view_gmv_dollars_7d), 0.0) AS view_gmv_dollars_7d,
    COALESCE(MAX(va7d_day.view_commission_dollars_7d), 0.0) AS view_commission_dollars_7d,
    
    -- Checkout attribution metrics (Phase 2 - ALL PERIODS, filtered later)
    COALESCE(MAX(co24h_day.checkout_detections_24h), 0) AS checkout_detections_24h,
    COALESCE(MAX(co24h_day.checkout_anonymous_ids_24h), 0) AS checkout_anonymous_ids_24h,
    COALESCE(MAX(co24h_day.avg_checkout_score_24h), 0.0) AS avg_checkout_score_24h,
    COALESCE(MAX(co7d_day.checkout_detections_7d), 0) AS checkout_detections_7d,
    COALESCE(MAX(co7d_day.checkout_anonymous_ids_7d), 0) AS checkout_anonymous_ids_7d,
    COALESCE(MAX(co7d_day.avg_checkout_score_7d), 0.0) AS avg_checkout_score_7d, 
    
    -- Balance and claims metrics (DAILY ONLY - used for both grains)
    COALESCE(MAX(bc_day.user_balance_burned_millipoints), 0) AS user_balance_burned_millipoints,
    COALESCE(MAX(bc_day.user_balance_burned_millipoints_dollars), 0.0) AS user_balance_burned_millipoints_dollars,
    COALESCE(MAX(bc_day.total_claims), 0) AS total_claims,
    COALESCE(MAX(bc_day.claimed_devices), 0) AS claimed_devices,
    COALESCE(MAX(bc_day.claimed_anonymous_ids), 0) AS claimed_anonymous_ids,
    IFNULL(ANY_VALUE(bc_day.claimed_offer_ids), []) AS claimed_offer_ids
    
  FROM time_dimensions td
  -- Join direct transaction data (DAILY ONLY - used for both hourly and daily GROUPING SETS)
  LEFT JOIN direct_transactions dt_day 
    ON dt_day.campaign_id = td.campaign_id 
    AND dt_day.merchant_id = td.merchant_id 
    AND dt_day.dt_day = td.day_grain
  -- Join budget/awards data (DAILY ONLY - used for both hourly and daily GROUPING SETS)
  LEFT JOIN budget_awards ba_day 
    ON ba_day.campaign_id = td.campaign_id 
    AND ba_day.merchant_id = td.merchant_id 
    AND ba_day.dt_day = td.day_grain
  -- Join attribution data (DAILY ONLY - optimized performance)
  LEFT JOIN click_attribution_24h ca24h_day
    ON ca24h_day.campaign_id = td.campaign_id 
    AND ca24h_day.merchant_id = td.merchant_id 
    AND ca24h_day.dt_day = td.day_grain
  LEFT JOIN click_attribution_7d ca7d_day
    ON ca7d_day.campaign_id = td.campaign_id 
    AND ca7d_day.merchant_id = td.merchant_id 
    AND ca7d_day.dt_day = td.day_grain
  LEFT JOIN view_attribution_24h va24h_day
    ON va24h_day.campaign_id = td.campaign_id 
    AND va24h_day.merchant_id = td.merchant_id 
    AND va24h_day.dt_day = td.day_grain
  LEFT JOIN view_attribution_7d va7d_day
    ON va7d_day.campaign_id = td.campaign_id 
    AND va7d_day.merchant_id = td.merchant_id 
    AND va7d_day.dt_day = td.day_grain
  -- Join checkout attribution data (DAILY ONLY - optimized performance)
  LEFT JOIN checkout_attribution_24h co24h_day
    ON co24h_day.campaign_id = td.campaign_id 
    AND co24h_day.merchant_id = td.merchant_id 
    AND co24h_day.dt_day = td.day_grain
  LEFT JOIN checkout_attribution_7d co7d_day
    ON co7d_day.campaign_id = td.campaign_id 
    AND co7d_day.merchant_id = td.merchant_id 
    AND co7d_day.dt_day = td.day_grain
  -- Join placement metrics - simply match on the coalesced time and let period handle grain selection
  LEFT JOIN placement_metrics pm
    ON pm.campaign_id = td.campaign_id 
    AND pm.merchant_id = td.merchant_id 
    AND pm.dt_time = COALESCE(td.hour_grain, td.day_grain)
  -- Join balance/claims data (DAILY ONLY - used for both hourly and daily GROUPING SETS)
  LEFT JOIN balance_claims bc_day
    ON bc_day.campaign_id = td.campaign_id 
    AND bc_day.merchant_id = td.merchant_id 
    AND bc_day.dt_day = td.day_grain
  
  -- GROUPING SETS to get both hourly and daily aggregations in one pass
  GROUP BY GROUPING SETS (
    (td.hour_grain, td.campaign_id, td.merchant_id, td.source_type, td.intent_engine_type),  -- Hourly grain
    (td.day_grain, td.campaign_id, td.merchant_id, td.source_type, td.intent_engine_type)    -- Daily grain
  )
),

-- Apply attribution filtering based on period
multi_grain_data AS (
  SELECT
    *,
    -- Click attribution metrics (DAILY ONLY to prevent overcounting)
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN click_transactions_24h ELSE NULL END AS click_transactions_24h_final,
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN click_devices_24h ELSE NULL END AS click_devices_24h_final,
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN click_anonymous_ids_24h ELSE NULL END AS click_anonymous_ids_24h_final,
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN click_gmv_dollars_24h ELSE NULL END AS click_gmv_dollars_24h_final,
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN click_commission_dollars_24h ELSE NULL END AS click_commission_dollars_24h_final,
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN click_transactions_7d ELSE NULL END AS click_transactions_7d_final,
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN click_devices_7d ELSE NULL END AS click_devices_7d_final,
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN click_anonymous_ids_7d ELSE NULL END AS click_anonymous_ids_7d_final,
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN click_gmv_dollars_7d ELSE NULL END AS click_gmv_dollars_7d_final,
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN click_commission_dollars_7d ELSE NULL END AS click_commission_dollars_7d_final,
    -- View attribution metrics (DAILY ONLY to prevent overcounting)
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN view_transactions_24h ELSE NULL END AS view_transactions_24h_final,
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN view_devices_24h ELSE NULL END AS view_devices_24h_final,
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN view_anonymous_ids_24h ELSE NULL END AS view_anonymous_ids_24h_final,
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN view_gmv_dollars_24h ELSE NULL END AS view_gmv_dollars_24h_final,
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN view_commission_dollars_24h ELSE NULL END AS view_commission_dollars_24h_final,
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN view_transactions_7d ELSE NULL END AS view_transactions_7d_final,
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN view_devices_7d ELSE NULL END AS view_devices_7d_final,
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN view_anonymous_ids_7d ELSE NULL END AS view_anonymous_ids_7d_final,
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN view_gmv_dollars_7d ELSE NULL END AS view_gmv_dollars_7d_final,
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN view_commission_dollars_7d ELSE NULL END AS view_commission_dollars_7d_final,
    -- Checkout attribution metrics (DAILY ONLY to prevent overcounting)
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN checkout_detections_24h ELSE NULL END AS checkout_detections_24h_final,
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN checkout_anonymous_ids_24h ELSE NULL END AS checkout_anonymous_ids_24h_final,
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN avg_checkout_score_24h ELSE NULL END AS avg_checkout_score_24h_final,
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN checkout_detections_7d ELSE NULL END AS checkout_detections_7d_final,
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN checkout_anonymous_ids_7d ELSE NULL END AS checkout_anonymous_ids_7d_final,
    CASE WHEN period = 'day' THEN avg_checkout_score_7d ELSE NULL END AS avg_checkout_score_7d_final
  FROM multi_grain_base
)

-- Select final result with proper column names
SELECT 
  -- Context-aware dt field: DATETIME truncated to appropriate granularity
  CASE 
    WHEN period = 'day' THEN DATETIME_TRUNC(dt_hour, DAY)
    WHEN period = 'hour' THEN DATETIME_TRUNC(dt_hour, HOUR)
    ELSE dt_hour
  END AS dt,
  period,
  campaign_id,
  merchant_id,
  source_type,
  intent_engine_type,
  campaign_created_ts,
  campaign_updated_ts,
  campaign_ended_ts,
  campaign_active,
  campaign_budget,
  campaign_state,
  campaign_start_ts,
  offergroups,
  consideration_users,
  considerations,
  -- consideration_anonymous_ids,
  show_users,
  shows,
  shows_raw,
  -- show_anonymous_ids,
  click_users,
  clicks,
  clicks_raw,
  -- click_anonymous_ids,
  close_users,
  closes,
  -- close_anonymous_ids,
  redeem_users,
  redeems,
  redeems_raw,
  -- redeem_anonymous_ids,
  error_users,
  errors,
  -- error_anonymous_ids,
  no_shows_cooldown,
  no_shows_tied_lost,
  no_shows_not_funded,
  no_shows_lower_bid,
  no_shows_lower_campaign_boost,
  no_shows_lower_offergroup_boost,
  total_no_shows,
  total_placements,
  total_placement_hashes,
  total_audience_ids,
  offer_aff_trx,
  trx_devices,
  trx_anonymous_ids,
  gmv_dollars,
  commission_dollars,
  millipoints_awarded,
  dollars_awarded,
  unique_awards,
  awarded_devices,
  awarded_anonymous_ids,
  award_offer_ids,
  budget_usedinmillipoints,
  budget_usedindollars,
  -- Attribution metrics with proper names (NULL for hourly records)
  click_transactions_24h_final AS click_transactions_24h,
  click_devices_24h_final AS click_devices_24h,
  click_anonymous_ids_24h_final AS click_anonymous_ids_24h,
  click_gmv_dollars_24h_final AS click_gmv_dollars_24h,
  click_commission_dollars_24h_final AS click_commission_dollars_24h,
  click_transactions_7d_final AS click_transactions_7d,
  click_devices_7d_final AS click_devices_7d,
  click_anonymous_ids_7d_final AS click_anonymous_ids_7d,
  click_gmv_dollars_7d_final AS click_gmv_dollars_7d,
  click_commission_dollars_7d_final AS click_commission_dollars_7d,
  view_transactions_24h_final AS view_transactions_24h,
  view_devices_24h_final AS view_devices_24h,
  view_anonymous_ids_24h_final AS view_anonymous_ids_24h,
  view_gmv_dollars_24h_final AS view_gmv_dollars_24h,
  view_commission_dollars_24h_final AS view_commission_dollars_24h,
  view_transactions_7d_final AS view_transactions_7d,
  view_devices_7d_final AS view_devices_7d,
  view_anonymous_ids_7d_final AS view_anonymous_ids_7d,
  view_gmv_dollars_7d_final AS view_gmv_dollars_7d,
  view_commission_dollars_7d_final AS view_commission_dollars_7d,
  -- Checkout attribution metrics (NULL for hourly records)
  checkout_detections_24h_final AS checkout_detections_24h,
  checkout_anonymous_ids_24h_final AS checkout_anonymous_ids_24h,
  avg_checkout_score_24h_final AS avg_checkout_score_24h,
  checkout_detections_7d_final AS checkout_detections_7d,
  checkout_anonymous_ids_7d_final AS checkout_anonymous_ids_7d,
  avg_checkout_score_7d_final AS avg_checkout_score_7d,
  user_balance_burned_millipoints,
  user_balance_burned_millipoints_dollars,
  total_claims,
  claimed_devices,
  claimed_anonymous_ids,
  claimed_offer_ids
FROM multi_grain_data

-- Daily Campaign Analytics for ALL campaigns - Filtered view from base table
