model.name: offer_expanded_view
model.description: Unified view of intent engine offers combining extension and AI offer data with placement, cooldown, and enrichment data - captures all ground-level events including duplicates from dual tracking

config.description: Unified view of intent engine offers combining extension and AI offer data with placement, cooldown, and enrichment data - captures all ground-level events including duplicates from dual tracking

model.sqlContent:
-- Intent Engine Offer Expanded View - Ground-level Event Stream
-- Debug: Preserves all events including duplicates from dual tracking systems (analytics.js + @segment/analytics-node)
WITH deduplicated_placements AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT
    placementHash,
    template,
    placementId,
    match,
    hostname,
    offerGroupId
  FROM `piedotorg-production.analytics_etl.campaigns_placements`
),

-- Campaign metadata to enrich offers
campaign_data AS (
  SELECT 
    campaignId,
    budget,
    merchantId,
    TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(created) AS campaign_created_ts,
    COALESCE(TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(updated), TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(created)) AS campaign_updated_ts,
    CASE 
      WHEN endDate IS NOT NULL THEN TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(endDate)
      WHEN state IN ('PAUSED', 'ENDED', 'CANCELLED', 'ARCHIVED') THEN COALESCE(TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(updated), TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(created))
      ELSE NULL 
    END AS campaign_ended_ts,
    CASE WHEN state = 'ACTIVE' THEN true ELSE false END AS active,
    state AS campaign_state,
    CASE WHEN startDate IS NOT NULL THEN TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(startDate) ELSE TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(created) END AS campaign_start_ts
  FROM `piedotorg-production.analytics_etl.campaigns_campaigns`
),

-- Parse transactions_adviews for AI_AD transactions
ai_ad_transactions AS (
  SELECT
    userId,
    adViewId,
    state AS transaction_state,
    created AS transaction_created_ms,
    millipoints,
    type AS transaction_type,
    updated AS transaction_updated_ms,
    JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(metadata, '$.offerId') AS offer_id,
    JSON_EXTRACT_SCALAR(metadata, '$.requestId') AS request_id
  FROM `piedotorg-production.analytics_etl.transactions_adviews`
  WHERE type = 'AI_AD'
    AND metadata IS NOT NULL
),

-- Unified frontend offer data (ext + AI + web)
unified_frontend_offers AS (
  -- Extension table with AI/web fields as NULL
  SELECT 
    request_id,
    offer_id,
    action,
    surface,
    is_rewards,
    user_id,
    id,
    timestamp AS timestamp_frontend,
    NULL AS outbound_url,
    context_user_agent AS user_agent,
    ext_tag_id,
    'ext' AS source_type,
    -- Extension offer type classification
    CASE 
      WHEN is_rewards = true THEN 'extension_rewards'
      WHEN is_rewards = false THEN 'extension_regular'
      ELSE 'extension_unknown'
    END AS offer_type,
    -- Tenant fields (NULL for extension)
    NULL AS ai_tenant_id,
    NULL AS ai_tenant_client_id,
    NULL AS tenant_rewards_enabled,
    -- Ext-specific fields (keep as-is)
    anonymous_id,
    referer_url,
    platform,
    context_app_name,
    context_app_version,
    context_browser,
    context_browser_version,
    context_device_id,
    context_id,
    context_ip,
    context_library_name,
    context_library_version,
    context_locale,
    context_os_os,
    context_os_version,
    context_os_name,
    context_device_type,
    context_time_zone,
    event,
    event_text,
    loaded_at,
    original_timestamp,
    received_at,
    sent_at,
    uuid_ts
  FROM `piedotorg-production.shopping_extension_production.ext_intent_engine_offer`
  
  UNION ALL
  
  -- AI table with ext/web fields as NULL  
  SELECT
    request_id,
    offer_id, 
    action,
    surface,
    is_rewards,
    user_id,
    id,
    TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(timestamp_ms) AS timestamp_frontend,
    outbound_url,
    user_agent,
    tag_id AS ext_tag_id,
    'ai' AS source_type,
    -- AI offer type classification
    CASE 
      WHEN REGEXP_CONTAINS(outbound_url, r'rewardsType=RATE_MAX') THEN 'cashback'
      WHEN REGEXP_CONTAINS(outbound_url, r'rewardsType=RATE_PERCENT') THEN 'cashback'
      WHEN REGEXP_CONTAINS(outbound_url, r'rewardsType=&|rewardsType=$') THEN 'regular_offer'
      WHEN REGEXP_CONTAINS(outbound_url, r'rewardsType=FIXED') THEN 'fixed_reward'
      ELSE 'other'
    END AS offer_type,
    -- Tenant fields from AI offers
    tenant_id AS ai_tenant_id,
    tenant_client_id AS ai_tenant_client_id,
    tenant_rewards_enabled,
    -- NULL for all ext-specific fields
    NULL AS anonymous_id,
    NULL AS referer_url,
    NULL AS platform,
    NULL AS context_app_name,
    NULL AS context_app_version,
    NULL AS context_browser,
    NULL AS context_browser_version,
    NULL AS context_device_id,
    NULL AS context_id,
    NULL AS context_ip,
    NULL AS context_library_name,
    NULL AS context_library_version,
    NULL AS context_locale,
    NULL AS context_os_os,
    NULL AS context_os_version,
    NULL AS context_os_name,
    NULL AS context_device_type,
    NULL AS context_time_zone,
    NULL AS event,
    NULL AS event_text,
    NULL AS loaded_at,
    NULL AS original_timestamp,
    NULL AS received_at,
    NULL AS sent_at,
    NULL AS uuid_ts
  FROM `piedotorg-production.backend_analytics.ai_intent_engine_offer`
  
  UNION ALL
  
  -- Website table with ext/AI fields as NULL
  SELECT
    request_id,
    offer_id,
    action,
    surface,
    is_rewards,
    user_id,
    id,
    timestamp AS timestamp_frontend,
    NULL AS outbound_url,  -- Website doesn't have outbound_url like AI
    context_user_agent AS user_agent,
    NULL AS ext_tag_id,  -- Website doesn't have tag_id
    'web' AS source_type,
    -- Website offer type classification
    CASE 
      WHEN is_rewards = true THEN 'website_rewards'
      WHEN is_rewards = false THEN 'website_regular'
      ELSE 'website_unknown'
    END AS offer_type,
    -- Tenant fields (NULL for website)
    NULL AS ai_tenant_id,
    NULL AS ai_tenant_client_id,
    NULL AS tenant_rewards_enabled,
    -- Use website anonymous_id for counting
    anonymous_id,
    NULL AS referer_url,  -- Ignoring context fields per plan
    NULL AS platform,
    NULL AS context_app_name,
    NULL AS context_app_version,
    NULL AS context_browser,
    NULL AS context_browser_version,
    NULL AS context_device_id,
    NULL AS context_id,
    NULL AS context_ip,
    NULL AS context_library_name,
    NULL AS context_library_version,
    context_locale,
    NULL AS context_os_os,
    NULL AS context_os_version,
    NULL AS context_os_name,
    context_device_type,
    context_timezone AS context_time_zone,
    event,
    event_text,
    loaded_at,
    original_timestamp,
    received_at,
    sent_at,
    uuid_ts
  FROM `piedotorg-production.website_production.web_intent_engine_offer`
)

SELECT
  TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(be.timestamp_ms) AS ts,
  COALESCE(be.request_id, fe.request_id) request_id,
  be.* EXCEPT(request_id, tenant_id, tenant_client_id),
  fe.* EXCEPT(request_id, offer_id, user_id, ai_tenant_id, ai_tenant_client_id, tenant_rewards_enabled),
  fe.offer_id as fe_offer_id,
  fe.offer_id = be.offer_id AS offer_id_match,
  cooldown_id IS NOT NULL AS cooldown_active,
  cooldown_id,
  cooldown_code,
  cooldown_start,
  cooldown_end,
  scope,
  
  -- Campaign metadata
  cd.active AS campaign_active,
  cd.campaign_state,
  cd.budget AS campaign_budget,
  cd.campaign_created_ts,
  cd.campaign_updated_ts,
  cd.campaign_ended_ts,
  cd.campaign_start_ts,

  -- Computed offer_presented field  
  be.top_offer = true OR (be.intent_engine_type IN ('AI', 'MCP') AND fe.request_id IS NOT NULL) AS offer_presented,

  -- Collect an array of structs, one per placement_hash (deduplicated)
  ARRAY_AGG(
    STRUCT(
      placement_hash,
      p.template        AS template,
      p.placementId     AS placementId,
      p.match           AS match,
      p.hostname
    )
  ) AS placements,
  
  -- Transaction fields for AI_AD offers
  txn.transaction_state,
  txn.transaction_created_ms,
  txn.transaction_updated_ms,
  txn.millipoints,
  txn.adViewId,
  txn.userId AS transaction_user_id,
  
  -- Composite key for distinct counting
  CONCAT(COALESCE(be.request_id, fe.request_id), '|', be.offer_id) AS req_offer,
  
  -- Tenant fields (combined from backend and AI)
  COALESCE(be.tenant_id, fe.ai_tenant_id) AS tenant_id,
  COALESCE(be.tenant_client_id, fe.ai_tenant_client_id) AS tenant_client_id,
  fe.tenant_rewards_enabled

FROM
  `piedotorg-production.backend_analytics.intent_engine_offer_group_match` AS be
LEFT JOIN
  unified_frontend_offers AS fe
ON be.request_id = fe.request_id 
  AND be.offer_id = fe.offer_id
  -- Match on tenant_client_id for AI offers
  AND (fe.source_type != 'ai' OR be.tenant_client_id = fe.ai_tenant_client_id)

LEFT JOIN UNNEST(be.placement_hashes) AS placement_hash

LEFT JOIN
  deduplicated_placements AS p
ON
  p.placementHash = placement_hash
  and p.offerGroupId = be.offergroup_id

LEFT JOIN 
  `piedotorg-production.backend_analytics.intent_engine_cooldown_triggered` c
ON 
  TIMESTAMP_TRUNC(TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(be.timestamp_ms), SECOND) BETWEEN cooldown_start AND cooldown_end 
  AND be.device_id = c.device_id 
  AND p.offerGroupId = be.offergroup_id

LEFT JOIN
  campaign_data cd
ON
  be.campaign_id = cd.campaignId
  AND be.merchant_id = cd.merchantId
  AND (
    DATE(TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(be.timestamp_ms)) >= DATE(cd.campaign_start_ts)
    AND (cd.campaign_ended_ts IS NULL OR DATE(TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(be.timestamp_ms)) <= DATE(cd.campaign_ended_ts))
  )

LEFT JOIN
  ai_ad_transactions txn
ON
  be.offer_id = txn.offer_id
  AND be.request_id = txn.request_id
  AND be.intent_engine_type IN ('AI', 'MCP')

GROUP BY
  ALL

model.name: offer_template_hostname_day
model.description: Daily aggregation of offer interactions by first template and first hostname for active campaigns

config.description: Daily aggregation of offer interactions by first template and first hostname for active campaigns

model.sqlContent:
SELECT
  DATE(ts) AS dt,
  
  -- Extract first template and hostname, handling NULLs explicitly
  CASE 
    WHEN ARRAY_LENGTH(placements) > 0 THEN placements[OFFSET(0)].template
    ELSE NULL 
  END AS first_template,
  
  CASE 
    WHEN ARRAY_LENGTH(placements) > 0 THEN placements[OFFSET(0)].hostname  
    ELSE NULL
  END AS first_hostname,
  
  -- Show metrics (prompt/login_prompt surfaces only, top offers)
  COUNT(CASE WHEN action = 'show' AND surface IN ('prompt', 'login_prompt') AND top_offer = true THEN 1 END) AS shows,
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN action = 'show' AND surface IN ('prompt', 'login_prompt') AND top_offer = true THEN device_id END) AS show_devices,
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN action = 'show' AND surface IN ('prompt', 'login_prompt') AND top_offer = true THEN anonymous_id END) AS show_anonymous_ids,
  
  -- Click metrics (prompt/login_prompt surfaces only, top offers)
  COUNT(CASE WHEN action = 'click' AND surface IN ('prompt', 'login_prompt') AND top_offer = true THEN 1 END) AS clicks,
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN action = 'click' AND surface IN ('prompt', 'login_prompt') AND top_offer = true THEN device_id END) AS click_devices,
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN action = 'click' AND surface IN ('prompt', 'login_prompt') AND top_offer = true THEN anonymous_id END) AS click_anonymous_ids,
  
  -- Redeem metrics (prompt/login_prompt surfaces only, top offers)
  COUNT(CASE WHEN action = 'redeem' AND surface IN ('prompt', 'login_prompt') AND top_offer = true THEN 1 END) AS redeems,
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN action = 'redeem' AND surface IN ('prompt', 'login_prompt') AND top_offer = true THEN device_id END) AS redeem_devices,
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN action = 'redeem' AND surface IN ('prompt', 'login_prompt') AND top_offer = true THEN anonymous_id END) AS redeem_anonymous_ids,
  
  -- Error metrics (error_prompt surface, top offers)
  COUNT(CASE WHEN action = 'show' AND surface = 'error_prompt' AND top_offer = true THEN 1 END) AS errors,
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN action = 'show' AND surface = 'error_prompt' AND top_offer = true THEN device_id END) AS error_devices,
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN action = 'show' AND surface = 'error_prompt' AND top_offer = true THEN anonymous_id END) AS error_anonymous_ids,
  
  COUNT(*) AS total_events,
  
  -- Calculate rates (handle division by zero)
  SAFE_DIVIDE(COUNT(CASE WHEN action = 'click' AND surface IN ('prompt', 'login_prompt') AND top_offer = true THEN 1 END), 
              COUNT(CASE WHEN action = 'show' AND surface IN ('prompt', 'login_prompt') AND top_offer = true THEN 1 END)) AS click_through_rate,
  SAFE_DIVIDE(COUNT(CASE WHEN action = 'redeem' AND surface IN ('prompt', 'login_prompt') AND top_offer = true THEN 1 END), 
              COUNT(CASE WHEN action = 'show' AND surface IN ('prompt', 'login_prompt') AND top_offer = true THEN 1 END)) AS redeem_rate

FROM `piedotorg-production.intent_engine_dev.offer_expanded_view`

WHERE 
  -- Filter to active campaigns only
  campaign_active = true
  AND campaign_state = 'ACTIVE'
  
GROUP BY
  dt,
  first_template,
  first_hostname

model.name: offer_unified_view
model.description: Unified table of the complete offer funnel from backend consideration through frontend actions to conversion. Each row represents one action in the funnel.

config.description: Unified table of the complete offer funnel from backend consideration through frontend actions to conversion. Each row represents one action in the funnel.

model.sqlContent:
-- Unified offer funnel view combining all stages
WITH 
-- 1. Backend Consideration Stage
backend_consideration AS (
  SELECT
    'backend_match' AS source_table,
    action,
    CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS attribution_model,
    
    -- Timestamps
    backend_ts AS event_ts,
    backend_ts,
    
    -- Core Identifiers
    request_id,
    offer_id,
    req_offer,
    
    -- Campaign & Merchant
    campaign_id,
    merchant_id,
    campaign_boost,
    campaign_active,
    campaign_state,
    campaign_budget,
    
    -- User Identifiers
    user_id,
    CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS anonymous_id,
    device_id,
    
    -- Offer Details
    offer_content,
    offer_click_url,
    offer_cta,
    offer_award,
    offer_distribution,
    top_offer,
    
    -- Offer Group Details
    offergroup_id,
    offergroup_min_bid,
    offergroup_max_bid,
    offergroup_bid_type,
    
    -- Tenant Details
    tenant_id,
    tenant_client_id,
    
    -- Platform & Source
    intent_engine_type,
    CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS source_type,
    client,
    
    -- Frontend Specific (NULL for backend except placement info)
    CAST(NULL AS INT64) AS tag_id,
    CAST(NULL AS INT64) AS ext_tag_id,
    CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS surface,
    CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS outbound_url,
    first_placement_template,
    first_placement_id,
    first_placement_match,
    first_placement_hostname,
    placement_count,
    
    -- Search context
    keywords,
    
    -- Conversion Specific (NULL for backend)
    CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS transaction_id,
    CAST(NULL AS DATETIME) AS transaction_ts,
    CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS transaction_type,
    CAST(NULL AS FLOAT64) AS external_sale_value_dollars,
    CAST(NULL AS FLOAT64) AS external_commission_dollars,
    CAST(NULL AS INT64) AS millipoints,
    CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS attribution_confidence,
    CAST(NULL AS INT64) AS attribution_window_hours,
    CAST(NULL AS INT64) AS time_to_conversion_hours
    
  FROM `piedotorg-production.fact_tables_dev.fact_intent_engine_offer_group_match`
),

-- 2. Frontend Actions Stage (impressions, clicks, dismissals)
frontend_actions AS (
  SELECT
    'frontend_offer' AS source_table,
    -- Use surface-specific action names for error and login prompts
    CASE 
      WHEN surface = 'error_prompt' THEN 'error_prompt'
      WHEN surface = 'login_prompt' THEN 'login_prompt'
      ELSE action
    END AS action,
    CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS attribution_model,
    
    -- Timestamps
    event_ts,
    backend_ts,
    
    -- Core Identifiers
    request_id,
    offer_id,
    req_offer,
    
    -- Campaign & Merchant
    campaign_id,
    merchant_id,
    campaign_boost,
    campaign_active,
    campaign_state,
    campaign_budget,
    
    -- User Identifiers
    user_id,
    anonymous_id,
    device_id,
    
    -- Offer Details
    offer_content,
    CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS offer_click_url,
    offer_cta,
    offer_award,
    CAST(NULL AS INT64) AS offer_distribution,
    top_offer,
    
    -- Offer Group Details
    offergroup_id,
    offergroup_min_bid,
    offergroup_max_bid,
    offergroup_bid_type,
    
    -- Tenant Details
    tenant_id,
    tenant_client_id,
    
    -- Platform & Source
    intent_engine_type,
    source_type,
    CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS client,
    
    -- Frontend Specific
    tag_id,
    ext_tag_id,
    surface,
    outbound_url,
    first_placement_template,
    first_placement_id,
    first_placement_match,
    first_placement_hostname,
    placement_count,
    
    -- Search context
    keywords,  -- Keywords from mapping via int_fe_offer
    
    -- Conversion Specific (NULL for frontend)
    CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS transaction_id,
    CAST(NULL AS DATETIME) AS transaction_ts,
    CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS transaction_type,
    CAST(NULL AS FLOAT64) AS external_sale_value_dollars,
    CAST(NULL AS FLOAT64) AS external_commission_dollars,
    CAST(NULL AS INT64) AS millipoints,
    CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS attribution_confidence,
    CAST(NULL AS INT64) AS attribution_window_hours,
    CAST(NULL AS INT64) AS time_to_conversion_hours
    
  FROM `piedotorg-production.fact_tables_dev.int_fe_offer`
),

-- 3. Conversion Stage (attributed transactions)
conversions AS (
  SELECT
    'attribution_model' AS source_table,
    'conversion' AS action,
    attribution_model,
    
    -- Timestamps
    CAST(transaction_ts AS TIMESTAMP) AS event_ts,
    CAST(attribution_event_ts AS TIMESTAMP) AS backend_ts,
    
    -- Core Identifiers
    request_id,
    offer_id,
    req_offer,
    
    -- Campaign & Merchant
    campaign_id,
    merchant_id,
    CAST(NULL AS INT64) AS campaign_boost,
    CAST(NULL AS BOOLEAN) AS campaign_active,
    CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS campaign_state,
    CAST(NULL AS INT64) AS campaign_budget,
    
    -- User Identifiers
    user_id,
    anonymous_id,
    device_id,
    
    -- Offer Details
    offer_content,
    CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS offer_click_url,
    CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS offer_cta,
    offer_award,
    CAST(NULL AS INT64) AS offer_distribution,
    CAST(NULL AS BOOLEAN) AS top_offer,
    
    -- Offer Group Details (NULL for conversions)
    CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS offergroup_id,
    CAST(NULL AS INT64) AS offergroup_min_bid,
    CAST(NULL AS INT64) AS offergroup_max_bid,
    CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS offergroup_bid_type,
    
    -- Tenant Details
    tenant_id,
    CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS tenant_client_id,
    
    -- Platform & Source
    intent_engine_type,
    source_type,
    CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS client,
    
    -- Frontend Specific (conversions have placement from click/view events)
    CAST(NULL AS INT64) AS tag_id,
    ext_tag_id,
    CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS surface,
    CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS outbound_url,
    first_placement_template,
    first_placement_id,
    first_placement_match,
    first_placement_hostname,
    placement_count,
    
    -- Search context
    CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS keywords,  -- Conversions don't have keywords directly
    
    -- Conversion Specific
    transaction_id,
    transaction_ts,
    transaction_type,
    external_sale_value_dollars,
    external_commission_dollars,
    millipoints,
    attribution_confidence,
    attribution_window_hours,
    time_to_conversion_hours
    
  FROM `piedotorg-production.fact_tables_dev.fact_offer_attribution_models`
)

-- Union all stages
SELECT * FROM backend_consideration
UNION ALL
SELECT * FROM frontend_actions
UNION ALL
SELECT * FROM conversions

model.name: transactions_expanded_view
model.description: Table of affiliate transactions with enhanced data joins and enrichments - converting to table

config.description: Table of affiliate transactions with enhanced data joins and enrichments - converting to table

model.sqlContent:
-- Affiliate transactions expanded view
-- Debug: Migrated from BigQuery data_science.transactions_expanded_view
WITH
  base_v2_fe_data as (
    select 
    distinct 
    anonymous_id,
    device_id,
    user_id userId,
    ext_tag_id,
    offer_Id, -- this is offer_id linked to campaigns offergroups etc.
    request_id requestId,
    campaign_id,
    top_offer,
    "v2" as offers_version,
  --  null as keyword_matched
    from `piedotorg-production.intent_engine_dev.offer_expanded_view`
   -- where top_offer  -- since we're only interested in top offers that are surfaced
  ),

  base_tag_cte AS (
  SELECT
    ext_tag_id,
    requestid as tagged_request_Id,
    offer_id as tagged_offer_id, -- tagged offer_id
    campaign_id as tagged_campaign_id, --tagged campaign_id
    timestamp AS tag_timestamp,
    context_app_name,
    context_app_version,
    url,
    DATE(timestamp, "America/Los_Angeles") AS dt
  FROM
    `piedotorg-production.extension_production_views.ext_affiliate_tag` left join base_v2_fe_data as v2_fe_data
    using (ext_tag_id)
    where top_offer or top_offer is null 
  GROUP BY
    ALL ),

  base_v1_fe_data as (
    SELECT
      DISTINCT anonymous_id,
--    device_id,
    user_id userId,
    offer_Id AS adofferId, -- Q: is this how V1 rewards are linked to transactions_adoffers?
    "v1" as offers_version,
    CASE WHEN metadata_keyword_matched IS NOT NULL THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS keyword_matched
  FROM
    `piedotorg-production.extension_production_views.ext_rewards_transaction`
  WHERE
    action IN ("click", "login") 
  ),

    
  base_redirect_cte AS (
  SELECT
    anonymousid anonymous_id,
    "standard" AS redirect_type,
    subsrc,
    extTagId ext_tag_id,
    CAST(tagId AS INT64) AS tag_id,  -- AI offers use tagId
    trackId,
    affiliateLinkId,
    sessionid,
    CAST(NULL AS string) AS productid,
    feature,
    merchantId,
    IFNULL(timestamp, TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(sessionid)) AS redirect_timestamp,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY trackId ORDER BY timestamp DESC) AS redirect_row_num
  FROM
    `piedotorg-production.backend_analytics.outbound_redirect`
  QUALIFY
    redirect_row_num = 1 ),
    
  base_product_redirect_cte AS (
  SELECT
    anonymousid anonymous_id,
    "product" AS redirect_type,
    subsrc,
    CAST(extTagId AS INT64) ext_tag_id,
    CAST(tagId AS INT64) AS tag_id,  -- AI offers use tagId
    trackId,
    affiliateLinkId,
    CAST(sessionid AS int64) sessionId,
    productid,
    feature,
    merchantId,
    IFNULL(timestamp, TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(sessionid)) AS redirect_timestamp,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY trackId ORDER BY timestamp DESC) AS redirect_row_num
  FROM
    `piedotorg-production.backend_analytics.product_outbound_redirect`
  QUALIFY
    redirect_row_num = 1 ),
    
  all_redirect_cte AS (
  SELECT
    *
  FROM
    base_redirect_cte
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    *
  FROM
    base_product_redirect_cte),
    
  base_aff_cte AS (
  SELECT
    transactionId,
    trackId,
    TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(externalCreated) AS aff_trx_created_ts,
    externalStatus,
    externalCommission,
    externalSaleValue,
    provider
  FROM
    `piedotorg-production.analytics_etl.transactions_affiliatetransactions` ),
    
  base_trx_cte AS (
  SELECT
    type,
    userId,
    state,
    millipoints,
    TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(confirmed) AS confirmed_ts,
    TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(created) AS trx_trx_created_ts,
    merchantId,
    transactionId
  FROM
    `piedotorg-production.analytics_etl.transactions_transactions`),
    
  offer_campaign_data AS (
  SELECT
    campaignId,
    budget,
    merchantId,
    MIN(TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(created)) AS campaign_created_ts,
    MAX(TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(updated)) AS campaign_updated_ts,
    MAX(CASE
        WHEN active = FALSE THEN TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(updated)
    END
      ) AS campaign_ended_ts,
    MAX(active) AS active
  FROM
    `piedotorg-production.analytics_etl.transactions_campaigns`
  GROUP BY
    ALL ),
    
  base_offers_cte AS (
  SELECT
    DISTINCT 
    -- Fields from transactions_adoffers table
    adOfferType, -- this will be campaign_v2 for v2 Q: what is it for v1?
    adOfferId, --individual transaction adofferId
    millipoints, --this is millipoints burned from user balance
    requestId,
    offerId,
    offerGroupId,
    COALESCE(v1_fe_data.keyword_matched, FALSE) AS keyword_matched,
    transactionId,
    state AS adofferstate,
    COALESCE(campaignId,campaignIdV2) AS campaignId,
   -- budgetUsedInMillipoints, -- deprecated, 
    TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(created) AS ad_offers_created_ts,
    TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(claimed) AS offer_claimed_ts,
    -- Fields from offer_campaign_data table
    campaign_created_ts,
    campaign_ended_ts,
    active,
    COALESCE(v1_fe_data.anonymous_id, v2_fe_data.anonymous_id) AS anonymous_id, -- we pull this from ext_rewards_transaction for v1 rewards transactions
    v2_fe_data.device_id AS device_id,
    userId
  FROM
    `piedotorg-production.analytics_etl.transactions_adoffers` ta
  LEFT JOIN
    offer_campaign_data
  USING
    (campaignId)
  LEFT JOIN
    base_v1_fe_data as v1_fe_data
  USING
    (adofferId, userId) 
         LEFT JOIN base_v2_fe_data as v2_fe_data
     USING (requestId, userId)
  ),
  aff_trx_join AS (
  SELECT
    * EXCEPT(merchantId),
    COALESCE(all_redirect_cte.merchantid, base_trx_cte.merchantid) AS merchantId
  FROM
    base_aff_cte
  LEFT JOIN
    all_redirect_cte
  USING
    (trackId)
  FULL OUTER JOIN
    base_trx_cte
  USING
    (transactionId)
  LEFT JOIN
    base_tag_cte
  USING
    (ext_tag_id) ),
    
  user_id_anon_map AS (
  SELECT
    DISTINCT most_common_anonymous_id most_common_anonymous_id,
    user_id userid
  FROM
    `piedotorg-production.users.user_anon_mapping`),
    
  aff_offers_join AS (
  SELECT
    * EXCEPT(anonymous_id, millipoints),
    COALESCE(aff_trx_join.millipoints) millipoints,
    coalesce(base_offers_cte.millipoints) as balance_burned_millipoints, -- Note we'll need to track user balance burns a bit better especially for AD_VIEW transactions
    COALESCE(aff_trx_join.anonymous_id, base_offers_cte.anonymous_id, user_id_anon_map.most_common_anonymous_id) AS anonymous_id,
    COALESCE(aff_trx_created_ts, offer_claimed_ts, trx_trx_created_ts, redirect_timestamp) AS created_coalesce_ts
  FROM
    aff_trx_join
  FULL OUTER JOIN
    base_offers_cte
  USING
    (transactionId, userId) 
  LEFT JOIN 
    user_id_anon_map 
  USING 
    (userId) )

-- Debug: Final SELECT with alias fields for backward compatibility
SELECT
  * EXCEPT(ext_tag_id, tag_id),
  -- Coalesce ext_tag_id and tag_id for backward compatibility
  COALESCE(ext_tag_id, tag_id) AS ext_tag_id,
  tag_id,  -- Keep tag_id separate for AI-specific analysis
  created_coalesce_ts AS timestamp,
  userId user_id,
  merchantId merchant_id
FROM
  aff_offers_join

model.name: unified_user_feedback
model.description: Unified view of user feedback from uninstall surveys, bug reports, extension feedback, and low-rated reviews

config.description: Unified view of user feedback from uninstall surveys, bug reports, extension feedback, and low-rated reviews

model.sqlContent:
WITH processed_uninstall AS (
  SELECT
    id as feedback_id,
    CASE 
      WHEN extension_type = 'adblock' THEN extension_adblock_anonymous_id
      WHEN extension_type = 'shopping' THEN extension_shopping_anonymous_id
      WHEN extension_type = 'unified' THEN extension_unified_anonymous_id
      ELSE anonymous_id  -- fallback
    END as anonymous_id,
    CONCAT('extension-', extension_type) as context_app_name,
    'uninstall' as feedback_source,
    timestamp,
    additional_info as feedback_text,
    cast(selected_options as STRING) as feedback_category,
    version as context_app_version,
    platform,
    context_page_referrer as referrer_url,
    CAST(version AS STRING) as app_version,
    context_user_agent as user_agent,
    `piedotorg-production.data_science.parse_useragent`(context_user_agent).browser.name as context_browser
  FROM `piedotorg-production.website_production.web_uninstall`
  WHERE action = "submit"
),

processed_bug_reports AS (
  SELECT
    id as feedback_id,
    -- CASE 
    --   WHEN extension_type = 'adblock' THEN extension_adblock_anonymous_id
    --   WHEN extension_type = 'shopping' THEN extension_shopping_anonymous_id
    --   WHEN extension_type = 'unified' THEN extension_unified_anonymous_id
    --   ELSE anonymous_id  -- fallback
    -- END 
    --until we have the proper way
    cast(coalesce(extension_adblock_anonymous_id,extension_shopping_anonymous_id,extension_unified_anonymous_id) as string) as anonymous_id,
   -- CONCAT('extension-', extension_type)
    cast(null as string) as context_app_name,
    'bug_report' as feedback_source,
    timestamp,
    additional_info as feedback_text,
    selected_option as feedback_category,
    'null' as context_app_version,
    context_user_agent_data_platform as platform,
    context_page_referrer as referrer_url,
    CAST(NULL AS STRING) as app_version,
    context_user_agent as user_agent,
    `piedotorg-production.data_science.parse_useragent`(context_user_agent).browser.name as context_browser
  FROM `piedotorg-production.website_production.web_report_bug`
  WHERE action = "submit"
),

processed_extension_feedback AS (
  SELECT
    id as feedback_id,
    anonymous_id,
    context_app_name,  -- already in the correct format
    concat('ext_feedback|', ifnull(surface,""))  as feedback_source,
    timestamp,
    text as feedback_text,
    type as feedback_category,
    context_app_version,
    platform,
    referer_url as referrer_url,
    CAST(context_app_version AS STRING) as app_version,
    context_user_agent as user_agent,
    `piedotorg-production.data_science.parse_useragent`(context_user_agent).browser.name as context_browser
  FROM `piedotorg-production.extension_production_views.ext_feedback`
),

processed_reviews AS (
  SELECT
    id as feedback_id,
    '' as anonymous_id,  -- Reviews don't have anonymous_id
    CONCAT('extension-', extension_type) as context_app_name,
    'low_rated_review' as feedback_source,
    timestamp,
    text as feedback_text,
    CAST(rating AS STRING) as feedback_category,
    'null' as context_app_version,
    platform,
    cast(NULL as string) as referrer_url,
    cast(NULL as string)  as app_version,
    cast(NULL as string) user_agent,
    cast(NULL as string) as context_browser  -- Reviews don't have user agent
  FROM `piedotorg-production.extensions_data.reviews`
  WHERE rating <= 3
)

SELECT * FROM processed_uninstall
UNION ALL
SELECT * FROM processed_bug_reports
UNION ALL
SELECT * FROM processed_extension_feedback 
UNION ALL
SELECT * FROM processed_reviews

model.name: f_user_commerce
model.description: Daily aggregated commerce activity including affiliate tags, order confirmations, and redirects

config.description: Daily aggregated commerce activity including affiliate tags, order confirmations, and redirects

model.sqlContent:
-- Feature table: Daily commerce aggregations per user
-- Debug: Processing affiliate tags, confirmations, and redirects
WITH affiliate_tags_base AS (
  SELECT
    anonymous_id,
    DATE(timestamp, "America/Los_Angeles") AS dt,
    COUNT(*) AS total_affiliate_tags,
    COUNT(DISTINCT session_id) AS total_tag_sessions
  FROM `piedotorg-production.extension_production_views.ext_affiliate_tag`
  
  
  
  GROUP BY anonymous_id, dt
),

order_confirmations_base AS (
  SELECT
    anonymous_id,
    DATE(timestamp, "America/Los_Angeles") AS dt,
    COUNT(*) AS total_order_confirmations,
    COUNT(DISTINCT session_id) AS order_confirmation_sessions,
    COUNTIF(tagged IS TRUE) AS tagged_order_confirmations
  FROM `piedotorg-production.extension_production_views.ext_order_confirmation`
  
  
  
  GROUP BY anonymous_id, dt
),

redirects_base AS (
  SELECT
    anonymousid AS anonymous_id,
    DATE(IFNULL(timestamp, TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(sessionid)), "America/Los_Angeles") AS dt,
    
    -- Overall redirect metrics
    COUNT(*) AS total_redirects,
    COUNT(DISTINCT sessionid) AS total_redirect_sessions,
    
    -- Redirect source breakdown
    COUNTIF(subsrc = "rewards_transaction_popup") AS rewards_transaction_popup_redirects,
    COUNTIF(subsrc = "coupon_popup") AS coupon_popup_shopping_redirects,
    COUNTIF(subsrc = "cashback_popup_adblock") AS cashback_popup_adblock_redirects,
    COUNTIF(subsrc = "rewards_popup") AS rewards_popup_shopping_redirects,
    COUNTIF(subsrc = "popover_coupon_list") AS popover_coupon_list_redirects,
    COUNTIF(subsrc = "pie_offer_login_retargeting") AS login_retargeting_redirects,
    COUNTIF(subsrc = "standdown") AS standdown_redirects
    
  FROM `piedotorg-production.backend_analytics.outbound_redirect`
  
  
  
  GROUP BY anonymous_id, dt
)

-- Debug: Combining all commerce features
SELECT
  COALESCE(
    affiliate_tags_base.anonymous_id, 
    order_confirmations_base.anonymous_id, 
    redirects_base.anonymous_id
  ) AS anonymous_id,
  COALESCE(
    affiliate_tags_base.dt, 
    order_confirmations_base.dt, 
    redirects_base.dt
  ) AS dt,
  
  -- Affiliate tag metrics
  COALESCE(total_affiliate_tags, 0) AS total_affiliate_tags,
  COALESCE(total_tag_sessions, 0) AS total_tag_sessions,
  
  -- Order confirmation metrics
  COALESCE(total_order_confirmations, 0) AS total_order_confirmations,
  COALESCE(order_confirmation_sessions, 0) AS order_confirmation_sessions,
  COALESCE(tagged_order_confirmations, 0) AS tagged_order_confirmations,
  
  -- Redirect metrics
  COALESCE(total_redirects, 0) AS total_redirects,
  COALESCE(total_redirect_sessions, 0) AS total_redirect_sessions,
  COALESCE(rewards_transaction_popup_redirects, 0) AS rewards_transaction_popup_redirects,
  COALESCE(coupon_popup_shopping_redirects, 0) AS coupon_popup_shopping_redirects,
  COALESCE(cashback_popup_adblock_redirects, 0) AS cashback_popup_adblock_redirects,
  COALESCE(rewards_popup_shopping_redirects, 0) AS rewards_popup_shopping_redirects,
  COALESCE(popover_coupon_list_redirects, 0) AS popover_coupon_list_redirects,
  COALESCE(login_retargeting_redirects, 0) AS login_retargeting_redirects,
  COALESCE(standdown_redirects, 0) AS standdown_redirects

FROM affiliate_tags_base
FULL OUTER JOIN order_confirmations_base
  USING (anonymous_id, dt)
FULL OUTER JOIN redirects_base
  USING (anonymous_id, dt)

model.name: f_user_events
model.description: Daily aggregated user events including standdowns, ad metrics, and settings

config.description: Daily aggregated user events including standdowns, ad metrics, and settings

model.sqlContent:
-- Feature table: Daily event aggregations per user
-- Debug: Processing standdowns, ad metrics, and user settings
WITH standdowns_base AS (
  SELECT
    anonymous_id,
    DATE(timestamp, "America/Los_Angeles") AS dt,
    COUNT(*) AS total_standdowns,
    COUNTIF(standdown_type = "stop") AS stop_standdowns,
    COUNTIF(standdown_type = "notag") AS notag_standdowns,
    COUNTIF(standdown_type = "suppress") AS suppress_standdowns
  FROM `piedotorg-production.extension_production_views.ext_standdown_detected`
  
  
  
  GROUP BY anonymous_id, dt
),

ad_metrics_base AS (
  SELECT
    anonymous_id,
    DATE(timestamp, "America/Los_Angeles") AS dt,
    COUNT(*) AS total_pages_w_ads_seen,
    SUM(ad_placements_seen) AS total_ad_placements_seen,
    SUM(pixels_used_by_ads_total) AS total_pixels_seen
  FROM `piedotorg-production.extension_production_views.ext_device_ad_metrics_rollup`
  
  
  
  GROUP BY anonymous_id, dt
),

user_settings_base AS (
  -- Debug: Getting latest user settings per day (last value wins)
  SELECT
    anonymous_id,
    DATE(timestamp, "America/Los_Angeles") AS dt,
    LAST_VALUE(other_adblockers) OVER (
      PARTITION BY anonymous_id, DATE(timestamp, "America/Los_Angeles") 
      ORDER BY timestamp ASC 
      ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING
    ) AS other_adblockers
  FROM `piedotorg-production.extension_production_views.ext_user_settings`
  WHERE other_adblockers IS NOT NULL -- only rows with actual values
  
  
  
  QUALIFY ROW_NUMBER() OVER (
    PARTITION BY anonymous_id, DATE(timestamp, "America/Los_Angeles") 
    ORDER BY timestamp DESC
  ) = 1
)

-- Debug: Combining all event features
SELECT
  COALESCE(
    standdowns_base.anonymous_id, 
    ad_metrics_base.anonymous_id, 
    user_settings_base.anonymous_id
  ) AS anonymous_id,
  COALESCE(
    standdowns_base.dt, 
    ad_metrics_base.dt, 
    user_settings_base.dt
  ) AS dt,
  
  -- Standdown metrics
  COALESCE(total_standdowns, 0) AS total_standdowns,
  COALESCE(stop_standdowns, 0) AS stop_standdowns,
  COALESCE(notag_standdowns, 0) AS notag_standdowns,
  COALESCE(suppress_standdowns, 0) AS suppress_standdowns,
  
  -- Ad metrics
  COALESCE(total_pages_w_ads_seen, 0) AS total_pages_w_ads_seen,
  COALESCE(total_ad_placements_seen, 0) AS total_ad_placements_seen,
  COALESCE(total_pixels_seen, 0) AS total_pixels_seen,
  
  -- User settings
  user_settings_base.other_adblockers

FROM standdowns_base
FULL OUTER JOIN ad_metrics_base
  USING (anonymous_id, dt)
FULL OUTER JOIN user_settings_base
  USING (anonymous_id, dt)

model.name: f_user_heartbeats
model.description: Daily aggregated heartbeat data per user including device tracking and app versions

config.description: Daily aggregated heartbeat data per user including device tracking and app versions

model.sqlContent:
-- Feature table: Daily heartbeat aggregations per user
-- Debug: Processing heartbeat data with device tracking and extension status
SELECT    
  anonymous_id,
  DATE(timestamp, "America/Los_Angeles") AS dt,
  
  -- Heartbeat metrics
  COUNT(*) AS total_heartbeats,
  COUNTIF(has_both_extensions_enabled) > 0 AS has_both_extensions_enabled,
  MAX(context_app_version) AS max_app_version,
  
  -- App and context data
  ARRAY_AGG(DISTINCT context_app_name IGNORE NULLS) AS all_context_app_names,
  
  -- Device aggregations
  ARRAY_AGG(DISTINCT context_device_id IGNORE NULLS) AS all_device_ids,
  ARRAY_AGG(DISTINCT user_id IGNORE NULLS) AS all_user_ids,
  
  -- Context resolution for user identity (most frequent values)
  APPROX_TOP_COUNT(context_country, 1)[OFFSET(0)].value AS context_country_hb,
  APPROX_TOP_COUNT(context_user_agent, 1)[OFFSET(0)].value AS context_user_agent_hb

FROM `piedotorg-production.extension_production_views.ext_heartbeat`

WHERE
  context_app_name IN ('extension-adblock', 'extension-shopping', 'extension-unified')
  

GROUP BY 
  anonymous_id,
  dt

model.name: f_user_identity
model.description: User identity resolution including app assignment and context from heartbeats and installs - uses installs_base_w_reinstall consistently

config.description: User identity resolution including app assignment and context from heartbeats and installs - uses installs_base_w_reinstall consistently

model.sqlContent:
-- Feature table: User identity resolution (FULL REFRESH)
-- Debug: Clean user context resolution using consistent install table
WITH heartbeat_context AS (
  -- Debug: Getting most frequent country/UA from raw heartbeats per user/app
  SELECT 
    anonymous_id,
    context_app_name,
    APPROX_TOP_COUNT(context_country, 1)[OFFSET(0)].value AS context_country_hb,
    APPROX_TOP_COUNT(context_user_agent, 1)[OFFSET(0)].value AS context_user_agent_hb,
    MAX(DATE(timestamp, "America/Los_Angeles")) AS last_heartbeat_date,
    COUNT(*) AS total_heartbeats
  FROM `piedotorg-production.extension_production_views.ext_heartbeat`
  WHERE context_app_name IN ('extension-adblock', 'extension-shopping', 'extension-unified')
    AND context_app_name IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY anonymous_id, context_app_name
),

install_context AS (
  -- Debug: Getting context from installs_base_w_reinstall per user/app
  SELECT 
    anonymous_id,
    CONCAT("extension-", extension_type) AS context_app_name,
    APPROX_TOP_COUNT(context_country, 1)[OFFSET(0)].value AS context_country_install,
    APPROX_TOP_COUNT(context_user_agent, 1)[OFFSET(0)].value AS context_user_agent_install,
    MAX(DATE(timestamp, "America/Los_Angeles")) AS last_install_date
  FROM `piedotorg-production.growth_marketing.installs_base_w_reinstall`
  WHERE extension_type IS NOT NULL
    AND anonymous_id IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY anonymous_id, extension_type
),

user_app_assignments AS (
  -- Debug: Combine heartbeat and install data to assign users to their primary app
  SELECT
    COALESCE(heartbeat_context.anonymous_id, install_context.anonymous_id) AS anonymous_id,
    COALESCE(heartbeat_context.context_app_name, install_context.context_app_name) AS context_app_name,
    COALESCE(
      install_context.context_country_install, 
      heartbeat_context.context_country_hb
    ) AS context_country,
    COALESCE(
      install_context.context_user_agent_install, 
      heartbeat_context.context_user_agent_hb  
    ) AS context_user_agent,
    -- Use most recent activity (heartbeat or install) to determine primary app
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (
      PARTITION BY COALESCE(heartbeat_context.anonymous_id, install_context.anonymous_id)
      ORDER BY GREATEST(
        COALESCE(heartbeat_context.last_heartbeat_date, DATE('1970-01-01')),
        COALESCE(install_context.last_install_date, DATE('1970-01-01'))
      ) DESC
    ) AS row_num
  FROM heartbeat_context
  FULL OUTER JOIN install_context 
    USING (anonymous_id, context_app_name)
)

-- Debug: Final user identity with most recent app assignment
SELECT
  anonymous_id,
  context_app_name,
  context_country,
  context_user_agent
FROM user_app_assignments
WHERE row_num = 1 -- Most recent app assignment per user

model.name: f_user_installs
model.description: Daily aggregated install and uninstall events per user

config.description: Daily aggregated install and uninstall events per user

model.sqlContent:
-- Feature table: Daily install/uninstall aggregations per user
-- Debug: Processing installs, reinstalls, and uninstalls
WITH installs_base AS (
  SELECT
    anonymous_id,
    DATE(timestamp, "America/Los_Angeles") AS dt,
    COUNT(*) AS total_installs
  FROM `piedotorg-production.growth_marketing.installs_base_w_reinstall`
  
  
  
  GROUP BY anonymous_id, dt
),

server_uninstalls_base AS (
  SELECT
    CASE
      WHEN extension_type = "adblock" THEN extension_adblock_anonymous_id
      WHEN extension_type = "shopping" THEN extension_shopping_anonymous_id  
      WHEN extension_type = "unified" THEN extension_unified_anonymous_id
      ELSE NULL
    END AS anonymous_id,
    CONCAT("extension-", extension_type) AS context_app_name,
    DATE(timestamp, "America/Los_Angeles") AS dt,
    COUNT(*) AS server_uninstalls
  FROM `piedotorg-production.website_production.web_server_uninstall`
  
  WHERE 
    
    CASE
      WHEN extension_type = "adblock" THEN extension_adblock_anonymous_id
      WHEN extension_type = "shopping" THEN extension_shopping_anonymous_id
      WHEN extension_type = "unified" THEN extension_unified_anonymous_id
      ELSE NULL
    END IS NOT NULL
  
  GROUP BY anonymous_id, context_app_name, dt
),

web_uninstalls_base AS (
  SELECT
    CASE
      WHEN extension_type = "adblock" THEN extension_adblock_anonymous_id
      WHEN extension_type = "shopping" THEN extension_shopping_anonymous_id
      WHEN extension_type = "unified" THEN extension_unified_anonymous_id  
      ELSE NULL
    END AS anonymous_id,
    CONCAT("extension-", extension_type) AS context_app_name,
    DATE(timestamp, "America/Los_Angeles") AS dt,
    COUNT(*) AS web_uninstalls
  FROM `piedotorg-production.website_production.web_uninstall`
  
  WHERE 
    
    CASE
      WHEN extension_type = "adblock" THEN extension_adblock_anonymous_id
      WHEN extension_type = "shopping" THEN extension_shopping_anonymous_id
      WHEN extension_type = "unified" THEN extension_unified_anonymous_id
      ELSE NULL
    END IS NOT NULL
  
  GROUP BY anonymous_id, context_app_name, dt
),

uninstalls_combined AS (
  -- Debug: Combining server and web uninstalls per user/day
  SELECT
    anonymous_id,
    dt,
    SUM(server_uninstalls) AS total_server_uninstalls,
    SUM(web_uninstalls) AS total_web_uninstalls,
    -- Get maximum uninstalls across all app types for a user on a given day
    MAX(COALESCE(server_uninstalls, 0) + COALESCE(web_uninstalls, 0)) AS max_daily_uninstalls
  FROM (
    SELECT anonymous_id, dt, server_uninstalls, 0 AS web_uninstalls
    FROM server_uninstalls_base
    
    UNION ALL
    
    SELECT anonymous_id, dt, 0 AS server_uninstalls, web_uninstalls
    FROM web_uninstalls_base
  )
  GROUP BY anonymous_id, dt
)

-- Debug: Combining all install/uninstall features
SELECT
  COALESCE(installs_base.anonymous_id, uninstalls_combined.anonymous_id) AS anonymous_id,
  COALESCE(installs_base.dt, uninstalls_combined.dt) AS dt,
  
  -- Install metrics
  COALESCE(total_installs, 0) AS total_installs,
  
  -- Uninstall metrics
  COALESCE(total_server_uninstalls, 0) AS total_server_uninstalls,
  COALESCE(total_web_uninstalls, 0) AS total_web_uninstalls,
  COALESCE(max_daily_uninstalls, 0) AS max_daily_uninstalls -- replicates GREATEST_ARRAY logic

FROM installs_base
FULL OUTER JOIN uninstalls_combined
  USING (anonymous_id, dt)

model.name: f_user_interactions
model.description: Daily aggregated user interactions including clicks, shows, and savings actions

config.description: Daily aggregated user interactions including clicks, shows, and savings actions

model.sqlContent:
-- Feature table: Daily user interaction aggregations
-- Debug: Processing all click/show/savings interactions with detailed breakdowns
SELECT
  anonymous_id,
  DATE(timestamp, "America/Los_Angeles") AS dt,
  
  -- Overall interaction metrics
  COUNTIF(action = "click") AS total_clicks,
  COUNTIF(action = "show") AS total_shows,
  COUNTIF(action = "close") AS total_closes,
  
  -- Session-based metrics
  COUNT(DISTINCT IF(action = "click", session_id, NULL)) AS total_click_sessions,
  COUNT(DISTINCT IF(action = "show", session_id, NULL)) AS total_show_sessions,
  
  -- Adblock cashback popup interactions
  COUNTIF(action = "show" AND automation_type = "cashback_adblock") AS shows_adblock_cashback_popup,
  COUNTIF(action = "click" AND automation_type = "cashback_adblock") AS clicks_adblock_cashback_popup,
  COUNTIF(action = "close" AND automation_type = "cashback_adblock") AS closes_adblock_cashback_popup,
  
  -- Popover interactions
  COUNTIF(action = "click" AND surface IN ("popover", "popover_adblock")) AS clicks_popover,
  COUNTIF(action = "show" AND surface IN ("popover", "popover_adblock")) AS shows_popover,
  
  -- Popover rewards specific
  COUNTIF(action = "click" AND surface IN ("popover", "popover_adblock") AND is_rewards) AS clicks_popover_rewards,
  COUNTIF(action = "show" AND surface IN ("popover", "popover_adblock") AND is_rewards) AS shows_popover_rewards,
  
  -- Savings coupons with rewards breakdown (c1_r1 = coupons + rewards, c1_r0 = coupons only)
  COUNTIF(action = "show" AND automation_type = "savings_coupons" AND is_rewards) AS c1_r1_shows,
  COUNTIF(action = "show" AND automation_type = "savings_coupons" AND NOT is_rewards) AS c1_r0_shows,
  COUNTIF(action = "click" AND automation_type = "savings_coupons" AND is_rewards) AS c1_r1_clicks,
  COUNTIF(action = "click" AND automation_type = "savings_coupons" AND NOT is_rewards) AS c1_r0_clicks,
  COUNTIF(action = "close" AND automation_type = "savings_coupons" AND is_rewards) AS c1_r1_closes,
  COUNTIF(action = "close" AND automation_type = "savings_coupons" AND NOT is_rewards) AS c1_r0_closes

FROM `piedotorg-production.extension_production_views.ext_savings`



GROUP BY 
  anonymous_id,
  dt

model.name: f_user_sessions
model.description: Daily aggregated session and cart activity per user

config.description: Daily aggregated session and cart activity per user

model.sqlContent:
-- Feature table: Daily session and cart aggregations per user
-- Debug: Processing session starts and cart visits together
WITH sessions_base AS (
  SELECT
    anonymous_id,
    DATE(timestamp, "America/Los_Angeles") AS dt,
    COUNT(*) AS total_sessions_started,
    COUNTIF(merchant_id != "pie") AS non_pie_sessions_started
  FROM `piedotorg-production.extension_production_views.ext_session_started`
  
  
  
  GROUP BY anonymous_id, dt
),

cart_base AS (
  SELECT
    anonymous_id,
    DATE(timestamp, "America/Los_Angeles") AS dt,
    COUNT(*) AS total_carts_visited,
    COUNT(DISTINCT session_id) AS total_cart_sessions
  FROM `piedotorg-production.extension_production_views.ext_context_detect`
  
  
  
  GROUP BY anonymous_id, dt
)

-- Debug: Full outer join to capture all user activity
SELECT
  COALESCE(sessions_base.anonymous_id, cart_base.anonymous_id) AS anonymous_id,
  COALESCE(sessions_base.dt, cart_base.dt) AS dt,
  
  -- Session metrics
  COALESCE(total_sessions_started, 0) AS total_sessions_started,
  COALESCE(non_pie_sessions_started, 0) AS non_pie_sessions_started,
  
  -- Cart metrics  
  COALESCE(total_carts_visited, 0) AS total_carts_visited,
  COALESCE(total_cart_sessions, 0) AS total_cart_sessions
  
FROM sessions_base
FULL OUTER JOIN cart_base
  USING (anonymous_id, dt)

model.name: f_user_transactions
model.description: Daily aggregated transaction data per user including revenue, millipoints, and transaction types - incremental with all-time lookback for late confirmations

config.description: Daily aggregated transaction data per user including revenue, millipoints, and transaction types - incremental with all-time lookback for late confirmations

model.sqlContent:
-- Feature table: Daily transaction aggregations per user
-- Debug: Processing all transaction types with detailed revenue and millipoint tracking
WITH transaction_base AS (
  SELECT
    anonymous_id,
    userId,
    DATE(timestamp, "America/Los_Angeles") AS dt,
    
    -- Overall transaction counts
    COUNT(*) AS total_transactions,
    COUNTIF(t.state = "CONFIRMED") AS confirmed_transactions,

    -- Millipoints (rewards currency)
    SUM(t.millipoints) AS total_millipoints, -- includes payouts
    SUM(IF(t.state = "CONFIRMED", t.millipoints, 0)) AS total_millipoints_confirmed,
    SUM(IF(adOfferType != "PAYOUT", t.millipoints, 0)) AS earned_millipoints, -- excludes payouts
    
    -- Revenue calculations (affiliate + ad offers)
    SUM(externalSaleValue) AS gmv_cents,
    SUM(externalCommission) AS commission_cents,
    SUM(IF(externalStatus = "CONFIRMED", externalSaleValue, 0)) AS confirmed_gmv_cents,
    SUM(IF(externalStatus = "CONFIRMED", externalCommission, 0)) AS confirmed_commission_cents,

    -- Transaction type breakdowns
    COUNTIF(type = "AD_OFFER") AS total_ad_offers_transactions,
    COUNTIF(adOfferType = "RETARGETING") AS retargeting_offers_transactions,
    COUNTIF(adOfferType = "SEARCH") AS search_offers_transactions,
    COUNTIF(type = "AD_VIEW") AS ad_view_transactions,
    COUNTIF(type = "MANUAL") AS manual_transactions,
    COUNTIF(type = "ONBOARDING") AS onboarding_transactions,
    COUNTIF(type = "PAYOUT") AS payout_transactions,
    COUNTIF(type = "AFFILIATE") AS affiliate_transactions,
    COUNTIF(type = "REFERRAL") AS referral_transactions,

    -- Millipoints by transaction type
    SUM(IF(type = "AD_OFFER", t.millipoints, 0)) AS ad_offer_millipoints,
    SUM(IF(adOfferType = "RETARGETING", t.millipoints, 0)) AS retargeting_millipoints,
    SUM(IF(adOfferType = "SEARCH", t.millipoints, 0)) AS search_millipoints,
    SUM(IF(type = "AD_VIEW", t.millipoints, 0)) AS ad_view_millipoints,
    SUM(IF(type = "MANUAL", t.millipoints, 0)) AS manual_millipoints,
    SUM(IF(type = "REFERRAL", t.millipoints, 0)) AS referral_millipoints,
    SUM(IF(type = "ONBOARDING", t.millipoints, 0)) AS onboarding_millipoints,
    SUM(IF(type = "PAYOUT", t.millipoints, 0)) AS payout_millipoints,
    SUM(IF(type = "AFFILIATE", t.millipoints, 0)) AS affiliate_millipoints

  FROM `piedotorg-production.data_science_dev.transactions_expanded_view` t
  
  where timestamp is not null
  GROUP BY anonymous_id, userId, dt

),

rewards_transaction_base AS (
  SELECT
    anonymous_id,
    DATE(timestamp, "America/Los_Angeles") AS dt,
    
    -- Rewards popup interactions
    COUNTIF(action = "show" AND surface = "rewards_transaction_popup") AS rewards_shows,
    COUNTIF(action IN ("click", "login") AND surface = "rewards_transaction_popup") AS rewards_clicks,
    COUNTIF(action = "close" AND surface = "rewards_transaction_popup") AS rewards_closes,
    COUNTIF(action = "no_show" AND surface = "rewards_transaction_popup") AS rewards_no_shows,
    COUNTIF(action = "show" AND surface = "rewards_transaction_toast_success") AS rewards_success_toasts
    
  FROM `piedotorg-production.extension_production_views.ext_rewards_transaction`
  
  GROUP BY anonymous_id, dt
),

user_balances_base AS (
  SELECT
    userId,
    dt,
    end_balance AS ir_balance -- current IR (rewards) balance
  FROM `piedotorg-production.users.user_balances`
)

-- Debug: Combining all transaction-related features with proper aggregation
SELECT
  COALESCE(transaction_base.anonymous_id, rewards_transaction_base.anonymous_id) AS anonymous_id,
  COALESCE(transaction_base.dt, rewards_transaction_base.dt) AS dt,
  MAX(transaction_base.userId) AS userId, -- Use MAX to handle potential nulls
  
  -- Transaction metrics
  COALESCE(MAX(total_transactions), 0) AS total_transactions,
  COALESCE(MAX(confirmed_transactions), 0) AS confirmed_transactions,
  COALESCE(MAX(total_millipoints), 0) AS total_millipoints,
  COALESCE(MAX(total_millipoints_confirmed), 0) AS total_millipoints_confirmed,
  COALESCE(MAX(earned_millipoints), 0) AS earned_millipoints,
  
  -- Revenue metrics (Note: ad_offer budget revenue removed - now tracked separately in campaigns_campaignbudgetevents)
  COALESCE(MAX(commission_cents), 0) AS total_revenue_cents,
  COALESCE(MAX(gmv_cents), 0) AS gmv_cents,
  COALESCE(MAX(commission_cents), 0) AS commission_cents,
  COALESCE(MAX(confirmed_gmv_cents), 0) AS confirmed_gmv_cents,
  COALESCE(MAX(confirmed_commission_cents), 0) AS confirmed_commission_cents,
  
  -- Transaction type counts
  COALESCE(MAX(total_ad_offers_transactions), 0) AS total_ad_offers_transactions,
  COALESCE(MAX(ad_offer_millipoints), 0) AS ad_offer_millipoints,
  COALESCE(MAX(retargeting_offers_transactions), 0) AS retargeting_offers_transactions,
  COALESCE(MAX(retargeting_millipoints), 0) AS retargeting_millipoints,
  COALESCE(MAX(search_offers_transactions), 0) AS search_offers_transactions,
  COALESCE(MAX(search_millipoints), 0) AS search_millipoints,
  COALESCE(MAX(ad_view_transactions), 0) AS ad_view_transactions,
  COALESCE(MAX(ad_view_millipoints), 0) AS ad_view_millipoints,
  COALESCE(MAX(manual_transactions), 0) AS manual_transactions,
  COALESCE(MAX(manual_millipoints), 0) AS manual_millipoints,
  COALESCE(MAX(onboarding_transactions), 0) AS onboarding_transactions,
  COALESCE(MAX(onboarding_millipoints), 0) AS onboarding_millipoints,
  COALESCE(MAX(payout_transactions), 0) AS payout_transactions,
  COALESCE(MAX(payout_millipoints), 0) AS payout_millipoints,
  COALESCE(MAX(affiliate_transactions), 0) AS affiliate_transactions,
  COALESCE(MAX(affiliate_millipoints), 0) AS affiliate_millipoints,
  COALESCE(MAX(referral_millipoints), 0) AS referral_millipoints,
  
  -- Rewards transaction popup metrics
  COALESCE(MAX(rewards_shows), 0) AS rewards_shows,
  COALESCE(MAX(rewards_clicks), 0) AS rewards_clicks,
  COALESCE(MAX(rewards_closes), 0) AS rewards_closes,
  COALESCE(MAX(rewards_no_shows), 0) AS rewards_no_shows,
  COALESCE(MAX(rewards_success_toasts), 0) AS rewards_success_toasts,
  
  -- Balance data
  MAX(user_balances_base.ir_balance) AS ir_balance
  
FROM transaction_base
FULL OUTER JOIN rewards_transaction_base
  USING (anonymous_id, dt)
LEFT JOIN user_balances_base
  ON transaction_base.userId = user_balances_base.userId 
  AND transaction_base.dt = user_balances_base.dt 

GROUP BY 
  COALESCE(transaction_base.anonymous_id, rewards_transaction_base.anonymous_id),
  COALESCE(transaction_base.dt, rewards_transaction_base.dt)

model.name: f_user_video_events
model.description: Daily aggregated video events including YouTube and Twitch adblock activity

config.description: Daily aggregated video events including YouTube and Twitch adblock activity

model.sqlContent:
-- Feature table: Daily video event aggregations per user
-- Debug: Processing YouTube and Twitch adblock events
WITH youtube_ads_base AS (
  SELECT
    anonymous_id,
    DATE(timestamp, "America/Los_Angeles") AS dt,
    COUNT(*) AS total_youtube_ads_seen
  FROM `piedotorg-production.extension_production_views.adblock_youtube_ad_seen`
  
  
  
  GROUP BY anonymous_id, dt
),

youtube_errors_base AS (
  SELECT
    anonymous_id,
    DATE(timestamp, "America/Los_Angeles") AS dt,
    COUNT(*) AS total_youtube_errors
  FROM `piedotorg-production.extension_production_views.adblock_youtube_error_msg`
  
  
  
  GROUP BY anonymous_id, dt
),

youtube_embeds_base AS (
  SELECT
    anonymous_id,
    DATE(timestamp, "America/Los_Angeles") AS dt,
    COUNT(*) AS total_youtube_embeds
  FROM `piedotorg-production.extension_production_views.adblock_youtube_video_embed`
  
  
  
  GROUP BY anonymous_id, dt
),

youtube_success_base AS (
  SELECT
    anonymous_id,
    DATE(timestamp, "America/Los_Angeles") AS dt,
    COUNT(*) AS total_youtube_successes
  FROM `piedotorg-production.extension_production_views.adblock_youtube_video_success`
  
  
  
  GROUP BY anonymous_id, dt
),

twitch_ads_base AS (
  SELECT
    anonymous_id,
    DATE(timestamp, "America/Los_Angeles") AS dt,
    COUNT(*) AS total_twitch_ads_seen
  FROM `piedotorg-production.extension_production_views.adblock_twitch_ad_seen`
  
  
  
  GROUP BY anonymous_id, dt
),

general_errors_base AS (
  SELECT
    anonymous_id,
    DATE(timestamp, "America/Los_Angeles") AS dt,
    COUNT(*) AS total_adblock_errors
  FROM `piedotorg-production.extension_production_views.adblock_error_msg`
  
  
  
  GROUP BY anonymous_id, dt
)

-- Debug: Combining all video event features
SELECT
  COALESCE(
    youtube_ads_base.anonymous_id,
    youtube_errors_base.anonymous_id, 
    youtube_embeds_base.anonymous_id,
    youtube_success_base.anonymous_id,
    twitch_ads_base.anonymous_id,
    general_errors_base.anonymous_id
  ) AS anonymous_id,
  COALESCE(
    youtube_ads_base.dt,
    youtube_errors_base.dt,
    youtube_embeds_base.dt, 
    youtube_success_base.dt,
    twitch_ads_base.dt,
    general_errors_base.dt
  ) AS dt,
  
  -- YouTube metrics
  COALESCE(total_youtube_ads_seen, 0) AS total_youtube_ads_seen,
  COALESCE(total_youtube_errors, 0) AS total_youtube_errors,
  COALESCE(total_youtube_embeds, 0) AS total_youtube_embeds,  
  COALESCE(total_youtube_successes, 0) AS total_youtube_successes,
  
  -- Twitch metrics  
  COALESCE(total_twitch_ads_seen, 0) AS total_twitch_ads_seen,
  
  -- Error metrics
  COALESCE(total_adblock_errors, 0) AS total_adblock_errors

FROM youtube_ads_base
FULL OUTER JOIN youtube_errors_base
  USING (anonymous_id, dt)
FULL OUTER JOIN youtube_embeds_base
  USING (anonymous_id, dt)
FULL OUTER JOIN youtube_success_base
  USING (anonymous_id, dt)
FULL OUTER JOIN twitch_ads_base
  USING (anonymous_id, dt)
FULL OUTER JOIN general_errors_base
  USING (anonymous_id, dt)

model.name: int_transaction_mapping
model.description: Maps affiliate transactions to anonymous IDs via redirect tracking - requires full historical context for proper linking

config.description: Maps affiliate transactions to anonymous IDs via redirect tracking - requires full historical context for proper linking

model.sqlContent:
-- Intermediate table: Transaction to anonymous ID mapping (FULL REFRESH)
-- Debug: Complex transaction linking that requires full historical context
WITH base_transactions AS (
  SELECT
    transactionId,
    trackId,
    TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(externalCreated) AS transaction_created,
    externalCommission,
    externalstatus,
    externalSaleValue,
    provider
  FROM `piedotorg-production.analytics_etl.transactions_affiliatetransactions`
),

base_redirects AS (
  SELECT
    anonymousid AS anonymous_id,
    extTagId AS ext_tag_id,
    trackId,
    affiliateLinkId,
    sessionid,
    merchantId,
    IFNULL(timestamp, TIMESTAMP_MILLIS(sessionid)) AS redirect_timestamp
  FROM `piedotorg-production.backend_analytics.outbound_redirect`
)

-- Debug: Linking transactions to users via trackId from redirects
SELECT
  base_transactions.transactionId,
  base_redirects.anonymous_id,
  base_transactions.externalstatus,
  SUM(base_transactions.externalCommission) AS commission_cents,
  SUM(base_transactions.externalSaleValue) AS gmv_cents,
  MIN(base_transactions.transaction_created) AS first_transaction_created,
  MAX(base_transactions.transaction_created) AS last_transaction_created,
  COUNT(*) AS transaction_count
FROM base_transactions
LEFT JOIN base_redirects
  USING (trackId)
WHERE base_redirects.anonymous_id IS NOT NULL -- Only transactions we can link to users
GROUP BY 
  transactionId,
  anonymous_id,
  externalstatus

model.name: int_user_cohort_logic
model.description: User cohort logic calculations including cohort dates and days since cohort - incremental with all-time lookback for consistency

config.description: User cohort logic calculations including cohort dates and days since cohort - incremental with all-time lookback for consistency

model.sqlContent:
-- Intermediate table: User cohort logic (INCREMENTAL)
-- Debug: Complex cohort calculations with all-time lookback for consistency
WITH install_dates AS (
  -- Debug: Get earliest install per anonymous_id (by timestamp, not alphabetical)
  SELECT
    anonymous_id,
    DATE(first_install_ts, "America/Los_Angeles") AS install_day_pst,
    first_install_ts AS install_timestamp,
    puci
  FROM (
    SELECT
      anonymous_id,
      first_install_ts,
      puci,
      ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY anonymous_id ORDER BY first_install_ts ASC) AS rn
    FROM `piedotorg-production.growth_marketing.installs_base_w_reinstall`
    WHERE is_first_install = true
  )
  WHERE rn = 1
),

first_heartbeat_dates AS (
  -- Debug: Calculate first heartbeat date per user across all days
  SELECT
    anonymous_id,
    MIN(CASE WHEN total_heartbeats > 0 THEN dt ELSE NULL END) AS first_heartbeat_date
  FROM `piedotorg-production.user_intermediate_dev.int_user_daily_base`
  GROUP BY anonymous_id
),

uninstall_tracking AS (
  -- Debug: Track most recent uninstall date per user
  SELECT
    anonymous_id,
    MAX(CASE WHEN max_daily_uninstalls > 0 THEN dt ELSE NULL END) AS most_recent_uninstall_date
  FROM `piedotorg-production.user_intermediate_dev.int_user_daily_base`
  GROUP BY anonymous_id
)

-- Debug: Final cohort logic with all calculations
SELECT
  base.*,
  
  -- Install and heartbeat dates
  install_dates.install_day_pst,
  install_dates.install_timestamp,
  install_dates.puci,
  first_heartbeat_dates.first_heartbeat_date,
  uninstall_tracking.most_recent_uninstall_date,
  
  -- Cohort date calculation (earliest of install or first heartbeat)
  LEAST(
    COALESCE(install_dates.install_day_pst, DATE('2099-12-31')),
    COALESCE(first_heartbeat_dates.first_heartbeat_date, DATE('2099-12-31'))
  ) AS cohort_date,
  
  -- Days since cohort calculation
  DATE_DIFF(
    base.dt,
    LEAST(
      COALESCE(install_dates.install_day_pst, DATE('2099-12-31')),
      COALESCE(first_heartbeat_dates.first_heartbeat_date, DATE('2099-12-31'))
    ),
    DAY
  ) AS days_since_cohort_date

FROM `piedotorg-production.user_intermediate_dev.int_user_daily_base` base
LEFT JOIN install_dates
  USING (anonymous_id)
LEFT JOIN first_heartbeat_dates
  USING (anonymous_id)
LEFT JOIN uninstall_tracking
  USING (anonymous_id)

model.name: int_user_daily_base
model.description: Core daily user table, combining all user activity into a single wide table - incremental with all-time lookback for transaction updates

config.description: Core daily user table, combining all user activity into a single wide table - incremental with all-time lookback for transaction updates

model.sqlContent:
-- Intermediate table: Daily user base aggregations
-- Debug: Combining all feature tables into comprehensive daily user view
WITH heartbeat_agg AS (
  SELECT
    anonymous_id,
    dt,
    SUM(total_heartbeats) AS total_heartbeats,
    LOGICAL_OR(has_both_extensions_enabled) AS has_both_extensions_enabled,
    MAX(max_app_version) AS max_app_version,
    ARRAY_CONCAT_AGG(all_device_ids) AS all_device_ids,
    ARRAY_CONCAT_AGG(all_user_ids) AS all_user_ids
  FROM `piedotorg-production.user_features_dev.f_user_heartbeats`
  GROUP BY anonymous_id, dt
),

-- Pre-compute COALESCE values to ensure consistency between SELECT and GROUP BY
base_data AS (
  SELECT
    COALESCE(
      COALESCE(
        heartbeat_agg.anonymous_id,
        f_user_sessions.anonymous_id,
        f_user_interactions.anonymous_id,
        f_user_transactions.anonymous_id,
        f_user_commerce.anonymous_id,
        f_user_installs.anonymous_id,
        f_user_events.anonymous_id,
        f_user_video_events.anonymous_id
      ),
      'null_anonymous_id' -- Simple constant for all NULL anonymous_id cases
    ) AS final_anonymous_id,
    
    COALESCE(
      heartbeat_agg.dt,
      f_user_sessions.dt,
      f_user_interactions.dt,
      f_user_transactions.dt,
      f_user_commerce.dt,
      f_user_installs.dt,
      f_user_events.dt,
      f_user_video_events.dt
    ) AS final_dt,
    
    -- Keep all original data for aggregation
    heartbeat_agg,
    f_user_sessions,
    f_user_interactions,
    f_user_transactions,
    f_user_commerce,
    f_user_installs,
    f_user_events,
    f_user_video_events,
    f_user_identity
    
  FROM heartbeat_agg
  FULL OUTER JOIN `piedotorg-production.user_features_dev.f_user_sessions` f_user_sessions
    USING (anonymous_id, dt)
  FULL OUTER JOIN `piedotorg-production.user_features_dev.f_user_interactions` f_user_interactions
    USING (anonymous_id, dt)
  FULL OUTER JOIN `piedotorg-production.user_features_dev.f_user_transactions` f_user_transactions
    USING (anonymous_id, dt)
  FULL OUTER JOIN `piedotorg-production.user_features_dev.f_user_commerce` f_user_commerce
    USING (anonymous_id, dt)
  FULL OUTER JOIN `piedotorg-production.user_features_dev.f_user_installs` f_user_installs
    USING (anonymous_id, dt)
  FULL OUTER JOIN `piedotorg-production.user_features_dev.f_user_events` f_user_events
    USING (anonymous_id, dt)
  FULL OUTER JOIN `piedotorg-production.user_features_dev.f_user_video_events` f_user_video_events
    USING (anonymous_id, dt)
  LEFT JOIN `piedotorg-production.user_features_dev.f_user_identity` f_user_identity
    USING (anonymous_id)
)

-- Debug: Final aggregation using pre-computed keys
SELECT
  final_anonymous_id AS anonymous_id,
  final_dt AS dt,
  
  -- User identity data
  MAX(f_user_identity.context_app_name) AS context_app_name,
  MAX(f_user_identity.context_country) AS context_country,
  MAX(f_user_identity.context_user_agent) AS context_user_agent,
  MAX(f_user_transactions.userId) AS userId,
  
  -- Heartbeat metrics
  COALESCE(MAX(heartbeat_agg.total_heartbeats), 0) AS total_heartbeats,
  COALESCE(LOGICAL_OR(heartbeat_agg.has_both_extensions_enabled), FALSE) AS has_both_extensions_enabled,
  MAX(heartbeat_agg.max_app_version) AS max_app_version,
  ARRAY_CONCAT_AGG(heartbeat_agg.all_device_ids) AS all_device_ids,
  ARRAY_CONCAT_AGG(heartbeat_agg.all_user_ids) AS all_user_ids,
  
  -- Session metrics
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_sessions.total_sessions_started), 0) AS total_sessions_started,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_sessions.non_pie_sessions_started), 0) AS non_pie_sessions_started,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_sessions.total_carts_visited), 0) AS total_carts_visited,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_sessions.total_cart_sessions), 0) AS total_cart_sessions,
  
  -- Interaction metrics
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_interactions.total_clicks), 0) AS total_clicks,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_interactions.total_shows), 0) AS total_shows,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_interactions.total_click_sessions), 0) AS total_click_sessions,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_interactions.total_show_sessions), 0) AS total_show_sessions,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_interactions.shows_adblock_cashback_popup), 0) AS shows_adblock_cashback_popup,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_interactions.clicks_adblock_cashback_popup), 0) AS clicks_adblock_cashback_popup,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_interactions.closes_adblock_cashback_popup), 0) AS closes_adblock_cashback_popup,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_interactions.clicks_popover), 0) AS clicks_popover,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_interactions.shows_popover), 0) AS shows_popover,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_interactions.clicks_popover_rewards), 0) AS clicks_popover_rewards,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_interactions.shows_popover_rewards), 0) AS shows_popover_rewards,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_interactions.c1_r1_shows), 0) AS c1_r1_shows,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_interactions.c1_r0_shows), 0) AS c1_r0_shows,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_interactions.c1_r1_clicks), 0) AS c1_r1_clicks,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_interactions.c1_r0_clicks), 0) AS c1_r0_clicks,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_interactions.c1_r1_closes), 0) AS c1_r1_closes,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_interactions.c1_r0_closes), 0) AS c1_r0_closes,
  
  -- Transaction metrics
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_transactions.total_transactions), 0) AS total_transactions,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_transactions.confirmed_transactions), 0) AS confirmed_transactions,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_transactions.total_millipoints), 0) AS total_millipoints,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_transactions.total_millipoints_confirmed), 0) AS total_millipoints_confirmed,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_transactions.earned_millipoints), 0) AS earned_millipoints,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_transactions.total_revenue_cents), 0) AS total_revenue_cents,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_transactions.gmv_cents), 0) AS gmv_cents,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_transactions.commission_cents), 0) AS commission_cents,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_transactions.confirmed_gmv_cents), 0) AS confirmed_gmv_cents,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_transactions.confirmed_commission_cents), 0) AS confirmed_commission_cents,
  
  -- Transaction type metrics (Note: ad_offer_revenue_cents removed - budget data now tracked separately in campaigns_campaignbudgetevents)
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_transactions.total_ad_offers_transactions), 0) AS total_ad_offers_transactions,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_transactions.ad_offer_millipoints), 0) AS ad_offer_millipoints,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_transactions.retargeting_offers_transactions), 0) AS retargeting_offers_transactions,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_transactions.retargeting_millipoints), 0) AS retargeting_millipoints,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_transactions.search_offers_transactions), 0) AS search_offers_transactions,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_transactions.search_millipoints), 0) AS search_millipoints,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_transactions.ad_view_transactions), 0) AS ad_view_transactions,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_transactions.ad_view_millipoints), 0) AS ad_view_millipoints,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_transactions.manual_transactions), 0) AS manual_transactions,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_transactions.manual_millipoints), 0) AS manual_millipoints,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_transactions.onboarding_transactions), 0) AS onboarding_transactions,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_transactions.onboarding_millipoints), 0) AS onboarding_millipoints,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_transactions.payout_transactions), 0) AS payout_transactions,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_transactions.payout_millipoints), 0) AS payout_millipoints,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_transactions.affiliate_transactions), 0) AS affiliate_transactions,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_transactions.affiliate_millipoints), 0) AS affiliate_millipoints,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_transactions.referral_millipoints), 0) AS referral_millipoints,
  
  -- Rewards transaction metrics
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_transactions.rewards_shows), 0) AS rewards_shows,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_transactions.rewards_clicks), 0) AS rewards_clicks,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_transactions.rewards_closes), 0) AS rewards_closes,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_transactions.rewards_no_shows), 0) AS rewards_no_shows,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_transactions.rewards_success_toasts), 0) AS rewards_success_toasts,
  MAX(f_user_transactions.ir_balance) AS ir_balance,
  
  -- Commerce metrics
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_commerce.total_affiliate_tags), 0) AS total_affiliate_tags,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_commerce.total_tag_sessions), 0) AS total_tag_sessions,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_commerce.total_order_confirmations), 0) AS total_order_confirmations,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_commerce.order_confirmation_sessions), 0) AS order_confirmation_sessions,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_commerce.tagged_order_confirmations), 0) AS tagged_order_confirmations,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_commerce.total_redirects), 0) AS total_redirects,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_commerce.total_redirect_sessions), 0) AS total_redirect_sessions,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_commerce.rewards_transaction_popup_redirects), 0) AS rewards_transaction_popup_redirects,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_commerce.coupon_popup_shopping_redirects), 0) AS coupon_popup_shopping_redirects,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_commerce.cashback_popup_adblock_redirects), 0) AS cashback_popup_adblock_redirects,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_commerce.rewards_popup_shopping_redirects), 0) AS rewards_popup_shopping_redirects,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_commerce.popover_coupon_list_redirects), 0) AS popover_coupon_list_redirects,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_commerce.login_retargeting_redirects), 0) AS login_retargeting_redirects,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_commerce.standdown_redirects), 0) AS standdown_redirects,
  
  -- Install/Uninstall metrics
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_installs.total_installs), 0) AS total_installs,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_installs.total_server_uninstalls), 0) AS total_server_uninstalls,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_installs.total_web_uninstalls), 0) AS total_web_uninstalls,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_installs.max_daily_uninstalls), 0) AS max_daily_uninstalls,
  
  -- Event metrics
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_events.total_standdowns), 0) AS total_standdowns,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_events.stop_standdowns), 0) AS stop_standdowns,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_events.notag_standdowns), 0) AS notag_standdowns,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_events.suppress_standdowns), 0) AS suppress_standdowns,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_events.total_pages_w_ads_seen), 0) AS total_pages_w_ads_seen,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_events.total_ad_placements_seen), 0) AS total_ad_placements_seen,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_events.total_pixels_seen), 0) AS total_pixels_seen,
  MAX(f_user_events.other_adblockers) AS other_adblockers,
  
  -- Video event metrics  
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_video_events.total_youtube_ads_seen), 0) AS total_youtube_ads_seen,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_video_events.total_youtube_errors), 0) AS total_youtube_errors,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_video_events.total_youtube_embeds), 0) AS total_youtube_embeds,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_video_events.total_youtube_successes), 0) AS total_youtube_successes,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_video_events.total_twitch_ads_seen), 0) AS total_twitch_ads_seen,
  COALESCE(MAX(f_user_video_events.total_adblock_errors), 0) AS total_adblock_errors

FROM base_data

GROUP BY final_anonymous_id, final_dt

-- Final table: User day funnel

SELECT
  -- Core identifiers
  dt,
  anonymous_id,
  userId,
  context_app_name,
  context_country,
  context_user_agent,
  other_adblockers,
  
  -- Heartbeat metrics
  total_heartbeats,
  max_app_version,
  has_both_extensions_enabled,
  
  -- Session metrics
  total_sessions_started,
  non_pie_sessions_started,
  total_carts_visited,
  total_cart_sessions,
  
  -- Interaction metrics
  total_clicks,
  total_shows,
  total_click_sessions,
  total_show_sessions,

  total_affiliate_tags AS total_tags,
  total_tag_sessions,
  total_redirects,
  total_redirect_sessions,

  ir_balance,

  max_daily_uninstalls AS uninstalls, -- replicates GREATEST_ARRAY logic
  total_server_uninstalls AS server_uninstalls,
  total_web_uninstalls AS web_uninstalls,
  total_installs AS num_installs,
  
  -- Transaction metrics
  total_transactions,
  confirmed_transactions,
  total_millipoints,
  total_millipoints_confirmed,
  earned_millipoints,
  total_revenue_cents,
  
  -- Affiliate transaction metrics
  gmv_cents,
  commission_cents,
  confirmed_gmv_cents,
  confirmed_commission_cents,
  
  -- Ad offer metrics (Note: all_adoffer_revenue_cents removed - budget data now tracked separately in campaigns_campaignbudgetevents)
  total_ad_offers_transactions AS all_offers_trx,
  ad_offer_millipoints AS all_adoffer_millipoints,
  
  -- Retargeting metrics
  retargeting_offers_transactions AS retargeting_offers_trx,
  retargeting_millipoints,
  
  -- Search metrics
  search_offers_transactions AS search_offers_trx,
  search_millipoints,
  
  -- Ad view metrics
  ad_view_transactions AS ad_view_trx,
  ad_view_millipoints,
  
  -- Manual metrics
  manual_transactions AS manual_trx,
  manual_millipoints,
  
  -- Onboarding metrics
  onboarding_transactions AS onboarding_trx,
  onboarding_millipoints,
  
  -- Payout metrics
  payout_transactions AS payout_trx,
  payout_millipoints,
  
  -- Affiliate metrics
  affiliate_transactions AS total_affiliate_transactions,
  affiliate_millipoints,
  
  -- Referral metrics
  referral_millipoints,
  
  -- Rewards transaction metrics
  rewards_shows,
  rewards_clicks,
  rewards_closes,
  rewards_no_shows,
  
  -- Order confirmation metrics
  order_confirmation_sessions,
  total_order_confirmations,
  
  -- Standdown metrics
  total_standdowns AS all_standdowns,
  stop_standdowns,
  notag_standdowns,
  suppress_standdowns,
  
  -- Ad metrics
  total_pages_w_ads_seen,
  total_ad_placements_seen,
  
  -- Video event metrics
  total_youtube_ads_seen,
  total_youtube_errors,
  total_youtube_embeds,
  total_youtube_successes,
  total_twitch_ads_seen,
  total_adblock_errors,
  
  -- Device arrays
  all_device_ids,
  all_user_ids,
  
  -- Cohort calculations
  first_heartbeat_date,
  install_timestamp,
  install_day_pst,
  puci,
  cohort_date,
  days_since_cohort_date,
  most_recent_uninstall_date AS most_recent_uninstall

FROM `piedotorg-production.user_intermediate_dev.int_user_cohort_logic`

GROUP BY date, puci
HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
